story:
What makes us different?

My name is Mayken Giraldo, and I am the Founder and CEO of Bella Comodità. At Bella Comodità, we strive to create the perfect shoe for every woman.

Our Colombian artisans handcraft your shoes from start to finish. Every process is perfected with passion, and molded with love, which exceeds the expectations of what we know today as high quality.

We created a comfort that you have never felt before. Bella Comodità combines a semi-orthopedic comfort within the insole and a high quality soft leather throughout the inside of the shoe. This combination makes our shoes one of a kind, and a dream to walk in.

We use the highest quality of luxury Colombian leather there is, and we combine our shoes with the best Top-grain and Full-grain leather in the market. This gives our shoes durability and a design that goes beyond what you have ever set your eyes on.

We believe in Ethical Fashion. I wanted to open my factory in Colombia because I wanted to make a difference among the people in need. We provide all of our artisans and employees with High paying jobs and Full benefits for them and their families.

With your support, we will be able to expand our facilities and our global presence. This is important to us because by doing so, we not only can create more shoes, but we can also provide more high paying jobs to those Colombians in need.

Our Goal

With this campaign, we would like to make women aware that they do not have to conform themselves with uncomfortable, poor quality shoes. We want to let them know that they deserve something better!

We aspire to reach $100,000 that will be allocated in expanding our factory capacity, and increasing our personnel. We will be able to increase production from 500 pairs of shoes per month, to 4,000 pairs of shoes per month! We will also be able to hire 80 more artisans!

Currently

With your support

500 pairs of shoes a month

4,000 pairs of shoes a month

10 artisans and employees

90 artisans and employees

 

Expanding our facilities will help us spread Bella Comodità to the rest of the world. We will love for you to be a part of this.

We have 4 very exciting benefits that we will be offering!

  • For $20 we will name one of our current, or future, styles in your name. We are starting this collection with 7 different pairs of shoes, but every day, we are perfecting and experimenting with new styles to keep revolutionizing the fashion industry.
  • For $40 we will put your name in the back of our catalog under “This couldn’t be possible without the amazing support of: (your name).” We will create a catalog for brand ambassadors to sell our shoes around the world, and we will love for your name to be recognized!
  • For $100 you can choose one of the 7 styles we have in our launch Indiegogo collection. We are offering discounts of up to 45% for this campaign to incentivize and help promote our brand!
  • For $500 we will make a custom made shoe just for you!

Step 1: Pick one of the 7 styles.

Step 2: Pick any of our unique leathers. We will send pictures of them to you through email.

Step 3: We will send you a special measuring tool to get your exact foot measurements.

Step 4: We will make the shoes, and ship them to your address.

 

INDIEGOGO COLLECTION!

BLACK LACQUER UNIQUE EMBOSSED TOP GRAIN LEATHER ANKLE STRAP HEELS

EXOTIC PYTHON EMBOSSED TOP GRAIN LEATHER ANKLE STRAP HEELS

BLACK FULL GRAIN LEATHER LACE UP SHORT BOOTS

LUXURIOUS BEIGE AND BLACK TOP GRAIN LEATHER PEEP TOE HEELS

TAN FULL GRAIN LEATHER SNEAKERS

TOP GRAIN BLACK LEATHER ANKLE BOOT

TOP GRAIN LEATHER ANKLE BOOT WITH HANDCRAFTED WOODEN HEEL.

Story and Impact

Upon finishing my Associate’s degree in Business Administration, I wanted to put what I had learned into practice. I wanted to develop something revolutionary that would change the world – keeping in mind that I wanted my product to always be on demand. As a result, I began to think about the shoe industry for women. I realized that all women like shoes, and they will keep wanting more until the end of time. I found that women worried more about the appearance of a shoe, rather than its comfort. Although with every shoe that they bought, they would never be satisfied because there was always something wrong with them. As a result, I decided to find out what these underlying “somethings” were. After analyzing my close friends and family members, they all agreed on the following three negative characteristics of shoes:

  • Comfort: After a matter of minutes, the heels made their feet tired and hurt.
  • Quality: After using the shoes a handful of times, they all noticed that the shoes were deteriorating and ultimately falling apart.
  • Price: All of the women were spending a great deal of money on a product that did not satisfy them completely.

 

After realizing this, I came up with the idea of getting my own factory and produce hand crafted shoes with beautiful and unique designs, and the added bonus of high quality leather. Using leather will solve the problem of shoe deterioration because it does not degrade easily. As far as comfort, we came up with a special enhancement in the insole of the shoe where we combine semi-orthopedic comfort with a surrounding smooth leather. Ultimately, I wanted to create a product so women did not have to worry about taking off their high heels after an hour of wearing them. I want them to feel as though they are wearing regular flat shoes, while wearing high heels.

When coming up with the best business model, I realized that my shoes needed to be attainable to every woman. By attainable, I mean having an affordable price. I needed a price in which women would not even slightly hesitate about purchasing the shoes. The shoes that I have created are beautiful in appearance and extremely comfortable – which is why having a great price is a major attribute that would make my product be even more desirable. From the ideas stated above, my business emerged, along with its three pillars:

  1. Exclusive designs
  2. Dreamed comfort
  3. Incomparable price

There are two reasons as to why I chose Colombia to begin my business. First of all, I was born there, and I have always known the well-recognized fame that handcrafted Colombian shoes have, plus their high-quality leathers. Secondly, since I lived in Colombia for a period of time, I was able to see what absolute poverty looked like. After seeing the conditions in which some people lived in, I felt like I had to do something; It got me thinking in ways that I would be able to help all of these people. That is when I realized that I wanted to create a huge company that would not only revolutionize the fashion industry, but also generate high paying jobs. These jobs would be able to improve the lives of many Colombians in need, and also provide them and their families with a brighter future. As a result, both of these matters made it clear to me that creating my factory in Colombia was best.

In the beginning of 2014, I started my business with $15,000 from my personal savings; my company was originally called Pauletty. I began my business by selling whole sale to local stores in the city of Pereira, Colombia. After a year of using this method, I met a person who also had a small shoe company called Echeverry. This small company drew my attention because the shoes were immensely comfortable (unlike I had ever felt before), but the style of the shoes were outdated and simply not appealing to the eye.

After encountering this product, I realized that Pauletty shoes did not have the comfort I was striving for, but the Echeverry shoes did. As a result, I decided to buy the company. With the purchase of Echeverry, I was able to obtain their secret formula to comfort. I then realized that I had two completely different types of shoe companies; therefore, I decided to merge both companies into one. This new merger would consist of shoes having a beautiful appearance on the outside, and never-before felt comfort in the inside. This new, revolutionary product is what emerged as Bella Comodità.

Projection 

I have always dreamed of expanding my company to the rest of the world. I know that in order to have a successful business, you must have an incredible product. Otherwise, you are not going to go anywhere with it. With this mentality, I persevered and I can affirm that I have created the best shoes in the market. My goal, as of now, is to expand my company into the United States, although I am short of the capital and channel support I need to accomplish this goal. As a result, I developed strategies that I would like to install:

  • Start an Indiegogo campaign to promote awareness and obtain funding for Bella Comodità’s expansion
  • Create an ecommerce business, where I can display the quality and beauty of my shoes
  • Create a nationwide catalog where a group of people will personally go out and sell the shoes in different cities throughout the United States
  • Sell Bella Comodità shoes to boutiques and small businesses, meanwhile the brand becomes known
  • Open Bella Comodità stores worldwide in the long run

Risk & challenges

A challenge that may arise is the conversion of the United States shoe sizes into Colombian sizes. Since the units of shoe length are different, there may be confusion when choosing the correct measure. Although this scenario is not too probable, it can be easily fixed just by contacting us.

There could be a risk in shipping delays. Since the shoes will be shipped directly from the factory in Colombia to your home, a shipping delay may happen due to unforeseen circumstances. But do not worry, you will receive your shoes!

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.

 

SIZING SCALE FOR YOUR SHOES

WE ONLY OFFER SIZES FROM SIZE 5 (35) TO SIZE 9 (40).

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that investing in a project is not a very easy decision, but if you cannot help us monetarily, I ask that you let your family and friends know about this project and product. You can also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter to be updated with the latest news and styles. We would love to keep providing women with the best shoes they will ever have!  

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BellaComoditaOfficial

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bellacomodita

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bellacomodita/

story:
High Heel                                 Mid Heel (kitten)                                Flat Heel

                                 3 SHOES IN 1

   

        High heel             Removing High Heel     Inserting Flat heel             Flat heel

You simply remove the high heel and insert the flat heel or a mid heel. Yes ladies, that is correct. When you cannot wear your high heels anymore you can easily switch to a flat heel.  Imagine that!!  No more taking 2 pairs of shoes to work.

     Switch the heels while wearing the shoes. 

HEELS TO FLAT, JUST LIKE THAT!!

       
     

   Unused heels are stored in a classy pouche

Go to the images page to see our 11 great styles. 

Switcheels are every women's dream!!

Switcheels

  • Our campaign is for a new concept in women's shoes. Our 'Switcheels' are high heel shoes that can transform to flat shoes or mid height heel shoes. 
  • We have working prototypes and samples.  We have quotes from parts suppliers and shoe manufacturers.   We need money to pay for molds and our first round of production to fulfill these orders. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $100,000 to pay for molds and our first production run. 
  • We will give contributors a pair of our Switcheels valued at $110 for a pledge of $75.  That is a win-win for the pledger and for us.  
  • If we do not reach our goal, we will raise the rest some how, so we can get the shoes to our pledgers.

The Impact

  • Our product is a new patent pending concept that all women love.  It solves a problem that women have had forever. Women can only wear high heels for so long until discomfort sets in. Our shoes can be high heels, midheight heels, and flats. They are 3 shoes in 1!! Switcheels will be great for brides and bridal parties, working women, waitresses, airline attendants, professional women, etc.  Women love wearing high heels and men love women in high heels. 
  • We are ready to take our first step (pun intended).  We have successful prototypes and samples to take to shoe trade shows. We have built 7 prototypes to perfect our shoes. Switcheels were designed by an Architect.  A high heel shoe is a like a little building.  It has structure and style.  

Risks & Challenges

  • Our main obstacle was to make sure it will work.  We kept building prototype after prototype until we go it to work safely. 
  • We will continue to keep improving our design and expand our number of styles. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We feel we have a product that "word of mouth" is the best form of advertising. When we tell any woman or man, the 'WOW' factor is obvious.  They instantly say, that is a great idea. Where can I buy one? 
  • We want to develop a team of selling agents to sell our Switcheels.  They will sell to their friends, family, and co-workers.  This will help women make money for themselves.  This will also help us to expand our market. It is a 'win-win'. 
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools to help us promote!

story:
Liebe Besucher meiner Kampagne, liebe Indiegogo Community

 Ich heiße Franziska Frericks und startete den ersten ernsthaften Versuch von meiner Arbeit als Kreativschaffende zu leben vor knapp zehn Jahren, erst mit Ausstellungen in Räumen zur Zwischennutzung und später für zwei Jahre in einem eigenen Laden. So lange wechseln sich die Phasen zwischen Jobs zum Geld Verdienen und ein neues Projekt beginnen miteinander ab und genau das würde ich jetzt gerne ändern

 Anfang Januar 2013 hab ich ein Konzept geschrieben und mich auf den Weg gemacht. Ganz oben auf der Liste dieses Konzeptes steht meine diesjährige Teilnahme am DMY-Festival vom 5-9.Juni 2013.

 Seit Februar 2013 bin ich angemeldet und werde am Festival meine „Schaumwelt“-Serie vorstellen.

 Die Serie heißt deshalb Schaumwelt weil der Werkstoff aus dem die Objekte entstehen geschäumtes Polystyrol, besser bekannt unter dem Markennamen Styropor ist. Das faszinierende für mich an diesem simplen Dämmmaterial ist, dass es, übereinander gelegt, Schatten erzeugt und zusätzlich Farben durchlässt. Die Streuung der eingesetzten Lichtquelle (eine Leuchtstofflampe wahlweise mit kalter oder warmer Fabtemperatur) ist sowohl atmosphärisch als auch hell. Der Lichteffekt ist vergleichbar mit Mondlicht je nach Farbtemperatur während verschiedener Phasen der Nacht.

 Jeder einzelne Sonnenauf- und Untergang den ich erlebe löst eine erbsengroße Emotion des Glücks darüber in mir aus, auf der Welt zu sein. Der eigenen Emotion von Glück und anderen Gefühlen eine Form zu geben, sie in ein Objekt zu „packen“, sie mit Farbmischungen aus zukleiden und dann zum Leuchten zu bringen bezeichne ich deshalb als Leitfaden durch meine Arbeit.

 Zwei weitere elementare Punkte des Konzeptes sind sind der Aufbau eines eigenen Online-Shops und mein Anschluss an ein Netzwerk welches zu mir und meiner Arbeit passt.

 My name ist Franziska Frericks, originally from Switzerland and I live in Berlin for 21 years, 18 of those with my daughter. The first time I startet my independence was ten years ago. During this time I made my approach in Lighting Design. In the course of this ten years I lalternated between doing jobs for earn money and realize my projects. Now, with the help of Indiegogo and in this sense with the help of you I hope that I can reach stability for my creative business by following a concept. The plan is that I will be part of the DMY-Festival in this summer in Berlin and present there my objects called „foamworld.“It is called „foamworld“ because the objects are made of styrofoam. I love this material because for me it is the perfect way to create a design of shades, reflexions and colors in the same time. More goals for my business are to build an online-shop and for me to be stable part of a network for creative working people.

 


 

 

 

 An dieser Stelle hier möchte ich mich namentlich bei den Menschen bedanken, die es möglich gemacht haben, dass ich mein Konzept bis hierhin umsetzen konnte – in der Reihenfolge ihres Erscheines The following people have made possible the implementation of my concept until now

 Mein Vater – er hat die Hälfte des benötigten Kapitals vorgeschossen und damit die Honorare für die Grafiken und Tischlerarbeiten sowie die Materialkosten für die Prototypen und die Standmiete für das Festival bezahlt. My Dad has advanced the half of the needed capital

 Carsten Kröger operativer Geschäftsführer von Werk5 der mir Hartschaum für die geplanten Modelle für die Zen-Leuchten gesponsert hat. Karsten Kröger COO of Werk 5 who has sponsered the foam

 Marko Merkel angehender Produktdesigner (nein, er ist nicht mit der Bundeskanzlerin verwandt), der alle (noch so befremdlichen) Entwürfe als Vektor- oder 3D-Grafik in einer für mich bemerkenswerten Geschwindkeit erstellt hat Marco Merkel who has drawn the drafts

 Die Gießerei Flierl, in deren Werkstatt ich mein erstes Gießmodell selbst herstellen durfte und dafür mehr Hilfe als vereinbart bekommen habe. Vielen, vielen Dank The foundry Flierl where I could make the casting model

 Malte Licht, der sehr schöne Rahmen für das Lichtobjekt „Chroma“ gebaut hat. Malte Licht who made the frames for the object calles „Chroma“

 Das Team von Eventify deren Werkstatt, Kopierer und Lasercutter ich nutzen durfte (und deren Kekse ich gegessen habe).The Eventify-Team who let me use theire garage and tools

 „Kiste“ der mir mit seiner von mir auch reichlich strapazierten Geduld geholfen hat, das Bildbearbeitungsprogramm zu verstehen, der für alle auftauchenden Probleme im Zusammenhang mit dem Lasercut, (und es gab einige) eine Lösung gefunden hat ohne den es die Leuchte „Skia“ in dieser Form nicht geben würde und der schon jetzt hervorragende Ideen hat, wie ich den zweiten Teil der „Schaumwelt“-Serie werde realisieren können. „Crate“ who helped me with every problem with the sofware, the calculations of the pattern and the dovetails for „skia“.

story_txt:
Liebe Besucher meiner Kampagne, liebe Indiegogo Community
 Ich heiße Franziska Frericks und startete den ersten ernsthaften Versuch von meiner Arbeit als Kreativschaffende zu leben vor knapp zehn Jahren, erst mit Ausstellungen in Räumen zur Zwischennutzung und später für zwei Jahre in einem eigenen Laden. So lange wechseln sich die Phasen zwischen Jobs zum Geld Verdienen und ein neues Projekt beginnen miteinander ab und genau das würde ich jetzt gerne ändern
 Anfang Januar 2013 hab ich ein Konzept geschrieben und mich auf den Weg gemacht. Ganz oben auf der Liste dieses Konzeptes steht meine diesjährige Teilnahme am DMY-Festival vom 5-9.Juni 2013.
 Seit Februar 2013 bin ich angemeldet und werde am Festival meine „Schaumwelt“-Serie vorstellen.
 Die Serie heißt deshalb Schaumwelt weil der Werkstoff aus dem die Objekte entstehen geschäumtes Polystyrol, besser bekannt unter dem Markennamen Styropor ist. Das faszinierende für mich an diesem simplen Dämmmaterial ist, dass es, übereinander gelegt, Schatten erzeugt und zusätzlich Farben durchlässt. Die Streuung der eingesetzten Lichtquelle (eine Leuchtstofflampe wahlweise mit kalter oder warmer Fabtemperatur) ist sowohl atmosphärisch als auch hell. Der Lichteffekt ist vergleichbar mit Mondlicht je nach Farbtemperatur während verschiedener Phasen der Nacht.
 Jeder einzelne Sonnenauf- und Untergang den ich erlebe löst eine erbsengroße Emotion des Glücks darüber in mir aus, auf der Welt zu sein. Der eigenen Emotion von Glück und anderen Gefühlen eine Form zu geben, sie in ein Objekt zu „packen“, sie mit Farbmischungen aus zukleiden und dann zum Leuchten zu bringen bezeichne ich deshalb als Leitfaden durch meine Arbeit.
 Zwei weitere elementare Punkte des Konzeptes sind sind der Aufbau eines eigenen Online-Shops und mein Anschluss an ein Netzwerk welches zu mir und meiner Arbeit passt.
 My name ist Franziska Frericks, originally from Switzerland and I live in Berlin for 21 years, 18 of those with my daughter. The first time I startet my independence was ten years ago. During this time I made my approach in Lighting Design. In the course of this ten years I lalternated between doing jobs for earn money and realize my projects. Now, with the help of Indiegogo and in this sense with the help of you I hope that I can reach stability for my creative business by following a concept. The plan is that I will be part of the DMY-Festival in this summer in Berlin and present there my objects called „foamworld.“It is called „foamworld“ because the objects are made of styrofoam. I love this material because for me it is the perfect way to create a design of shades, reflexions and colors in the same time. More goals for my business are to build an online-shop and for me to be stable part of a network for creative working people. 
 
 
 
 
 An dieser Stelle hier möchte ich mich namentlich bei den Menschen bedanken, die es möglich gemacht haben, dass ich mein Konzept bis hierhin umsetzen konnte – in der Reihenfolge ihres Erscheines The following people have made possible the implementation of my concept until now
 Mein Vater – er hat die Hälfte des benötigten Kapitals vorgeschossen und damit die Honorare für die Grafiken und Tischlerarbeiten sowie die Materialkosten für die Prototypen und die Standmiete für das Festival bezahlt. My Dad has advanced the half of the needed capital

story:
A Little About US

We demand success and work hard to make things happen. Here's a quick review of the kind of success we've experienced:

  • In 2007 - we started our custom gloves series with just a small amount of money we had saved (we'll give you a hint ... it was less than what we're asking for here).  We only had money for product. We had $0 marketing budget and relied solely on word of mouth.
  • By 2009 - one of our gloves appeared on the cover of ESPN Rise.
  • By 2010 - we had clients in the minors and majors. Our gloves began appearing all over the world - from individual players to major teams (the national teams for Spain, Netherlands, Italy, Australia, Germany, and Cuba for example)
  • By 2012 - our gloves appeared on broadcasts of ESPN, The World Baseball Classic, and The Next Knuckler. 
Now it's 2014. We're ready to grow and start some limited edition lines of our gloves. What you see offered here is just a glimpse at all the glove and product ideas we have. We'll have to start small at first, of course, but we made our custom glove business grow and we'll do the same with our limited editions.

This is just the start for us. We have the quality, the talent, and the drive. We just need your help to move to the next level!


What We Need 

Starting a line of gloves takes investment. We have to buy leathers and models, set aside time to develop glove designs, market our products, redesign our website, and more. We're asking for a minimum of $4,000 so we can move forward. Obviously, the more money we raise, the faster we will grow! Here's a breakdown of our plan for funds raised:

  • 67% - Product Design and Creation 
    By far most of our funds go into purchasing leather, but this portion also includes details like models, threads, dyes, boxes, glove bags, and time to create the gloves. Because we will purchase a certain quantity of leather, we will have extra material left over to make gloves that will remain in our inventory for future online sales. 
  • 17% - Marketing
    We intend to use our social media pages (over 10,000 followers between Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, etc) as well as branch into some local advertising. 
  • 17% - Website Design
    We create our own websites, so this will cover the amount of time it will take as well as any necessary software upgrades.



What You Get

Now this is the fun part! The gloves we're offering here are just the beginning. We plan to offer more glove lines in the future. The more funds we raise, the more sizes and styles we can offer. 
All of our gloves meet strict quality standards. We pay close attention to detail and only work with the best producers of leather in the US. Our gloves easily compare to top brands. If you have not already purchased a glove with us, you're in for a treat.
If we don't have your size or style available, you can always give them as gifts or resell. Keep in mind that the whole reason we're doing this is so we can raise money to expand our offerings. So, if you can't find your size, that may be exactly why you should contribute to our campaign! But please also feel free to send us an email (customerservice@pmcustomgloves.com) saying what you'd like to see us create in the future. We plan to make glove lines that meet the needs of our customers, so we want to hear from you. We hope you can still make a contribution, though, as every amount brings us closer to making our project a reality.
Here are our packages:
  • $10 - Thanks
    You have our sincere thanks for your contribution!
  • $20 - Thanks and a Shout Out
    We thank you from the bottom of our hearts, and to prove it, we will give you a special shout out on our social media pages. And just like that, you're a super star.
  • $175 - The Infielder
    + $15 US Shipping, $45 International Shipping


  • $190 - The Pitcher in Tan
    -Free US Shipping, please add $30 for International Shipping
  • $190 - The Pitcher in Black
    -Free US Shipping, please add $30 for International Shipping

  • $190 - The Pitcher in Mesh
    -Free US Shipping, please add $30 for International Shipping

  • $190 - The Outfielder
    -Free US Shipping, please add $30 for International Shipping

  • $195 - The Catcher
    -Free US Shipping, please add $30 for International Shipping

  • $355 - The Captain
    -Free US Shipping, please add $60 for International Shipping
    Two gloves of $175 value (excluding catchers gloves). 

  • $365 - The All-Star
    -Free US Shipping, please add $60 for International Shipping
    Two catchers gloves for you to enjoy or share with a friend.

  • $365 - The MVP
    -Free US Shipping, please add $30 for International Shipping
    A glove of your choice from one of the offered packages and 3 months advertising on the main page of our website.

  • $545 - The Coach
    -Free US Shipping, please add $60 for International Shipping
    Two gloves of your choice from the offered packages and 3 months advertising on the main page of our website.

  • $565 - The Manager
    -Free US Shipping, please add $30 for International Shipping
    A glove of your choice from one of the offered packages and 6 months advertising on the main page of our website.

  • $730 - The Owner
    -Free US Shipping, please add $60 for International Shipping
    Two gloves of your choice from the offered packages and 6 months advertising on the main page of our website.


Production Timeline for 2014

We will keep our backers updated with our progress throughout production. Here's how we'll break down our process:
Beginning of September - campaign ends, order materials
Middle of September - begin production
Beginning of November - wrap up production
Middle/End of November - begin shipping gloves
Estimated Shipping Date: End of November/Beginning of December 2014 

Your Impact

This is just the beginning for us. We have never-ending ideas and can't wait to get working! By contributing to this campaign, you are investing in a company that sincerely cares about creating the kinds of gloves you want. We already have the best quality gloves on the market, but we want to expand our market from custom gloves to limited editions. Who knows? Maybe we can even start selling our gloves at a store near you. But first we need those funds! 



Risks & Challenges

We've really minimized our risks. We've all been working together for seven years now, we've had the same supplier the whole time, and we're all ready for higher capacity. 

That said, we are up against some big companies (you know who we're talking about). But we believe our quality and style rival anything those larger brands offer. Plus, those large corporations are product-centric, making them mostly interested in producing and moving large amounts of products. As a smaller business, we have a more customer-centric approach in which we will have frequent communication with our customers to understand the kinds of products they want to see on the market. 

We're ready to grow and believe we have more than enough potential to do so.

story:
Hi I’m Ann-Marie, a graphic designer. Like many of you, I was tired of the typical twee greeting cards available in shops and through mainstream internet sellers. (And the lack of good old fashioned swearing!) I started creating cards for my friends and family that were more my style: my sense of humour, saying what I wanted to...no matter how close to the bone or sweary! I loved sending them and people were genuinely delighted to receive them!

Soon, friends and family were asking me to make cards for them to give too. It began to snowball and it didn't take much for me to be persuaded to start selling my cards to friends of friends and it was at that point that 'Phuckadoodledoo' was born!

From the start, I knew that I wanted Phuckadoodledoo cards to be fun, honest and irreverent, but quality was also of the utmost importance.  Instead of a flat, digital print – like so much of what you can buy now – I wanted to return to the old art of letterpress so since June 2014 I have been partnered with Beau Monde, a fabulous printing studio in the UK, to letterpress my card designs which I sell online. I was amazed and delighted that so many of you liked my work and shared my views on cards and what I wanted to say in them (swears and all!)

I am very passionate about giving people special cards and presents whatever the occasion. I hate having to choose something emotionless and not really that funny! And I definitely don't want something that has been mass-produced – I want my gifts to be a talking point, something quirky, showing a bit of thought and a personal touch.

Having breathed fresh, sweary air into greetings cards, I now want to do the same with gifts.  I’ve decided to combine my cheeky, sweary designs with other printable gifts: mugs, T-shirts, notebooks and bags. These will be offered with original Phuckadoodledoo designs or I’ll work with you to produce bespoke artwork for your unique printing. Now I need your help to make this a reality and share them with the world.

I’m looking to raise £3,000. This is to cover:

  • Limited Edition rewards for Indiegogo such as mugs, bags and notebooks

  • Equipment for future mug and cloth printing

  • Initial start up blank stock mugs, bags and notebooks ready for printing

  • Shipping and handling for rewards

If I reach £5,000 I will increase the range of products to include T-shirts, coasters, towels, aprons, key rings and soft toys...

Let the Phucking world know!

You may love this idea and want to get some of our products in the future, but can’t contribute to this campaign now. That’s not a problem. All I ask is that you share this project - tell the world about it! The more people like us that want it and can help out, the more chance we have of making that printed, sweary baby bib a reality!!

  • Twitter: Let all your friends know about Phuckadoodledoo and tweet or follow us at @phuckadoodledo@phuckadoodledo.
  • Facebook: Like the Phuckadoodledoo Facebook page and/or post about us.
  • Instagram: Follow Phuckadoodledoo on Instagram and let your followers know.
  • Pinterest: Follow us on Pinterest and pin our pictures for your followers to see.

story:
The Manifesto:

 
We are the Revolution that had no Resources to be televised. 
An Excited Riot. 
An Uprise of Righteous Indignation toward an inability to think for oneself. 
We stand firmly on Hope.
We stare Blankly at the Preposterous.
We Desire to Inspire. 
We are what happens when Revival meets Mutiny and decides that they will not live without each other
We Are Loud with our Mouths closed
We are Strong with our Palms open
And we will not Relent.

Originally formulated in 2011 on a little note pad in Queens, NY, this Line has been transformed from a "Good Idea" into a full on Revolution. Promoting Positivity, its not just this thought of going against things that are popular or trendy because we think their stupid, but instead about taking a stand for things knowing fully well that the general populous won't. This was started because people needed to be inspired to be able to be free thinking individuals without the fear of backlash, and that's still the main Goal. This is an encouragement to look at societal problems and desire to fix them, by wearing the solutions. Like the Manifesto says, "Loud with our Mouths Closed" and "Strong with our Palms Open", its the idea of talking without talking. Images and Actions are what run the world these days, and the same goes for this Line. There are enough bad ideas out there, that are just birthing more bad ideas, why not plant the seed of a good one? 

I hope this small history of Against Ridiculous Trends helps in some way explain the mission we are on. We are Picking Fights.

 
"To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting." 
- E. E. Cummings
story_txt:
The Manifesto:
 
We are the Revolution that had no Resources to be televised. 
An Excited Riot. 
An Uprise of Righteous Indignation toward an inability to think for oneself. 
We stand firmly on Hope.
We stare Blankly at the Preposterous.
We Desire to Inspire. 
We are what happens when Revival meets Mutiny and decides that they will not live without each other
We Are Loud with our Mouths closed
We are Strong with our Palms open
And we will not Relent.

story:
Who We Are?

Round up everyday transactions and donate change to the charity of your choice... Because Giving is Happiness. Smart Giving is a membership organisation. A platform for individuals, businesses and charities to interact and support each other.

 

What's in for ME?

We are developing a cross platform mobile and web application which will allow our members to give anything they like, e.g. money, time or skills. You will earn joys (points) for whatever you give, which you can spend on freebies and discounts offered by our business members. It’s simple, more you give the more you get.

 

What's in for My Business?

Smart Giving offers a subscription service to our business members to help you create marketing campaign such as discount offers and rewards program. We provide a unique proposition, we don’t charge any commissions whatever revenue you generate through your campaign your business will get all of it.

Our business dashboard will show up to date results of your campaign and your customers will be able to provide direct feedback to help you understand how they really feel about your business.

 

What's in for My Charity?

There's a wide variation in the effectiveness of different charities fundraising efforts. An estimate of the average fundraising cost ratio is 30%. Smart Giving provides a free service to charities.

Our charity dashboard will help you understand demographics of your supporters so you can allocate your resources to attract the right audience. Not just that, you will be able to attract local volunteers and whoever commit to volunteer through Smart Giving, we will reward them with Joys (points) which they can use to get freebies and discounts from our business members.

 

What we have done so for?

With the help of initial funding by our partner Startup Good, we have completed the prototype. Now we need your support to complete the project. Your support will help us develop mobile and web application and make giving part of everyday.

 

So remember, Happiness can FOLLOW US if we LIKE...

Because Giving is Happiness...

story:
Hello! We are GDM – Glyndwr Designer Makers.

Our project is to raise enough money for our little team to exhibit our graduate collection at New Designers 2014 in London this June.

As our team this year is so small the cost for each student to exhibit is very high, and like most students spare cash is not something we have in abundance.

Exhibiting at New Designers will provide a professional platform for us all to find work, placements and commissions.

For many of us this is the last chance we will have to exhibit as graduates at this prestigious event. 

Why we need your help!

To exhibit at New Designers this year we need to raise a monster £4000! (and that is just for the stand)

On top of the costs for the stand, we have travel and accommodation costs for six people to stay in London for the duration of the exhibition.

We are all working overtime to raise the funds but we still need your help…

What You Get!

Of course we want to give back to those who support us and we have a few perks that we can offer in order to say Thank You!

We will be offering a number of invitations to New Designers, a number of invitations to the awards evening and the opportunity for some lucky supporters to own a beautiful piece of hand crafted design work from a designer of your choice within the team.

Business owners who may wish to sponsor the stand will be credited on the stand and in our promotional literature…Great exposure to an estimated 16,000 visitors.

Before we go!

Your contribution could have a massive impact on our future as working designers.

Please Help…In anyway you can…£1, 50p or much more if you are feeling flush…whatever you can give will be greatly appreciated and if you cannot afford to donate then help us spread the word…Every little helps

Thank you for your support!

P.s don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools.

We will contact prize draw winners using the email address entered when contributing.

;O)

story:
Short Summary

Totally stamped - specialising in personalised jewellery for a cause.

We all know someone who has been unwell, fighting cancer, who has a disorder or lost a child. May it be yourself a loved one or a family friend. 

Totally Stamped specialises in jewellery for a cause may it be Cancer, Disorders, Autism, Loss or just for awareness we have that special piece of jewellery for everyone. 

Best of all we will donate 10% from EVERY 'cause' Jewellery to that specific cause. 

Lockets

Completely personalised stainless steel lockets in your choice of 4 styles complete with chain. Choose your own message (or chose a premade message hand stamped right here by us) then add your awareness ribbon plus charms of your choice. Lockets start at just $35.00 for personalised message and ribbon charm. 

We also offer Hand stamped  pure, hypo-allergenic aluminium pieces in a variety of shapes and styles these are also personalised with your message (may it be names of loved ones or a special saying.  Then add your chosen charms.

Best of all we will donate 10% from EVERY 'cause' Jewellery to that specific cause. 

Please help us reach our goal to buy the supplies we need to offer these wonderful personalised pieces to everyone for almost every cause. 

This is not a special offer we will always donate 10% from every 'cause' piece we sell. 


What We Need & What You Get

With your help we will be able to get more supplies.

  • Lockets, chains & accessories- This is an ongoing cost for us, we need to be able to buy in bulk and that is where at least half of our funds will be going. The more we have the more choices that YOU our customers will have to choose from.
  • Metal stamping fonts - currently we have 2 styles of fonts we would really love to be able to offer 5 styles, each set can cost up to $100.
  • Charms- we need lots more charms (awareness ribbons, initials, and other speciality charms) to cater for EVERYONE! 

The Impact

Totally Stamped will keep giving. For EVERY sale of a 'cause' item at least 10% will go to that specific cause. Its a great way to keep giving but you will also receive personalised items for yourself or friends.

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't have the money to help fund, don't worry there are other ways you can help.

  • Share this champaign with friends and family, on facebook or twitter etc.

story:
From Elvis to AEGAON

Yes, it was the „king“ himself who gave the spark for the idea. In his video „Always On My Mind“ you can see a watch that is huge on his wrist!

" We noticed it, we liked it, we made our own! "

Since then, we have worked on our own design and prototype for two long years, getting to know it by wearing it and improving it-making it more comfortable.

"And now YOU can have it! "

Read our review on Watchuseek


The very FIRST Estonian wrist watch!

Estonia is a small European country known for Skype, Ewert And The Two Dragons, the great sumo wrestler Baruto Kaido Höövelson etc.  Estonia is also known for combining innovation and high technology and that´s what we have done with Aegaon watches.
There would be no greater honor, than to take our small nation to the world map with another great thing -AEGAON watches!


How it´s made and what´s our goal?

We need to raise 20 000 USD to get the production going. It is expensive to produce this watch in small quantities. We would have to get only one greater line in production to get us started.

  • Our casings are made by a high technology CNC cuting machine that is actually used for airplane parts on everyday basis by our Estonian partners.
  • Every casing is carefully polished in a specific machine we need to invest in.
  • All AEGAON watches are assembled in Estonia by professionals.
  • Every single contributor will get an AEGAON watch, wether we reach our goal or not!
We have many more great ideas and designs waiting to be seen. Our main goal is to release a whole line of AEGAON watches!


A watch for every contribution!

Our main goal is to get our watches out there and thats how we have set up our campaign!

  • You will get a watch for every  contribution!
  • The first 50 Aegaon watches will be given out for 350 EUR/ 477 USD
  • The rest  will be given out for 450 EUR/ 612 USD
  • "Aegaon Special" will be given for 800EUR/1089USD
  • The first 50 contributors will get their watches a month after the campaign.
  • The next 300 will get their watches 2 moths after the campaign.


Technical information

We are using only ETA movements, which are used by all the quality watch companies. The stainless steel casing is designed and produced in Estonia.
All watches are assembled in Estonia.

Caseback: 316L stainless steel
Glass: Mineral glass
Water Resistance: 10ATM / 100M / 330FT
Case diameter: 65mm
Case length (Lug-to-Lug): 65mm
Case thickness (Dome Crest to Caseback): 14.5mm
Distance between lugs (Strap Width): 32mm
Strap: Brown or black leather with white stitches

Warranty: 2 years
Country: Made In Estonia

Movement used in "AEGAON" watch (price: 450-EUR/ 612-USD ):
MOVEMENT ETA UNITAS 6497-1 CLASSICAL SKELETON FINE FINISHED Made In Hong Kong (Swiss clone)*
17 Jewels f = 18000 bph, power reserve 36h.
Warranty: 2 years
This movement is a Hong Kong made high quality clone version of the Swiss movement. Aegaon has tested it for 2 years and it´s running perfect.

Movement used in "AEGAON Special" watch (price: 800EUR/ 1089-USD ):
MOVEMENT ETA UNITAS 6497-1, CLASSICAL SKELETON FINE FINISHED
Made In Switzerland (original)*
17 Jewels f = 18000 bph, power reserve 56 h.
Warranty: 2 years
This movement is used by almost all high end Swiss brands by one or several of their models.


Risks & Challenges

We have minimized all risks in the line of producing the watches.
It may become a challange to get all the watches assembled in a reasonable amount of time IF we get more orders than we bargained for. It is actually not a bad thing because then we would need to expand and create jobs.

story:
My Baby Paradise is a website that will change the idea of a baby registry forever. 

If you sign up for a registry then a good portion of the profit raised will be turned into a check that will then be sent to the registrant on the day of your baby shower essentially turning baby registries into your own personal piggy bank to help you and your family get off to a better start when your little one arrives. I have obtained all licencing and am almost ready to get this off the ground,  Developing has become very time consuming leaving me no choice but to step down from my current employment. I would really appreciate any help getting this off the ground

  My family brought $5,000 to Babies R Us during our registry and that's when I thought that this could be better and used to help families generate some money for them instead of these big corporate companies taking it all for themselves.

. My partner in this endeavor was recently disabled from an auto accident which has also added a financial instability for his family while we pursue this. Now we have all our eggs in one basket and we would greatly appreciate any help from our community to get this out there. We would like to obtain some funds to start ordering wholesale, store our products, obtain reliable processing equipment and all while keeping ourselves afloat and if not then just to find a reliable shipping partner and a product base decent enough to run a full registry.

 We are close to accomplishing this goal, just need to cross the finish line. If you would like to help money isn't the only way, Please share and ask others to share and so on and maybe the right person out there may come across this to help us see it through. Any advice on obtaining a product base and decent enough profit margin to accomplish this would be awesome. Also if any business owners out there have any ideas or offers for us that may help please contact us by all means. I'm sure many families in the future would thank you if they could and thank you all for your support from the My Baby Paradise team as well.

Also if any business owners out there have any ideas or offers for us that may help please contact us by all means. I'm sure many families in the future would thank you if they could and thank you all for your support from the My Baby Paradise team as well.

story:
Great birdwatching t-shirts.

My name is Paul Riss. I'm insane about birdwatching. Many of you may have helped fund my documentary film about birdwatching. I'm not your typical birder though and what I'm making here are not your typical birdwatching t-shirts. These shirts are designed specifically to appeal to birdwatchers. Why? Because let's face it, nobody really takes time to relate to us with apparel. It's always just some picture of a bird. The 'design' of the images is never considered. That's about to change.


How far can we go? There's no limit. If this campaign is successful, I will expand, and make more limited edition t-shirts. From there, why can't we move on to other things, hoodies, coffee mugs, framed art prints for your homes. We can do anything with this idea? Why do I say we? Because you are as much a part of it as I am. I will be honest with you and let you know exactly why things cost what they do, where each penny of the money goes, what it means to those people and their lives. Not to mention that you'll be buying and wearing the stuff. If there's something you think birdwatchers want, let's make it happen, together.

Why am I starting with a Red-winged Blackbird? It's such a common bird.

Well, for me that bird specifies the arrival of spring. People, non-birders, always talk about Robins being the signifier to spring, but for me it's Red-winged Blackbirds. Hearing their call means things are really underway. To me they are the beginning and so are very fitting to start what I hope becomes something as exciting for me as spring migration.

What We Need & What You Get

I'll be honest, with making the film and my family life, I just can't afford to front this project with my own money. What does that mean to you?

  • You have to pay for it BUT you get a shirt, so it's actually just like buying a shirt.
  • You pre-pay and if we reach our goal together, we all get a shirt. If we don't, you get your money back. It's that simple.
  • A quality, yet birdy t-shirt (american apparel brand or better)

What does this mean to birdwatching and birders?

  • You can finally be a birder AND fashion forward.
  • It will raise the bar for birdwatching apparel and make people more interested in birding in general.
  • Imagine yourself wearing this shirt and people asking, "What does RWBL mean?" All of a sudden you have a chance to talk about birding and how awesome it is. We all love doing that, right?
  • We don't have to look like fuddy-duddy freak-show bird people in our poorly designed, ill-fitting t-shirts anymore. We can still be bird-freaks but with style!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford a shirt ($35 CDN), you can still make birding cooler.

  • SHARE, SHARE, SHARE this campaign with anyone and everyone you know!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools so that they share it out too!
  • Did I mention you should share this, it's the BEST way for us to get our best birding shirt ever.

Let's be birders with style together!

We don't have to look like fuddy-duddy freak-show bird people in our poorly designed, ill-fitting t-shirts anymore. We can still be bird-freaks but with style!



Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't afford a shirt ($35 CDN), you can still make birding cooler.

SHARE, SHARE, SHARE this campaign with anyone and everyone you know!
Use the Indiegogo share tools so that they share it out too!
Did I mention you should share this, it's the BEST way for us to get our best birding shirt ever.


Let's be birders with style together!

story:
PURPOSE

 

 

Since we started MSTR 7 years ago, we’ve had numerous request for automatic watches, but could not create affordable models that maintain our standards of quality through the traditional retail business model. Thanks to the rise of crowdfunding, we're now able to raise funds and exclusively sell direct-to-consumers to cut out the middle-man and keep our prices down. We're excited to finally give our loyal and supportive fans what they've been asking for! 

 

DELIVERING ON OUR PROMISE

As experienced watchmakers, we have already began production on our Early Bird watches.  These will be ready for delivery as soon as the campaign ends in November.  The rest of the watches will still deliver in time for the holidays!

 

Designed in California with worldwide influences... There are a couple of features that make an automatic watch so special. First no battery is required for the movement... it creates and stores kinetic energy from your wrist.  When you move the mechanics of the watch will spin and generate energy to power the watch. The movement is composed of many more gears and components than a traditional quartz battery operated watches. The other feature is that the second hand no longer ticks, instead it sweeps seamlessly.

For this campaign there are two different automatic watches to choose from; the Noble and the Speedster

 

THE AUTOMATIC WATCHES

 

The NOBLE 

The Noble is the simpler design with subtle features that draw out its beauty. We took elements from our flagship Ambassador watch and simplified it. The case and bezel are not only buff, but intricate, with precision cuts, hexagon bolts, and a polished bezel. The carbon fiber dial face is overlaid with polished 3D indicators and a sweeping second hand to create depth. It’s protected with a tough sapphire crystal lens that’s been further improved with an anti-reflective coating.

The Noble is constructed of premium materials and parts to ensure lasting durability. It’s made of NASA grade 316L stainless steel with a screw down crown to secure the adjustment knob. The workings of the 21 jewel automatic Miyota 821A movement can be viewed under the back case.

Great design doesn’t sacrifice function. A dual layer gasket along with the screw down crown give the Noble 10 ATM of water resistance. The mechanical movement can store almost 2 days of power and includes a date window. Luminescent hands give night time visibility. The full stainless steel band is held together with a quick-release two-button butterfly clasp. The band can be swapped to a leather or silicon/rubber strap. This versatility allows you to easily change up the look and feel of the watch.  

The Noble will be available in Rose Gold, Champagne Gold, Silver, or Black.

 

The SPEEDSTER

The Speedster is our over-sized watch with a racecar inspired design. It features a larger 45mm, multi-piece bolt down case and a layered bezel cut to resemble an engine piston. The numerical hour indicators and minute hash marks overlay a carbon fiber dial face with sub-dials to emulate the gauge clusters of popular race cars. The spinning gears of the automatic movement are exposed to showcase the "engine" that drives the watch. A sapphire lens with an anti-reflective coating also protects the watch.

The Speedster is premium built to ensure lasting quality. It’s also made of NASA grade 316L stainless steel with a screw down crown to secure the adjustment knob. It features a 21 jewel automatic Miyota 82S7 movement that shows the seconds on a subdial. The backcase has an exhibition window to show off the movement under a MSTR lens.

The design of any true racecar must also be functional. The Speedster also has 10 ATM of water resistance, 45 hours of power, luminescent hands, and a quick-release two-button butterfly clasp. It features an additional 24-hour subdial clock.  

The Speedster will be available in Rose Gold, Silver, or Black.

 

 

 

Featuring Ben Chung & Mike Song of the Kinjaz and US Olympic medalist Will Claye. Each person got the chance to try on our newest samples and give their thoughts. 

 

 

 

 

Selecting a movement was tough, the goal of this project is to design a great looking automatic watches at an affordable price. After much research, we found 21-jewel Japanese Miyota movements that met our needs for quality and price.

  

 

 

Packaging

 

 

 

Mission

It will always be about inspiration and influence. We’re passionate about creating products that envelope the concepts of leadership. Our goal is to make the wearers of our products feel confident about their style and to perpetually strive for greatness. We want people to conceive the idea of being positive leaders that inspire and influence.

As Meisters we realize our responsibility…  Through our passion we will cultivate leaders; turn Prodigys to Icons, our work is never done. MSTR exists to provide validation to the individuals of each generation who are deemed “influencers.” We aspire to inspire, one accessory at a time.

Meister

“Meister” is a translation from the German word for  “Master” - who is a revered leader and artisan qualified to teach others. A Meister is known as a superior taste maker who inspires others and paves the path into the future. This timepiece series was created to push the boundaries of contemporary fashion without compromising traditional craftsmanship. Meister watches feature multi-pieced designs that blend various materials such as carbon fiber, stainless steel, and an assortment of rare leathers into a bold collection of functional timepieces.

 

Meister (MSTR) is an independently owned and operated company based out of Los Angeles, California that was founded in June 2009 by Kingson Tse & Ryan Pietersz.  Being fashion connoisseurs themselves, they realized the absence of a designer accessory brand that offers quality watches at an affordable price.  With the growing number of fashion conscious consumers in mind, MSTR was created to fill that void. Although headquartered in Southern California, MSTR’s designs reflect styles found from all around the world. Kingson and Ryan have been fortunate enough to travel to various global destinations that have inspired them to create unique timepieces that showcase the world’s taste in wrist fashion. They understood that building a successful brand does not happen overnight and although many unforeseen factors came into play that hindered their growth, they knew that with dedication, integrity, and passion - success would follow.

 

Actual satisfied customer reviews from our web store at www.mstrwatches.com

 

 

MSTR has been featured in:

 

 

 

 

All US orders will be shipped free via Fedex SmartPost (2-8 days).

Early Bird international orders will be shipped free via Fedex International economy (2-4 days).  All other international orders will required $10 for shipping. 

If you would like to upgrade or make any changes to shipping you can lets us know when you get your confirmation email. Processing time will be 1-2 business days.

Customs fees & duties:

All watches will be shipping from the US and any shipment outside of the US may be subject to Customs fees or taxes based on each country's tax regulations.The fee will be charged to you by the shipping company (FedEx, UPS, Postal Service, etc.). Sometimes these fees will be charged to you at the time you receive the items. Sometimes these fees will be charged to you at a later time and mailed to you from the shipping company for payment. You are 100% responsible for these fees at the time you are billed.

Supply Chain & Delivery

Through our 7 years of experience and relationships with the watchmaking factory, we will be able to deliver your watch quicker than most campaigns on Kickstarter. Total estimated time will only be about 30-90 days! We have already purchased the first batch of watch cases and movements for early birds, so they will be ready to deliver in 30 days! We will being shipping as early as November for Early birds. The second delivery will be around December. Everyone that missed out on the early bird special will still get delivery just in time for the holidays! 

1st delivery - Mid November (early birds) 

2nd Delivery - Mid December 

 

 

 

Help us by sharing our watches and campaign on social media. 

 

You can find high resolution images for personal use and sharing through media resources at our Flickr page.

 

Press-related contact: info@meisterwatches.com

 

Since the launch of the company we have partnered up with some of the most iconic figures in sports, music, and pop culture to collaboratively design timepieces that are all made in limited quantities. MSTR focuses on working with only the most recognized individuals in their respective fields to demonstrate what being a Meister entails.

Lexus LFA - Limited Edition

 Bruce Lee - Limited Edition

Street Fighter - Limited Edition

Battlefield - Limited Edition

 

 

We are pledging to donate 1% of all funds raised to “Hunger 2 Help,” a non-profit organization that helps the homeless with hot meals, water, and other much needed supplies. They are based out of San Diego, California and have served over 200,000 meals. Everyone is treated with dignity and respect, and 100% of donations go towards the homeless. We have personally volunteered with this organization and would love to donate and continue to contribute to their cause.

 

FAQ

After Purchase

Once our campaign has ended you will receive a backer kit in the email.  The backer kit will allow you to choose what options you want and where you want to ship. You will have the option to add items as well.  For all early bird purchases we will begin shipping immediately after our campaign has ended. 

IndieGoGo

  • Why Indiegogo?
    • Indiegogo allows us to help start this project by pre selling the goods before they come in.  We don't have the ability to do so on our current e-commerce platform.
  • Is it safe?
    • Indiegogo is a 100% safe and been funding since 2008.  They have now raised over 950million in funding projects.  All of the payments go through secured payment gateways via Paypal or a credit merchant.  Your perk can be cancelled if you wish, so shop worry free!
  • Shipping 
    • Shipping is garunteed via Fedex, if anything goes wrong all packages are insured and covered. You will receive your tracking number as soon your item is shipped via the email you signed up with.  Please make sure to check your email account you signed up with when setting up your Indiegogo account.  They will be replaced asap if lost or stolen, once fedex has approved the claim.

MSTR

  • What is the return policy?
    • We will give you money back if your not 100% satisfied with your watch.  However you must request a return authorization (RMA) through our website or email within 7 days of receiving your watch.  The watch must be in new condition, unworn, and no damage!
  • What does the warranty cover
    • Duration
      • 3 year limited* warranty which covers the watch movement, nothing cosmetic
    • Is it water resistant?
      • Yes, both models are water resistant up too 100 meters or 10 ATM.
    • Is the coating covered?
      • The coating is covered for 3 years from tarnishing on it own.  We will not cover any scratches and self inflicted damage. 

Contact us if you have any questions at igg@meisterwatches.com or call us M-F 10AM - 5PM PST 909-599-8899 for any immediate assistance with your indiegogo purchase.
