story:
The Gyre SeaCleaner is the world's first sports watch made out of recycled ghost fishing nets, recovered from the Indian Ocean. We're a new Dutch watch brand focusing on great products with a sustainable heart.

In May we started our crowdfunding campaign and successfully funded our Gyre SeaCleaner on Kickstarter. A tremendous rush and it was very fulfilling to see the project being brought to life by almost 300 backers. After that we kept receiving many requests to pre-order the watch and also repeatedly got the question of when we would add a blue color option. We are now in production for the first edition and want to use Indiegogo InDemand to keep accepting these pre-orders and also offer the blue version of the Gyre SeaCleaner in a limited edition.

We see it as a perfect step before we launch our webshop. As you can see, the watch is production ready. Actually it is in production already and have been covered extensively in the media, which you can see below. We're very proud of that and hope you will part of our mission to raise awareness and battle the problem of plastic waste in our oceans and on our coastlines.

● Dutch sports watch made out of recycled fishing nets from the ocean.

● Own design - from case to dial - 42mm with sapphire glass and solar powered movement.

● Every watch sold supports local fishermen and 5% of our turnover will be donated to The Ocean Cleanup foundation.*

● Creating a community that commits itself to cleaning the oceans and keeping them  clean, one watch at a time.

● GYRE - ˈjī(-ə)r’ - A circular or spiral motion or form / a giant circular oceanic surface current.  

*We are not affiliated with The Ocean Cleanup. The foundation is one of our inspirations and stands for what we want to achieve. So we chose them to contribute to with a donation of a percentage of our sales. After the Indiegogo campaign we will communicate to all of our backers when we made the donation and the exact amount.

Although all kinds of plastic are found in the world’s oceans, fishing nets are the biggest concern. A recent survey done by The Ocean Cleanup, states that at least 46 percent of the plastic found in the ‘Great Pacific Garbage Patch’ - a floating plastic gyre the size of France, Germany and Spain combined - comes from fishing nets.  A massive 640.000 tonnes of these ‘ghost fishing nets’ are left in the seas every year. This adds greatly to the pollution, but also damages coral reefs and traps vast numbers of sea creatures.

We started Gyre to protect a place that is dear to us: the Ocean. Three years ago the raising concern about ocean plastic triggered us to do something. The project started in a cafe in the Dutch coastal city of The Hague. What to do and how? Our combined interest in watches made our contribution an easy choice; a watch made out of recycled ocean plastic.

But where to start? Working in the media and writing about watches we knew the watch industry like the back of our hand. Making a good watch - without losing sight of sustainability and innovation - proved to be a hefty challenge. We persevered and almost three years and countless challenging moments later we are ready to make a change and hope you will join us as ambassadors for a clean ocean. 

We're extremely proud to present to you the Gyre SeaCleaner. A watch that started as a wild idea. A worthwhile contribution for good and of course - great to wear. In addition to using the recycled plastic and making a great watch out of it, another important pillar is raising awareness. We will aim to do this through supporting events and programs that will battle the problem at its core.  An example will be that 5% of our turnover will go towards The Ocean Cleanup*. We aim to contribute to their mission in the Great Pacific Garbage Patch and their work in our rivers. 

A sustainable and eco-friendly product does not have to lose out on style and comfort. Together with our French designer Serge Cosenza, our goal was to make the watch sustainable and stylish. Our assembly will take place in The Netherlands, by highly experienced watchmakers with years of experience.

With Indiegogo InDemand we offer the original SeaCleaner watch with green color accents on either an all black or black with green stripe recycled NATO-strap. And also the blue SeaCleaner on either an all black or black with blue stripe recycled NATO-strap. The strap is completely made out of recycled PET bottles.

To keep it ‘green’, Gyre sticks with a 42mm black case. As this is the original color of the recycled material and the only possible way to make everything as sustainable as possible. We want to be 100% transparent and do not want to make anything better than it seems.

The case - Local fishermen collect the ghost nets from the sea and deliver it to our recycler. For this they receive a fee, so we also contribute to the local economy. The nets are then cleaned and made into pellets. Those pellets are used in a mold for the 42mm case with a height of only 11.5mm (including the glass). With a 316L stainless steel case back for comfortable wear and protection.

The strap - We are currently working on the last steps to produce a strap made out of fishing nets. The same material as the case. The strap is currently being made entirely out of recycled plastic bottles. Non-toxic dyes are used.

The movement - A high quality Japanese solar movement, so you won’t have to worry about wasting batteries or getting it serviced. Make sure the dial gets three hours of sun and you are good for six months of power without recharging. 

Water Resistance - The watch is water resistant up to 100 meters or 10 bar. So you can wear it in water, free of care.

The Glass - A high quality anti-reflective scratch-proof sapphire crystal.

Luminous Material - For the hands and the 12, 3, 6 and 9 indices we use high-quality Super-LumiNova. So you can tell the time under any light condition.

Design - Our designer Serge Cosenza designed a streamlined and elegant case. One with a style that harkens back to the heyday of French explorer and marine biologist Jacques Cousteau and the dive watches of the Seventies. 

Packaging - It doesn’t end with the watch. Our packaging is entirely made out of recycled material and is FSC-certified. 

Our name ‘Gyre’ comes from the five major gyres, which are large systems of rotating ocean currents. The oceans churn up various types of currents. Together, these larger and more permanent currents make up the systems of currents known as gyres. There are five major gyres: the North and South Pacific subtropical gyres, the North and South Atlantic subtropical gyres, and the Indian Ocean subtropical gyre. 

Nowadays the term gyre is used to refer to the collections of plastic waste and other debris found in high concentrations in certain parts of these gyres. 

We are here to stay. So if you want to buy the successor to the SeaCleaner and you can't find a good home for your former Gyre watch, we are working on a solution to 'recycle the recycled'.

To make sure each Gyre watch will be recycled properly and doesn’t end up as waste. Our goal is to offer you the chance to send us your old watch (if registered beforehand) and we’ll make sure every piece will be used in one of our future products. As a ‘thank you’ we’ll give you a discount on your next watch and an honorable mention on our website. 

Picking a color

But first things first. With Indiegogo InDemand we offer the original SeaCleaner watch with green color accents on either an all black or black with green stripe recycled NATO-strap. The strap is completely made out of recycled PET bottles. We now also offer the blue version on either a black or black with blue stripe NATO-strap.

 

Risks and challenges

We’ve chosen our suppliers for their trustworthy delivery worldwide. However, in manufacturing and taking current events into consideration, there's always a risk of delay. As of now, everything is up and running and all of our manufacturers are working on a timely delivery despite the current COVID-19 crisis.

We have added a buffer to minimize the risk and your disappointment in getting the Gyre SeaCleaner later than expected. We will also be in constant contact with our manufacturer and assembler to ensure a timely delivery. We'll keep you up-to-date with our progress and let you know if there are any delays.

Because communicating with our backers is paramount, we will always make sure the communication is transparant. We made sure the estimated delivery time is as quick as possible, whilst still being realistic.

Recycling process risks: Low. Our recycler has decades long experience in the process or recycling materials and making top quality. The recycling process has been extensively tested and perfected. Risks are low and we are confident in the quality of the thoroughly tested material and its qualities.

Assembly risks: Low. Our assembler in The Netherlands has watchmakers with extensive knowledge of quartz and mechanical watches. They work in a dust free and professional environment to ensure the best build quality available.

Shipping risks: Low. We chose a delivery date of October to allow some breathing room for possible delays at customs. A chance of this happening is always possible when first importing a product into a country. But whatever the risks, we'll get through it together. We take our backers and open communication very serious and we promise to keep you in the loop every step of the way. Through updates, photos and videos, so you'll be part of the entire process.

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design - The Gyre SeaCleaner is made to last with top quality recycled material and we prevented the need to change batteries by using a high-quality solar movement.

Reusability and recyclability - Zero-waste packaging and we're working on a program to take in your old Gyre and recycle the material and parts in new models. For which you'll get a discount.

Sustainable materials - Recycled fishing nets from the ocean for the case and strap. As well as a solar powered movement, so no need for batteries.

Environmentally friendly factories - Non-toxic dyes for fabrics and an ethical workforce.

Sustainable Distribution - Zero-waste shipping and no single use plastics

Something else - We aim to be as sustainable as possible. From the material of our watches up until the use of the most sustainable and social conscious bank in The Netherlands for our banking. In addition we will always be on the lookout for any new ways to improve our sustainable practices.
story_txt: The Gyre SeaCleaner is the world's first sports watch made out of recycled ghost fishing nets, recovered from the Indian Ocean. We're a new Dutch watch brand focusing on great products with a sustainable heart.In May we started our crowdfunding campaign and successfully funded our Gyre SeaCleaner on Kickstarter. A tremendous rush and it was very fulfilling to see the project being brought to life by almost 300 backers. After that we kept receiving many requests to pre-order the watch and also repeatedly got the question of when we would add a blue color option. We are now in production for the first edition and want to use Indiegogo InDemand to keep accepting these pre-orders and also offer the blue version of the Gyre SeaCleaner in a limited edition.We see it as a perfect step before we launch our webshop. As you can see, the watch is production ready. Actually it is in production already and have been covered extensively in the media, which you can see below. We're very proud of that and hope you will part of our mission to raise awareness and battle the problem of plastic waste in our oceans and on our coastlines.● Dutch sports watch made out of recycled fishing nets from the ocean.● Own design - from case to dial - 42mm with sapphire glass and solar powered movement.● Every watch sold supports local fishermen and 5% of our turnover will be donated to The Ocean Cleanup foundation.*● Creating a community that commits itself to cleaning the oceans and keeping them  clean, one watch at a time.● GYRE - ˈjī(-ə)r’ - A circular or spiral motion or form / a giant circular oceanic surface current.  *We are not affiliated with The Ocean Cleanup. The foundation is one of our inspirations and stands for what we want to achieve. So we chose them to contribute to with a donation of a percentage of our sales. After the Indiegogo campaign we will communicate to all of our backers when we made the donation and the exact amount.Although all kinds of plastic are found in the world’s oceans, fishing nets are the biggest concern. A recent survey done by The Ocean Cleanup, states that at least 46 percent of the plastic found in the ‘Great Pacific Garbage Patch’ - a floating plastic gyre the size of France, Germany and Spain combined - comes from fishing nets.  A massive 640.000 tonnes of these ‘ghost fishing nets’ are left in the seas every year. This adds greatly to the pollution, but also damages coral reefs and traps vast numbers of sea creatures.We started Gyre to protect a place that is dear to us: the Ocean. Three years ago the raising concern about ocean plastic triggered us to do something. The project started in a cafe in the Dutch coastal city of The Hague. What to do and how? Our combined interest in watches made our contribution an easy choice; a watch made out of recycled ocean plastic.But where to start? Working in the media and writing about watches we knew the watch industry like the back of our hand. Making a good watch - without losing sight of sustainability and innovation - proved to be a hefty challenge. We persevered and almost three years and countless challenging moments later we are ready to make a change and hope you will join us as ambassadors for a clean ocean. We're extremely proud to present to you the Gyre SeaCleaner. A watch that started as a wild idea. A worthwhile contribution for good and of course - great to wear. In addition to using the recycled plastic and making a great watch out of it, another important pillar is raising awareness. We will aim to do this through supporting events and programs that will battle the problem at its core.  An example will be that 5% of our turnover will go towards The Ocean Cleanup*. We aim to contribute to their mission in the Great Pacific Garbage Patch and their work in our rivers. A sustainable and eco-friendly product does not have to lose out on style and comfort. Together with our French designer Serge Cosenza, our goal was to make the watch sustainable and stylish. Our assembly will take place in The Netherlands, by highly experienced watchmakers with years of experience.With Indiegogo InDemand we offer the original SeaCleaner watch with green color accents on either an all black or black with green stripe recycled NATO-strap. And also the blue SeaCleaner on either an all black or black with blue stripe recycled NATO-strap. The strap is completely made out of recycled PET bottles.To keep it ‘green’, Gyre sticks with a 42mm black case. As this is the original color of the recycled material and the only possible way to make everything as sustainable as possible. We want to be 100% transparent and do not want to make anything better than it seems.The case - Local fishermen collect the ghost nets from the sea and deliver it to our recycler. For this they receive a fee, so we also contribute to the local economy. The nets are then cleaned and made into pellets. Those pellets are used in a mold for the 42mm case with a height of only 11.5mm (including the glass). With a 316L stainless steel case back for comfortable wear and protection.The strap - We are currently working on the last steps to produce a strap made out of fishing nets. The same material as the case. The strap is currently being made entirely out of recycled plastic bottles. Non-toxic dyes are used.The movement - A high quality Japanese solar movement, so you won’t have to worry about wasting batteries or getting it serviced. Make sure the dial gets three hours of sun and you are good for six months of power without recharging. Water Resistance - The watch is water resistant up to 100 meters or 10 bar. So you can wear it in water, free of care.The Glass - A high quality anti-reflective scratch-proof sapphire crystal.Luminous Material - For the hands and the 12, 3, 6 and 9 indices we use high-quality Super-LumiNova. So you can tell the time under any light condition.Design - Our designer Serge Cosenza designed a streamlined and elegant case. One with a style that harkens back to the heyday of French explorer and marine biologist Jacques Cousteau and the dive watches of the Seventies. Packaging - It doesn’t end with the watch. Our packaging is entirely made out of recycled material and is FSC-certified. Our name ‘Gyre’ comes from the five major gyres, which are large systems of rotating ocean currents. The oceans churn up various types of currents. Together, these larger and more permanent currents make up the systems of currents known as gyres. There are five major gyres: the North and South Pacific subtropical gyres, the North and South Atlantic subtropical gyres, and the Indian Ocean subtropical gyre. Nowadays the term gyre is used to refer to the collections of plastic waste and other debris found in high concentrations in certain parts of these gyres. We are here to stay. So if you want to buy the successor to the SeaCleaner and you can't find a good home for your former Gyre watch, we are working on a solution to 'recycle the recycled'.To make sure each Gyre watch will be recycled properly and doesn’t end up as waste. Our goal is to offer you the chance to send us your old watch (if registered beforehand) and we’ll make sure every piece will be used in one of our future products. As a ‘thank you’ we’ll give you a discount on your next watch and an honorable mention on our website. Picking a colorBut first things first. With Indiegogo InDemand we offer the original SeaCleaner watch with green color accents on either an all black or black with green stripe recycled NATO-strap. The strap is completely made out of recycled PET bottles. We now also offer the blue version on either a black or black with blue stripe NATO-strap. Risks and challengesWe’ve chosen our suppliers for their trustworthy delivery worldwide. However, in manufacturing and taking current events into consideration, there's always a risk of delay. As of now, everything is up and running and all of our manufacturers are working on a timely delivery despite the current COVID-19 crisis.We have added a buffer to minimize the risk and your disappointment in getting the Gyre SeaCleaner later than expected. We will also be in constant contact with our manufacturer and assembler to ensure a timely delivery. We'll keep you up-to-date with our progress and let you know if there are any delays.Because communicating with our backers is paramount, we will always make sure the communication is transparant. We made sure the estimated delivery time is as quick as possible, whilst still being realistic.Recycling process risks: Low. Our recycler has decades long experience in the process or recycling materials and making top quality. The recycling process has been extensively tested and perfected. Risks are low and we are confident in the quality of the thoroughly tested material and its qualities.Assembly risks: Low. Our assembler in The Netherlands has watchmakers with extensive knowledge of quartz and mechanical watches. They work in a dust free and professional environment to ensure the best build quality available.Shipping risks: Low. We chose a delivery date of October to allow some breathing room for possible delays at customs. A chance of this happening is always possible when first importing a product into a country. But whatever the risks, we'll get through it together. We take our backers and open communication very serious and we promise to keep you in the loop every step of the way. Through updates, photos and videos, so you'll be part of the entire process.Environmental commitmentsLong-lasting design - The Gyre SeaCleaner is made to last with top quality recycled material and we prevented the need to change batteries by using a high-quality solar movement.Reusability and recyclability - Zero-waste packaging and we're working on a program to take in your old Gyre and recycle the material and parts in new models. For which you'll get a discount.Sustainable materials - Recycled fishing nets from the ocean for the case and strap. As well as a solar powered movement, so no need for batteries.Environmentally friendly factories - Non-toxic dyes for fabrics and an ethical workforce.Sustainable Distribution - Zero-waste shipping and no single use plasticsSomething else - We aim to be as sustainable as possible. From the material of our watches up until the use of the most sustainable and social conscious bank in The Netherlands for our banking. In addition we will always be on the lookout for any new ways to improve our sustainable practices.

story:
This is New School Solar and the 

The Affordable Power Panel.

This innovative mounting system reduces PV Solar Panel installation cost by 75%. 

It is lightweight, more safe, easy to install, guaranteed not to leak and gives a quicker Return on Investment ( ROI ).

       

Do-it-Yourself? ( For Some people ) 

 Plug & Play? ( Almost )

This is an innovative Mounting System to attach Flexible Thin Film Laminate PV Solar Modules to asphalt shingle roofs, as found on 85% of Americas homes and businesses.

The Affordable Power Panel is an easy to install, durable, lightweight, less expensive, leak free way to install photovoltaic power to your asphalt shingle roof in Affordable Increments. 

Flexible thin film " Peal & Stick " PhotoVoltaic Modules as invented and developed Stanford Ovshinsky in the 1970's have recently made significant gains in overall efficiency making it now watt for watt competitive with crystalline silicone solar modules. 



Two things had to happen in order to make Flexible Thin Film PV Modules feasible for application to residential and commercial asphalt shingle roofs.

FIRST:  Efficiency levels had to reach parity with polycrystalline silicone modules. Residential roof space facing the correct direction is important and limited. The watt density / sq. foot for flexible thin film modules had to catch up to that of the silicone modules currently in use.   THEY RECENTLY HAVE!

SECOND:  A way had to be developed to mount the laminate backing of a flexible thin film module to the rough, irregular, granulated surface of an asphalt shingle roof.         WE JUST DID! 



Crystalline Silicone PV Modules have glass surfaces, are framed in metal, & attached to metal racks. All adding to the array weight, making structural engineering reports and sometimes structural improvements necessary.


Flexible Thin Film Laminated PV Modules are durable ( no glass to break ), have superior hail impact resistance, are light weight, & easily applied to flat, smooth surfaces.


Installing Flexible Thin Film Laminated PV Modules to the flat, smooth surfaced portion of this Standing Seam Metal Roof.



Flexible Thin Film Laminated PV Module being applied to the flat, smooth surfaced, TPO Single Ply Roofing Material. 


Due to FM I-90 Requirements, installing a Flexible Thin Film Laminated PV Module to the irregular, granulated surface of this asphalt shingle roof, is not permissible.


1. MATCHING EFFICIENCY  LEVELS: The table below indicates that the efficiency level of CIGS Flexible Thin Film PV Solar Modules have finally caught up to that of polycrystalline Silicone PV Modules.  source: Photovoltaic Systems, James Dunlop, third edition.

2. NEW RACKING / INSTALLATION OPTIONS: Most people would be surprised to learn that at least 25% of the equipment cost and 75% of the labor cost of rooftop installed solar kits go's into the racking system that hold the solar panels to the the roof. This technology hasn't changed much in 50 years. This process of mounting bolts through the roof surface, rails to hold the panels and wiring plus grounding systems are time consuming, (600 volt DC) dangerous and expensive.


 These are two demonstration / sample panels. Actual panels to be from 7.5 - 20 feet long.

THE PANEL: 24 gauge, KYNAR Coated Steel Coil (.957 lbs. / sq. foot ) similar to whats used on high end standing seam metal roof systems. As an option for more weight sensitive applications, a .032 mil Aluminum Coil stock (.432 lbs. / sq. foot ) is available, also factory coated with KYNAR. The total panel weight is less than 1 lb. / sq. ft. ( + / - 5% ) when using aluminum. That's less than half the weight of a second asphalt roof layer and two layers of asphalt roofing are allowed by every municipal building code in the country. Therefore no structural engineering report or structural improvements will be needed to install this system. Reducing soft cost even more.

Our patent pending design applies specifically to the mounting system, however The Affordable Power Panel combines all the technologies referenced below into one, easy to install, inexpensive, lightweight, horizontally interlocking, expandable roof solar system that most anyone can install. Then call an electrician to wire it up if you need too. It's now possible to start with a single panel, at an affordable price and easily grow into the system you eventually want. Let the first panel buy the second panel and so on.

Each panel has an identical profile:

First Picture:  Shows two separate panels. First the starter strip shown at the lower left is mechanically attached the the roof rafter through the roof and roof decking. The lower edge of the bottom panel locks into the starter strip securing it to the roof. The starter strip and the deck screws are now out-of-sight and water tight. The fastener slot at the top of the panel is now secured to the rafter, through the roof.

Second Picture:  Shows the second panel locked into the first now covering the screws of the first panel making them watertight. The second panel is then fastened to the roof. The installation continues in this manner to the last panel. All screws are covered and watertight. 

Third Picture:  The screws of the last panel are covered with the head flashing that clips to the top lock. The head flashing is flashed to the roof using standard roofing practices as shown in the installation manual. The microinverters and electrical lines on the left are shielded with a raceway cover. There are no exposed fasteners, This system will not leak! 

Capturing the Flexible Thin Film Advantage

  • Reduced cost with roll-2-roll, high volume manufacturing process.
  • Durable - no glass to shatter. Better hail impact resistance.
  • Lightweight - No structural roof reinforcement required.
  • Easily integrated with roofing material. PV array removal is not required when re-roofing.
  • Superior performance in high heat, rooftop conditions.
  • Superior performance in low light conditions.
  • Can be installed on multiple slopes facing multiple directions. This will open up more roof space for energy production.
  • Low Embodied Energy Cost. Quicker payback, less upfront expense.
  • Superior Full Spectrum Performance.

 Superior Full Spectrum Performance in High Heat and in Low Light Conditions.

Flexible Thin Film Laminate modules have up to 20% better performance on a hot roof environment and up to 12% better performance in Low and Diffuse Light conditions when compared to equally rated Crystalline Silicone Panels. Bird droppings, leaves, water puddling and dirt can shade parts of a PV panel. Shading just 3% of a Crystalline Silicone Panel can reduce output by more than 50 %. With Flexible Thin Film Panels that same 3 % shading, reduces output by only 3 % due to their built-in Bypass Diodes.

Crystalline Silicone Rooftop PV Modules

  • Glass modules can break and are heavy.
  • High Cost per square foot.
  • Racks and roof flashing's are expensive, heavy and prone to roof leaks.
  • Electrical cable and conduit are exposed.
  • Modules detract from building appearance.
  • Due to excessive weight of modules and racks, engineering reports are required and structural support improvements to the roof may be necessary.
  • Your asphalt roof will wear out before your PV modules do. Has PV array removal and replacement cost been factored into current cost.
  • Have your String Inverter replacement cost been factored in. They will need to be replaced every 10 - 15 years.

The Next Major Breakthrough in PhotoVoltaic Power is that of the MICRO-INVERTER

Micro-Inverters are great for Affordability and Efficiency

Inverters are an essential piece of a solar power system. An inverter takes the power that comes from the panels, which is direct current ( DC ) and changes it to alternating current ( AC ). AC is what we have in the outlets in our homes and at work. String inverters are large, expensive and inefficient. Just a little shading of just one part, of just one module can severely compromise the performance of the whole array system. They generate large amounts of heat and have a short life span as evidenced by typical warranty period of just 5 years. They also require high-voltage DC wiring which is dangerous when damaged or installed improperly. Micro-Inverters use low voltage AC wiring and significantly reduce the risk of fire or injury. 



Micro-Inverters have changed everything. 

Instead of modules being wired together to create high voltage DC that is sent to an inverter near your main service panel, now each PV Module can be equipped with it's own micro-inverter. The power is converted to 240 volts AC right at the module. This makes the system more efficient and the solar system design more flexible.

With micro-inverters, modules of different ratings can be tied together and they can now be installed on different slopes of different irradiance levels with out having to buy another expensive string inverter. Micro-Inverters also eliminate module mismatch losses and improve system uptime. If one micro-inverter fails you lose the performance of only one module, not the entire string performance. 

The AC wiring from the micro-inverters can be connected in parallel for up to 15 units. They plug into each other like extension cords, they are then fed into the buildings main load center where it back-feeds a 30 amp breaker. A micro-inverter system is real simple to install, it's pretty much " Plug & Play ". MIcro-inverters also eliminate the need for other balance-of-system components and lengthy installation times by a DC Certified Electrician. Again, saving money.

You can't EXPECT, from what you can't INSPECT.

With this new technology, each micro-inverter can report it's performance to a Communications Gateway via the AC wiring and your internet router. The gateway then sends the data to the website to track the performance of each panel / micro-inverter pair. You are able to view this performance data from any where, on any PC, Tablet or Smartphone. Long gone are the days of " false performance promises ".

YOU / WE Can: 

  • Verify system health and performance at a glance.
  • View energy production by month, day or hour.
  • Analyze Performance against historical weather data.
  • Share System Performance with friends on Facebook, Twitter...
  • Compare the performance of your CIGS - Flexible Thin Film PV Module Array System to that of their antiquated crystalline silicone system.

Another Game Changer, Solar "SOFT COST"

According to the National Renewable Energy Laboratory ( NREL ) Solar Soft Cost account for up to approximately half of the total installed cost of a Residential PV Solar System. THESE COST INCLUDE:

1. CUSTOMER ACQUISITION

  • Marketing / Advertising
  • Sales Calls / Site Visit
  • Bid Preparation / Phantom Bids
  • Follow Up
  • Signing Contract / Collecting Payment

2. FINANCING and CONTRACTING

  • Financing ( Capital Expenses )
  • Insurance
  • Legal Agreements ( RFP's, PPA's, etc. )
  • Incentive Application Processing

3. PERMITTING, INSPECTION and INTERCONNECTION

  • Wait Time for Permits, Inspections and Interconnections
  • Permitting Expenses
  • Utility Interconnection Expenses
  • Idle Crew's and Trucks

4. INSTALLATION and PERFORMANCE

  • Service ( Operations & Maintenance )
  • Installation Labor
  • Optimal System Design

AmEnergy Plus uses web based engineering companies that design PhotoVoltaic Systems in the Cloud, collaborating with engineers from around the country. This reduces the cost of in-house solar designers and engineers. They perform all the hard-core engineering so homeowners or installers can get permit approvals for the build. NOT ELIMINATING Soft Cost, but making a serious dent.

WHAT'S AVAILABLE

1. FEASIBILITY STUDY - A Feasibility Study is the first step in your Renewable Energy Project. Using geographical ( GPS ) we can advise you as to the locations potential energy production. Starting with remote reconnaissance we are able to access your location for the optimal size or renewable energy equipment. We also identify critical design constraints or issues. We analyze the location factoring in site variables and present it in an easy to read fashion. FEATURES INCLUDE - Virtual areal reconnaissance, system layout overlay, tilt factor, orientation, system size, module count, vicinity map and shade analysis.

2. CONCEPT DESIGN - A Concept Design demonstrates the proposed Green Energy Technology and is used to specify the best application and identify the optimal system performance and configuration. This document is used as a visual tool that serves as a basis to compare several design iterations or applications selections. It can also be used to develop a bill of materials to estimate a projects cost. FEATURES INCLUDE - System size, vicinity map, customer information , equipment locations, project plan, array dimensions, basic single line diagram, basic bill of materials, source circuit design, inverter configuration, utility  interconnection strategy, utility interconnection application. If required we have a drone reconnaissance service available for satellite inaccessible information.

3. FINANCIAL ANALYSIS - Determine the ROI for your alternative energy project with our Financial Analysis Tool. Regardless of the size of your photovoltaic project, a Financial Analysis from AmEnergy Plus is a fast, cost effective and comprehensive financial tool. It can model, organize and report the critical data required to make decisions regarding your photovoltaic project. Our financial analysis can model PPA's, 3rd party leases, dept & tax equity financing and private group funding as well. It is custom made to fit your project, location and financing model. The financial analysis is intended as an information guide for decision makers ( owners, builders, contractors, investors ) to map out a financial plan for the project. FEATURES INCLUDED - Utility bill analysis, production estimates, incentive modeling, tax & depreciation, return-on-investment ( ROI ), internal rate of return ( IRR ), payback year, annualized cash flows, net present value ( NPV ), environmental impact, levelized cost of energy ( LCOE ), total cost of ownership ( TCO ). A CPA review is available at an additional charge.

4. PERMIT PACKAGE - Is a set of drawings and calculations of the designed system used to apply for a building permit. The blueprints are code compliant and can be reviewed by and wet-stamped by an engineer. Our packages have a 99% success rate at passing plan review the first time. FEATURES INCLUDED- Site plan, equipment locations, project plan and details, bill of materials, structural calculations and annotations, system marking placard templates, interconnection details, wire schedule, conduit schedule and system voltage drop. A PE stamp is available at an additional charge.

What we have achieved and have available NOW, is described and defined in the two articles below.

CLIMATEPROGRESS, July 24, 2013 - The Future of Solar Power... by Bryan Lewis.

http://thinkprogress.org/climate/2013/07/24/2345511/the-future-of-us-solar-power-opportunities-in-soft-cost/

Also, in Forbes Magazine Peter Detwiler wrote: Plug-And-Play Residential Solar In Five Years? Fraunhofer USA And Partners Are Working To Make This A Reality.  

http://www.forbes.com/sites/peterdetwiler/2013/08/07/plug-and-play-residential-solar-in-five-years-fraunhofer-usa-and-partners-are-working-to-make-this-a-reality/


CROWD FUNDING

We are seeking your help to buy the necessary equipment to set up a light manufacturing facility to assemble the Affordable Power Panel. Our major expense will be for the roll forming machine. This machine is similar to a steel siding roll forming machine, only it will bend a heavier gauge metal to the shape shown in the CAD drawing below.

Our machine will look like this. Approximate dimensions are W. 33.5" X H. 45" X L. 138". To be manufactured by Eastside Machine Co. Inc. of Fargo, ND.

This panel is unique. Drawn to our patent pending design and specifications. The design and fabrication of most all the components of this machine are unique to this machine, most everything begins from scratch. We have specified to the manufacturer that the rollers of this machine be adjustable so the panel width can be adjusted to conform to the various width's that the Thin Film Module suppliers provide to us ( 15.5" - 20.5" ).

CAD representation of our patent pending panel.

Panel lengths are field adjusted with a multi-profile guillotine, cut-on-the-fly system, to accommodate the lengths of multiple wattage modules to be available. This machine has the capacity to produce six ( 6 ), ten foot panels per minute. 

Since shade tolerance of flexible thin film modules are not as dependent on the use of micro-inverters ( due to their built in by-pass diodes ), we will specify to our micro-inverter suppliers to build units that connect 2 & 3 panels together. This will further reduce system cost.

Our goal is to raise $ 193,000.00. With this funding we will be able to:

  • Acquire costume roll forming machinery and necessary support equipment.
  • Acquire initial inventory of flexible thin film modules made to our specifications to maximize Power Density.
  • Acquire initial inventory of micro-inverters.
  • Initial order of 140,000 lbs. of .032 mil aluminum coil stock. Initially only aluminum will be available & in brown only.
  • Build a working 4-5 kW. prototype system, for instructional photographs and instructional videos.
  • Further develop marketing and distribution strategies.
This all requires minimum orders and up front cash commitments to our suppliers.

STRETCH GOAL

Initially production will be in St. Louis, Mo. STL being centrally located with access to rail, river barge, trucking, and air freight, forms of transportation, I believe is an ideal location. We have patent pending ( patent information available upon request ) status on a unique product with in an industry that experienced $ 19 BILLION in sales last year alone. The more money we have available to invest in good people, good policy and the skills to communicate that policy, the faster we become successful.

RISK and CHALLENGES

The Affordable Power Panel is a Mounting Platform for equipment that has already been developed, manufactured and guaranteed by others. Others with research and development departments within their organizations and with the backing of Multinational Corporations. We have just devised a way to get their product off a shelf and on to an asphalt shingle roof, carport, awning, patio cover, ground mounted rack, saw-toothed building facades... where it can be productive and beneficial. Flexible Thin Film PV Modules are classified as a Building Integrated Photo Voltaic ( BIPV ) product. With our mounting system added into the mix we have somewhat of a hybrid system. We look forward to getting feedback from designers and installers or anyone with additional ideas on how to...

PRODUCTION & SHIPPING - I don't foresee any insurmountable production problems. We are attaching a flexible thin film laminate ( roofing type ) material and a micro-inverter ( that already have national and international code approvals ) to a metal panel that nearly replicates a standing seam metal roof system ( as used in various forms for the past 800 years ) and we shifted it's orientation by 90 degrees to stabilize module laminate migration. Shipping cost are somewhat a restricting factor until quantities warrant different options.

This is a Service Connected Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business. Veterans are welcome here. 

Thanks to everyone for your time and consideration. We can't do it with out YOU.


This product proudly made in the USA

First Picture:  Shows two separate panels. First the starter strip shown at the lower left is mechanically attached the the roof rafter through the roof and roof decking. The lower edge of the bottom panel locks into the starter strip securing it to the roof. The starter strip and the deck screws are now out-of-sight and water tight. The fastener slot at the top of the panel is now secured to the rafter, through the roof.
Second Picture:  Shows the second panel locked into the first now covering the screws of the first panel making them watertight. The second panel is then fastened to the roof. The installation continues in this manner to the last panel. All screws are covered and watertight. 
Third Picture:  The screws of the last panel are covered with the head flashing that clips to the top lock. The head flashing is flashed to the roof using standard roofing practices as shown in the installation manual. The microinverters and electrical lines on the left are shielded with a raceway cover. There are no exposed fasteners, This system will not leak! 
Capturing the Flexible Thin Film Advantage


Reduced cost with roll-2-roll, high volume manufacturing process.
Durable - no glass to shatter. Better hail impact resistance.
Lightweight - No structural roof reinforcement required.
Easily integrated with roofing material. PV array removal is not required when re-roofing.
Superior performance in high heat, rooftop conditions.
Superior performance in low light conditions.
Can be installed on multiple slopes facing multiple directions. This will open up more roof space for energy production.
Low Embodied Energy Cost. Quicker payback, less upfront expense.
Superior Full Spectrum Performance.


 Superior Full Spectrum Performance in High Heat and in Low Light Conditions.
Flexible Thin Film Laminate modules have up to 20% better performance on a hot roof environment and up to 12% better performance in Low and Diffuse Light conditions when compared to equally rated Crystalline Silicone Panels. Bird droppings, leaves, water puddling and dirt can shade parts of a PV panel. Shading just 3% of a Crystalline Silicone Panel can reduce output by more than 50 %. With Flexible Thin Film Panels that same 3 % shading, reduces output by only 3 % due to their built-in Bypass Diodes.
Crystalline Silicone Rooftop PV Modules


Glass modules can break and are heavy.
High Cost per square foot.
Racks and roof flashing's are expensive, heavy and prone to roof leaks.
Electrical cable and conduit are exposed.
Modules detract from building appearance.
Due to excessive weight of modules and racks, engineering reports are required and structural support improvements to the roof may be necessary.
Your asphalt roof will wear out before your PV modules do. Has PV array removal and replacement cost been factored into current cost.
Have your String Inverter replacement cost been factored in. They will need to be replaced every 10 - 15 years.

The Next Major Breakthrough in PhotoVoltaic Power is that of the MICRO-INVERTER


Micro-Inverters are great for Affordability and Efficiency
Inverters are an essential piece of a solar power system. An inverter takes the power that comes from the panels, which is direct current ( DC ) and changes it to alternating current ( AC ). AC is what we have in the outlets in our homes and at work. String inverters are large, expensive and inefficient. Just a little shading of just one part, of just one module can severely compromise the performance of the whole array system. They generate large amounts of heat and have a short life span as evidenced by typical warranty period of just 5 years. They also require high-voltage DC wiring which is dangerous when damaged or installed improperly. Micro-Inverters use low voltage AC wiring and significantly reduce the risk of fire or injury. 


Micro-Inverters have changed everything. 

Instead of modules being wired together to create high voltage DC that is sent to an inverter near your main service panel, now each PV Module can be equipped with it's own micro-inverter. The power is converted to 240 volts AC right at the module. This makes the system more efficient and the solar system design more flexible.
With micro-inverters, modules of different ratings can be tied together and they can now be installed on different slopes of different irradiance levels with out having to buy another expensive string inverter. Micro-Inverters also eliminate module mismatch losses and improve system uptime. If one micro-inverter fails you lose the performance of only one module, not the entire string performance. 
The AC wiring from the micro-inverters can be connected in parallel for up to 15 units. They plug into each other like extension cords, they are then fed into the buildings main load center where it back-feeds a 30 amp breaker. A micro-inverter system is real simple to install, it's pretty much " Plug & Play ". MIcro-inverters also eliminate the need for other balance-of-system components and lengthy installation times by a DC Certified Electrician. Again, saving money.


You can't EXPECT, from what you can't INSPECT.
With this new technology, each micro-inverter can report it's performance to a Communications Gateway via the AC wiring and your internet router. The gateway then sends the data to the website to track the performance of each panel / micro-inverter pair. You are able to view this performance data from any where, on any PC, Tablet or Smartphone. Long gone are the days of " false performance promises ".
YOU / WE Can: 


Verify system health and performance at a glance.
View energy production by month, day or hour.
Analyze Performance against historical weather data.
Share System Performance with friends on Facebook, Twitter...
Compare the performance of your CIGS - Flexible Thin Film PV Module Array System to that of their antiquated crystalline silicone system.

Another Game Changer, Solar "SOFT COST"
According to the National Renewable Energy Laboratory ( NREL ) Solar Soft Cost account for up to approximately half of the total installed cost of a Residential PV Solar System. THESE COST INCLUDE:
1. CUSTOMER ACQUISITION


Marketing / Advertising
Sales Calls / Site Visit
Bid Preparation / Phantom Bids
Follow Up
Signing Contract / Collecting Payment



2. FINANCING and CONTRACTING


Financing ( Capital Expenses )
Insurance
Legal Agreements ( RFP's, PPA's, etc. )
Incentive Application Processing

3. PERMITTING, INSPECTION and INTERCONNECTION


Wait Time for Permits, Inspections and Interconnections
Permitting Expenses
Utility Interconnection Expenses
Idle Crew's and Trucks



4. INSTALLATION and PERFORMANCE


Service ( Operations & Maintenance )
Installation Labor
Optimal System Design


AmEnergy Plus uses web based engineering companies that design PhotoVoltaic Systems in the Cloud, collaborating with engineers from around the country. This reduces the cost of in-house solar designers and engineers. They perform all the hard-core engineering so homeowners or installers can get permit approvals for the build. NOT ELIMINATING Soft Cost, but making a serious dent.
WHAT'S AVAILABLE
1. FEASIBILITY STUDY - A Feasibility Study is the first step in your Renewable Energy Project. Using geographical ( GPS ) we can advise you as to the locations potential energy production. Starting with remote reconnaissance we are able to access your location for the optimal size or renewable energy equipment. We also identify critical design constraints or issues. We analyze the location factoring in site variables and present it in an easy to read fashion. FEATURES INCLUDE - Virtual areal reconnaissance, system layout overlay, tilt factor, orientation, system size, module count, vicinity map and shade analysis.
2. CONCEPT DESIGN - A Concept Design demonstrates the proposed Green Energy Technology and is used to specify the best application and identify the optimal system performance and configuration. This document is used as a visual tool that serves as a basis to compare several design iterations or applications selections. It can also be used to develop a bill of materials to estimate a projects cost. FEATURES INCLUDE - System size, vicinity map, customer information , equipment locations, project plan, array dimensions, basic single line diagram, basic bill of materials, source circuit design, inverter configuration, utility  interconnection strategy, utility interconnection application. If required we have a drone reconnaissance service available for satellite inaccessible information.
3. FINANCIAL ANALYSIS - Determine the ROI for your alternative energy project with our Financial Analysis Tool. Regardless of the size of your photovoltaic project, a Financial Analysis from AmEnergy Plus is a fast, cost effective and comprehensive financial tool. It can model, organize and report the critical data required to make decisions regarding your photovoltaic project. Our financial analysis can model PPA's, 3rd party leases, dept & tax equity financing and private group funding as well. It is custom made to fit your project, location and financing model. The financial analysis is intended as an information guide for decision makers ( owners, builders, contractors, investors ) to map out a financial plan for the project. FEATURES INCLUDED - Utility bill analysis, production estimates, incentive modeling, tax & depreciation, return-on-investment ( ROI ), internal rate of return ( IRR ), payback year, annualized cash flows, net present value ( NPV ), environmental impact, levelized cost of energy ( LCOE ), total cost of ownership ( TCO ). A CPA review is available at an additional charge.
4. PERMIT PACKAGE - Is a set of drawings and calculations of the designed system used to apply for a building permit. The blueprints are code compliant and can be reviewed by and wet-stamped by an engineer. Our packages have a 99% success rate at passing plan review the first time. FEATURES INCLUDED- Site plan, equipment locations, project plan and details, bill of materials, structural calculations and annotations, system marking placard templates, interconnection details, wire schedule, conduit schedule and system voltage drop. A PE stamp is available at an additional charge.
What we have achieved and have available NOW, is described and defined in the two articles below.
CLIMATEPROGRESS, July 24, 2013 - The Future of Solar Power... by Bryan Lewis.
http://thinkprogress.org/climate/2013/07/24/2345511/the-future-of-us-solar-power-opportunities-in-soft-cost/
Also, in Forbes Magazine Peter Detwiler wrote: Plug-And-Play Residential Solar In Five Years? Fraunhofer USA And Partners Are Working To Make This A Reality.  
http://www.forbes.com/sites/peterdetwiler/2013/08/07/plug-and-play-residential-solar-in-five-years-fraunhofer-usa-and-partners-are-working-to-make-this-a-reality/

CROWD FUNDING
We are seeking your help to buy the necessary equipment to set up a light manufacturing facility to assemble the Affordable Power Panel. Our major expense will be for the roll forming machine. This machine is similar to a steel siding roll forming machine, only it will bend a heavier gauge metal to the shape shown in the CAD drawing below.


Our machine will look like this. Approximate dimensions are W. 33.5" X H. 45" X L. 138". To be manufactured by Eastside Machine Co. Inc. of Fargo, ND.
This panel is unique. Drawn to our patent pending design and specifications. The design and fabrication of most all the components of this machine are unique to this machine, most everything begins from scratch. We have specified to the manufacturer that the rollers of this machine be adjustable so the panel width can be adjusted to conform to the various width's that the Thin Film Module suppliers provide to us ( 15.5" - 20.5" ).


CAD representation of our patent pending panel.
Panel lengths are field adjusted with a multi-profile guillotine, cut-on-the-fly system, to accommodate the lengths of multiple wattage modules to be available. This machine has the capacity to produce six ( 6 ), ten foot panels per minute. 
Since shade tolerance of flexible thin film modules are not as dependent on the use of micro-inverters ( due to their built in by-pass diodes ), we will specify to our micro-inverter suppliers to build units that connect 2 & 3 panels together. This will further reduce system cost.
Our goal is to raise $ 193,000.00. With this funding we will be able to:


Acquire costume roll forming machinery and necessary support equipment.
Acquire initial inventory of flexible thin film modules made to our specifications to maximize Power Density.
Acquire initial inventory of micro-inverters.
Initial order of 140,000 lbs. of .032 mil aluminum coil stock. Initially only aluminum will be available & in brown only.
Build a working 4-5 kW. prototype system, for instructional photographs and instructional videos.
Further develop marketing and distribution strategies.
This all requires minimum orders and up front cash commitments to our suppliers.
STRETCH GOAL
Initially production will be in St. Louis, Mo. STL being centrally located with access to rail, river barge, trucking, and air freight, forms of transportation, I believe is an ideal location. We have patent pending ( patent information available upon request ) status on a unique product with in an industry that experienced $ 19 BILLION in sales last year alone. The more money we have available to invest in good people, good policy and the skills to communicate that policy, the faster we become successful.
RISK and CHALLENGES
The Affordable Power Panel is a Mounting Platform for equipment that has already been developed, manufactured and guaranteed by others. Others with research and development departments within their organizations and with the backing of Multinational Corporations. We have just devised a way to get their product off a shelf and on to an asphalt shingle roof, carport, awning, patio cover, ground mounted rack, saw-toothed building facades... where it can be productive and beneficial. Flexible Thin Film PV Modules are classified as a Building Integrated Photo Voltaic ( BIPV ) product. With our mounting system added into the mix we have somewhat of a hybrid system. We look forward to getting feedback from designers and installers or anyone with additional ideas on how to...
PRODUCTION & SHIPPING - I don't foresee any insurmountable production problems. We are attaching a flexible thin film laminate ( roofing type ) material and a micro-inverter ( that already have national and international code approvals ) to a metal panel that nearly replicates a standing seam metal roof system ( as used in various forms for the past 800 years ) and we shifted it's orientation by 90 degrees to stabilize module laminate migration. Shipping cost are somewhat a restricting factor until quantities warrant different options.
This is a Service Connected Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business. Veterans are welcome here. 
Thanks to everyone for your time and consideration. We can't do it with out YOU.


This product proudly made in the USA

story:
How this started

LTD. optics started because we are outdoor enthusiasts and wear sunglasses pretty much all the time. Having bought several pairs of sunglasses over the years we began to notice that there was a huge gap in the sunglass market. It seemed that our only choices for buying sunglasses were to either go to the local big box store and grab a pair of low quality shades for under $20, or go to the store in the mall or local skate shop and pick up a pair of higher quality ones for over a $100 to start. The other thing that began to trouble us was that several of the companies in this higher price bracket were charging up to $40 to add polarized lens! So we decided that there had to be a way to bridge this gap and produce high quality sunglasses that come standard with polarized lenses for well under $100.

The Dean high quality acetate sunglasses in Perfect Pink

What we've created

After several months working with designers and manufactures we've realized our dream. We have partnered up with the best manufacturers available to bring you superior quality eyewear at a great price. Now, we feel that we have a product that everyone can use at a price that smashes the competition.

The Dean high quality acetate sunglasses in 801Green with Blue REVO lenses

The models

The Dean, our first model, is made of the same high quality Italian acetate as those big sunglass companies that are sold in the mall. Also, this model has stainless steel hinges for extra durability and 7-layer resin polarized lenses with UV400 protection. Aside from the superior materials that these sunglasses are made of, they also look great and are made to stay on your face whether you're skating a bowl, riding your bike to school, hiking to your favorite spot, or just driving around town.

The Woodrow is our second model and is made using only the highest quality bamboo available. Bamboo is great for making sunglasses because it is eco-friendly and sustainable considering it can grow 10 feet or more in a year and can be grown in almost any wet climate. Another cool feature about bamboo frames is that untreated bamboo floats, so if you are into water sports a pair of natural bamboo shades might be a good choice. These sunglasses feature stainless steel hinges and 7-layer resin polarized lenses with UV400 protection as well and have a great classic Wayfarer style.

The Woodrow Bamboo Wayfarer in Dark Ebony with smoke lens

Giving back 

Also, because we think giving back to the community is the right thing to do, we plan to donate one pair of sunglasses to 'Unite for Sight' for every pair we sell. These sunglasses can then be distributed all over the world to those in need.

We plan to donate 1 pair of sunglasses to Unite For Sight for every pair we sell
 

 

Going forward

Our vision is to expand this company by involving designers from all over the country and create lasting partnerships. We want to make our product available to everyone and let the consumers know that there is an alternative to paying for higher priced eyewear. We also hope to be at the forefront of developing new eyewear technology that is eco-friendly and cost-efficient. 

The Dean high quality sunglasses in Hellfire with Orange REVO lens

story:
Who We Are

We are Belgian and we have started this small business with big ideas because we believe we can make a difference. We’re located in a small city called Mechelen, in the Flanders region. We are extremely passionate about traveling, experiencing new cultures and meeting new people.

Millions of people are traveling every day and we are convinced that most of them are open to meet new people and share experiences. Maybe they even want to chat about the weather conditions or the ridiculous price of a latte macchiato. Still, even though we’re all connected, we hesitate to really communicate with each other.

With A Perfect Stranger, we’re reaching out to you and giving nine cards to help you make that initial introduction easier. As a perfect stranger, you can use a card to pay a compliment or give a greeting to another stranger. This perfect stranger exchange will leave both of you with a warm and joyful feeling as each of you carry on your way.

Additionally, we’re creating a super website on which each card can be registered. This will allow you to communicate through text and pictures with everyone else who ever registered that very card. You’ll also be able to track each card that has passed through your hands. Each card it will have its own page on which a map will show you where the card has been to and where it is going to next.

 

Why Is It Important for Us?

What started as a fun idea got completely out of hand!

OUR GOAL IS TO SPREAD HAPPINESS AND MAKE THE WORLD A KINDER PLACE.

We want people to be nice and kind to all strangers...not only the pretty girl or the cute guy. Therefore, intentionally we will only print cards with compliments and greeting phrases that are applicable to anyone to avoid any misinterpretation.

Of course, we’re not oblivious about all the cruel, destructive, unethical and basically bad things that are happening on this planet, but isn’t that just another reason to be kind to thy stranger?

And maybe you’re right, not ALL strangers may be open to the idea and some of them might be genuine ***** (feel free to use any insult you prefer).

The good news is: you’re still reading, so you’re not one of them!

Supporting Good Causes

For every pack of cards or T-shirt we sell, we will donate EURO 1 (US$ 1,32) to a good cause. Every few months, we’ll change the cause we’re supporting.

We make that commitment now and we’ll stick to it for as long as we exist!

 

Why We’re Using Indiegogo

We decided to use the services of Indiegogo because our initial investment is quite steep. Not only are we creating an incredibly nice and user friendly website, we’ve also designed beautiful cards and we’ve made a great introductory video clip. Therefore, we’re crossing all our fingers and toes, burning candles day and night and we keep on staring at a dried 4 leaf clover, hoping to reach our financial goal mentioned at the top of this page. If we succeed, we’ll be able to get this new offline-online community off the ground AND realize the dream that got us started in the first place: TO SPREAD HAPPINESS AND MAKE THE WORLD A KINDER PLACE

 

You like the idea, but you don’t have the means to support us?

NO PROBLEMO! Smile and help us spread the word: share our campaign, share the clip, like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter and share the idea with a stranger!

 

You like the idea of spreading happiness, but you do not wish to receive cards or a T-shirt?

NO PROBLEMO! You can contribute any amount you like of which 25% will be donated to a good cause.

Contact us at contact@aperfectstranger.org 

Thank you for your support!

story:
If you're here, chances are you know of our Facebook page, Retards. Retards Everywhere.

Upon the ever so slowly popularity growth on our page, many concepts passed through our heads. Eventually, someone decided to try and make a new holiday, National Sign Day. That failed. However, it brought upon the idea of T-Shirts. This won't fail.

So yes, what we want to do is create some T-Shirts for the fans, but unfortunately we're all broke. That's why we turned to Indiegogo. Now the future lies in the hands of you, the fans. Hopefully, with your help, we can make what is both a loveletter to the fans and a supplement to our incomes.

Also, the page avatar (the small photo, not the big one) is the first of many tentative T-Shirt designs. Expect at least a couple in the coming days.

story:
I love to experience different kinds of sunglasses. The dazzling lights makes me fatigued during my driving journey. Thinking about it I designed and experienced BooEnn sunglasses which can auto discolor amazingly fast with changing lights conditions and make me feel more comfortable and relaxed on the road.                                                                                           ----ChengHu(Founder) 



Booenn is the world's first solar powered driving glasses with new technology smart LCD lens and solar smart light sensor device to balance light condition in milliseconds. It is developed for drivers who wants to enhance vision and be safer when entering a tunnel and driving under strong light conditions.

Booenn sets the standard for better light adaptation. Anti-fantigue, anti-shatter, prevents pollution, smart solar sensor, works continually and stably, energy saving and eco-friendly, auto discolor fast in milliseconds and protects your eyes.

Wear BooEnn Light-Sensitive Sunglasses, don't risk your comfort on the road or anywhere else.




Better Light Adaptation

Booenn has new technology of smart LCD lens and drive power of solar sensor. The lens helps driver to improve visibility when under the sun light and entering tunnel/exiting tunnel to adapt the changing light conditions in milliseconds. 


Booenn reduces fatigue, keeping your eyes comfortable during your driving journey. It helps to filter strong light to reduce glare, eye fatigue and strain, let you drive 8 hours easy and relaxed.

Booenn can filter strong light and dazzling light to prevent light pollution and protect eyes effectively for drivers.

Smart Discolor

Booenn performs smart discolor fast and automatically in milliseconds with its 13-layer nanomaterials, flexible lens and drive power of solar smart light sensor. It can improve visibility and avoid enough darken and brightness when entering tunnel and exiting tunnel.


Works continually and stably

Booenn can work continually and stably, its power is supplied by solar energy with the solar smart light sensor device, so you won't need to worry replacing batteries.


Energy Saving and Eco-friendly Environment

Booenn is energy saving and eco-friendly with its solar smart light sensor device, it doesn't use replaceable batteries.


Design and Structure

Booenn is designed using Anti-shatter Smart LCD lens, Solar Smart Light Sensor Device and Ultra-light antiskid TR100 Frame. Bring comfortable vision for you with the perfect booenn glasses.





Anti-shatter Smart LCD lens

Booenn adopts new LCD technology and 13-layer nanomaterials flexible lens, which helps to filter sun light, keep lens flexible and improve visibility. When a knocking occurs, the glasses will not be easily broken. Keep you safer and comfortable during your journey.


Light intensity sensor, perfect match with solar micro cell to achieve light sensitive, discolor, and environmental protection. You must push up the protective cap before using.


Ultra-light antiskid TR100 Frame is light weight, shatter-resistant and heat resistant. 

The low power consumption Solar LCD colors glasses that the project research adopts solar LCD control, sunshine intensity sensor, low power consumption LCD control, sun position sensor and other core technology.


Booenn glasses is available in various frame colors, see the pictures below.
You can email us your color preference and tell us which color you like. Choose between navy blue, orange,pink, purple, black, white, yellow, beige and red.


Quantum Communicational Tech Share(HK) Co,. Ltd was established in January 20, 2015. The team members are international high-tech persons in the electro-optic field. Their professions involve in Optoelectronics, Electronic Science and Technology, and Telecommunication Engineering etc. The experienced technicians can research and develop optical-mechanical-electrical projects independently.

1.What will the funds be used for after the Indiegogo campaign ends?

We will use the funds to pay for the materials,pay for the cost of manufacturing and shipping the units earned as perks, and pay to fulfill all the orders.

2. How many colors will the sunglasses be available? 

There are nine colors you can choose, include black, white, pink, peach, purple, navy blue, red, beige, and orange. Email us to select the colors that you like after your order.

3. How do I clean the sunglasses?

There is a clean cloth included in the package, which is special for cleaning the glasses.

4. How long will my Booenn sunglasses last?

It can be used for a long time if taken care of. The lens are flexible, it won’t be broken easily. Moreover, its power is supplied by solar energy with the solar smart light sensor device, so you won't need to worry replacing batteries.

5. Is shipping costs included in the perks?

Yes.

6. What comes in the sunglasses package?

The sunglasses package includes sunglasses, sunglasses case, sunglasses cleaning cloth, sunglasses cloth pouch and product instruction. 

7. Where can I find the sunglasses after the Indiegogo campaign ends?

You can find the sunglassess on the website. www.booenn.com

We will develop a sale channel after the campaign completion. You will find the sunglasses on third party platform, for example, aliexpress, amazon, wish and so on.

8. Where is the Sunglasses made?

It is designed and manufactured in China, Shenzhen

9. When are the perks expected to ship?

We will fulfill perks in the order we received. We are aiming to start fulfillment in July 2016 and it is our goal to ship to all our backers in October 2016. We will be maniacs on a mission to hit this deadline, but product development often has unexpected hiccups, so we cannot guarantee this. We will keep our backers apprised of our expected delivery time frames as we get more information. Delivery time frames will also depend in part on how many orders we receive. There will be a limit to how many we can create in one month.

10. Can I change or cancel my perk?

Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust your perk selection. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on indiegogo are also non-refundable. Sorry, no refunds or exchanges.

11. Given that a lot of time and money has been invested with key testing partners is there still a chance of malfunction?

Yes, despite the rigorous test over the last decade the chances of product malfunctioning exists with a brand new disruptive technology. Scaling up a new technology has inherent risks. We will pursue to limit bottle necks and potential causes of malfunctioning before shipping the product.

12. Are the plastic liquid crystal sunglasses only suitable for driving?

No, the sunglasses are also suitable for outdoor sports. If you are fond for fishing or playing golf, the sunglasses will be an excellent helper for you to have a good time.

13. Could my company become a distributor or retailer?

We focus on online sales at the start. We are open to discuss distributorships with selected companies/retailers but we will be very critical.

14. What are the differences compared to ordinary sunglasses?

Intelligent color and anti-shatter lens. The shade change of ordinary sunglasses is not significantly and they are easy to broken. After a long-time wearing, your eyes will be very tired. However, this kind of smart sunglasses are equipped with intelligent color and anti-shatter lens and they are anti visual fatigue. So you can have a clear and broad vision with the smart sunglasses during your driving.

15. Is there a warranty?

Yes, we offer 12 months warranty period. Even if the product is not as expected beyond this period we are open to start a dialogue to ensure you remain an ambassador of our smart products.

16. How to contact you if I have some question about Booenn sunglasses?

Tel: +86 755 8268 3735

Email: admin@booenn.com

LOCATION:

The 22nd Floor, Block A, Pacfic Business Building, Jiabin Road, Luohu Distriction, Shenzhen
story_txt:
I love to experience different kinds of sunglasses. The dazzling lights makes me fatigued during my driving journey. Thinking about it I designed and experienced BooEnn sunglasses which can auto discolor amazingly fast with changing lights conditions and make me feel more comfortable and relaxed on the road.                                                                                           ----ChengHu(Founder) 







Booenn is the world's first solar powered driving glasses with new technology smart LCD lens and solar smart light sensor device to balance light condition in milliseconds. It is developed for drivers who wants to enhance vision and be safer when entering a tunnel and driving under strong light conditions.
Booenn sets the standard for better light adaptation. Anti-fantigue, anti-shatter, prevents pollution, smart solar sensor, works continually and stably, energy saving and eco-friendly, auto discolor fast in milliseconds and protects your eyes.
Wear BooEnn Light-Sensitive Sunglasses, don't risk your comfort on the road or anywhere else.





Better Light Adaptation




Booenn has new technology of smart LCD lens and drive power of solar sensor. The lens helps driver to improve visibility when under the sun light and entering tunnel/exiting tunnel to adapt the changing light conditions in milliseconds. 











Booenn reduces fatigue, keeping your eyes comfortable during your driving journey. It helps to filter strong light to reduce glare, eye fatigue and strain, let you drive 8 hours easy and relaxed.















Booenn can filter strong light and dazzling light to prevent light pollution and protect eyes effectively for drivers.



Smart Discolor
Booenn performs smart discolor fast and automatically in milliseconds with its 13-layer nanomaterials, flexible lens and drive power of solar smart light sensor. It can improve visibility and avoid enough darken and brightness when entering tunnel and exiting tunnel.

Works continually and stably
Booenn can work continually and stably, its power is supplied by solar energy with the solar smart light sensor device, so you won't need to worry replacing batteries.





Energy Saving and Eco-friendly Environment
Booenn is energy saving and eco-friendly with its solar smart light sensor device, it doesn't use replaceable batteries.





Design and Structure
Booenn is designed using Anti-shatter Smart LCD lens, Solar Smart Light Sensor Device and Ultra-light antiskid TR100 Frame. Bring comfortable vision for you with the perfect booenn glasses.


















Anti-shatter Smart LCD lens
Booenn adopts new LCD technology and 13-layer nanomaterials flexible lens, which helps to filter sun light, keep lens flexible and improve visibility. When a knocking occurs, the glasses will not be easily broken. Keep you safer and comfortable during your journey.









Light intensity sensor, perfect match with solar micro cell to achieve light sensitive, discolor, and environmental protection. You must push up the protective cap before using.










Ultra-light antiskid TR100 Frame is light weight, shatter-resistant and heat resistant. 





The low power consumption Solar LCD colors glasses that the project research adopts solar LCD control, sunshine intensity sensor, low power consumption LCD control, sun position sensor and other core technology.












Booenn glasses is available in various frame colors, see the pictures below.

You can email us your color preference and tell us which color you like. Choose between navy blue, orange,pink, purple, black, white, yellow, beige and red.















Quantum Communicational Tech Share(HK) Co,. Ltd was established in January 20, 2015. The team members are international high-tech persons in the electro-optic field. Their professions involve in Optoelectronics, Electronic Science and Technology, and Telecommunication Engineering etc. The experienced technicians can research and develop optical-mechanical-electrical projects independently.

story:
Campaign is successfully funded!

Thanks to all Backers :)

 

Launching FitsAll Belt, the most comfortable suit belt that gives you extra length while sitting. Extensively tested and developed, quality guaranteed, and shipping on time!

We wear a belt everyday to complete and to support our trousers. However, we sacrifice comfort in many situations by wearing a belt, especially while sitting which is a major pattern in our life today.

The FitsAll Belt is reinvented to solve this problem. It helps us to dress up in a formal way, and also provides extra comfort while seated due to the stretchable rayon structure in the rear half. The FitsAll is a revolutionized product serving the best of both worlds for people looking for comfort without sacrificing looks.

 

 

We offers three different modern designs.

 

 

 

 

* High-quality gift box provided. Great gift for your loved ones!

 

 

FAQs ---------

 

When will the items be shipped?

This campaign has been successfully completed! Items will be shipped right after your contribution :)

I made a mistake in my shipping address. How can I fix it?

Go to "My contributions" then click on "View Order Details" and then you can choose "UPDATE ADDRESS".
