Introducing blö 2.0, the Future of Wearable Cooling Technology....Stay Cool Wherever You Areblö is perfect for hanging out with friends, at BBQs, family outings, sports events, dog walking, and so much more...The Possibilities Are EndlessWorking Out 
It's Small and Compactblö 2.0 Size Comparison to Iphone XHow it Worksblö is a cross between a fan and an air conditioner. It uses a small motor and a blade to create airflow, but it doesn't work like typical fan. It draws air in through a chamber where it passes over peppermint oil which acts as the cooling agent. Peppermint oil enhances the cooling sensation and cools you off much quicker.The cooler air flows out of the bottom and sides and focuses on a small area of your skin at a targeted location. Unlike a fan that tries to get maximum airflow, blö cools off a small portion on your body using ambient cooling, similar to how an ice cube cools you off. Once that area gets cold, the rest of your body adjusts and you get cooler. When you combine that with the effects of peppermint oil described below you get the perfect combo to cool you off quickly. How Peppermint Oil Cools You OffThe receptor protein that senses change in temperature is called TRPM8 and is found in all cold sensing nerves. The menthol in peppermint oil binds directly to TRPM8 and activates it which allows the body to feel cooler. Ref: 1.We combined ambient cooling and TRPM8 activation with targeted locations on the body to create a maximum cooling effect.Ambient cooling + TRPM8 activation + Targeted locations = Maximum coolingblö was designed so you can attach it to your clothing at natural cooling locations on your body. The Brain Stem Regulates Body TemperatureThe area of the brain that senses and regulates body temperature is located at the base of the neck in an area known as the brain stem.blö was strategically designed to be placed at the base of your neck to cool you off faster. When you cool this area down the rest of your body becomes cooler.   blö works just as well when positioned on the front of your body or on your lower back.Tech SpecsWalking Around Outsideblö can be used even when you're dressed up and can blend in with your outfit while you're walking to work, or even going out with friends!Essential Oilsblö not only cools you off, but it also allows essential oil users to enjoy the health benefits of their small diffuser on the go.Peppermint oil makes the air feel much colder. Not only that, it smells great too and has healing properties!Essential oils belonging to the mint family, especially those with higher percentages of menthol, like Peppermint Oil, will help make the body feel cooler. Menthol has the ability to trick receptors in the brain into thinking that the body is cooler than it really is. Ref: 2We also recommend using lemongrass essential oil. It both repels mosquitos and relaxes you at the same time, but you can add other oils as well.  The cool thing about blö is it is designed so you can add whatever essential oils you want depending on your preference. The possibilities are endless!Inhaling the fragrance of essential oils benefits the sympathetic nervous system. Inhalation of essential oils has shown a decrease in blood pressure and can be used to regulate dysfunctions of the sympathetic nervous system. (Haze, et al. 2002) Ref: 3How to Use Essential Oil Inserts  blö Thermal Device Sped Up 4XWhat's in the Box
blö cooling device
Micro USB charging cable
SPECSSize: 80 x 36 x 14mmWeight: 50gBattery: Rechargeable Lithium polymer, lasts up to 8 hoursblö Decibel ReadingsOur Team How did we get here? Here’s the quick version. Founder and CEO, Rob Lupi, and Creative Director Andy first met in the Marine Corps at Camp Pendleton. They became fast friends and worked on several intelligence missions together. In their spare time time they surfed everyday because it was hot and that was the best way to cool off.After Rob left the military, he went to UCLA, studied psychology, and surfed as much as he could. Upon graduating, his plan was to take government contracting jobs, all over the world and surf. Rob did that for several years and lived in some awesome places! Andy did the same and sometimes they had jobs in the same locations. Almost all of the places were hot and humid, and nothing existed that they could take with them to cool off outside. This was a reoccurring problem and there was no solution in sight….Eventually Rob made his way back to Los Angeles where he was attending Marshall business school at USC. One day he was out with some friends during a heatwave in downtown LA. It was the fifth day of 100-degree weather, with no end in sight. They were complaining about how hot it was outside and Rob casually mentioned that it would be great if there was portable AC that you could clip in your collar that would cool you off while you were walking outside. Rob's friends loved the idea and they talked about it the rest of the night. Little did he know, this was the beginning of blö. Rob met Collin when he was looking for an industrial designer to help him make his dream a reality. Both being from Ohio and having the Marine Corps connection, as Collin's brother is in the Marines, they became friends pretty quickly. They worked endlessly on design changes for blö and made over 50 prototypes until they were satisfied. Rob then recruited Andy onboard and that was how the original blö team was formed.blo technology is a small, self funded company, but we make up for it with determination and the belief that getting this product into peoples' hands can truly make a meaningful impact on their lives. We've worked really hard over the last three years and had a lot of fun creating blö for the masses. We learned a lot about manufacturing and logistics during the creation of the original version of blö. After listening to feedback from our original backers we decided to revamp blö to make it quieter and produce more airflow. We created several new molds and made blö 2.0 even better. We ran a small production run of blö 2.0 and received lots of positive feedback from some of our original backers who were able to test it. We have all of our components sourced and have teamed up with advisors and engineers with a proven track record in manufacturing. We've already had a DFM completed and have the tooling complete as well. We had a successful trial run and received some finished product in the United States. Now we need your support to help increase our volume to drive down our costs for our next production run which also makes it possible for us to offer you blö 2.0 at a cheaper price.Your Funds Will Help
Make it possible to order a larger volume of components 
Increase our production run 
Drive down manufacturing costs
Lower the price of blö 2.0
Risks and challengesProducing consumer electronics is always a challenge, but we are confident in our abilities to deliver this project on time and with great quality. Our experience going through manufacturing last year for the original blö has prepared us for this version. It wasn't easy, but we persevered and now have a  better understanding of manufacturing and logistics. We kept the internal parts simple and sourced our components from various manufacturers. This helps alleviate the problem of a key component shortage. Despite all of these issues that can arise, we believe we will start shipping by July 2019.We teamed up with professionals with decades of experience to help us streamline our manufacturing and logistics. We shipped over 11,000 orders to 50+ countries during the past year. We will start shipping in July 2019. We can say this with confidence since we already had a large order produced and the shipment is on it's way to the US. We will also ship orders out of Hong Kong for our international orders. We learned from our mistakes last year and want to make this campaign go as smoothly as possible. Shipping does not include duties or custom's fees on international orders.We are ready to ramp into production for the summer and need your support!THANK YOU!We (Rob, Andy, Collin) are very excited to share blö 2.0 with you. We hope you love your blö 2.0 just as much as we do! Here's to keeping you cool, calm, and comfortable. Thank you to all backers for helping make blö 2.0 a reality!REFERENCES1. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK5238/#ch1...2. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC33...3. https://www.jstage.jst.go.jp/article/jjp/90/3/9...

story:
MIN Belt is an extraordinary belt that you need one.

 

 

 

 

 

 

A belt is a big part of our daily dress routine, and it’s safe to say, that 99.9% of us have at least 1-5 belts in our closet. However, how many of those belts would you consider being “the perfect belt?”   

“Finding the perfect belt”, or the “belt experience”, is an experience akin to finding “true love”. You know it’s out there, but always illusive, just out of reach. Some of you may be luckier than others, but the rest of us; it may be a never-ending search.  

Sometimes you think you found the perfect belt, only to realize it’s anything but…. they can get moldy, become riddled with holes, never the right fit when you gain or lose just a bit of weight, bulky and boring, you name it.  

Belt cost a lot of money and take up a decent amount of space, especially when they aren’t the right fit, or have too many problems. Ordinary belts have lots of problems. It can also be a hassle; so many of us simply settle for wearing inferior belts and ruining their image and personality without ever realizing it. What a tragedy!

 

 

 

We have set out to correct this tragedy. No more settling for an inferior belt!

The MIN Belt is the "True Love" you have been searching for! The belt that no one thought existed. A minimal, modern design, that is stylish without flamboyance, and yet offering the perfect fit! 

Just one MIN Belt, you can replace all the other belts in your collection. A design that is suited for work or play, from tailored suits, to hiking. You got it. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We realised that we were fed up with ordinary belts, which are prone to numerous problems. The world needed a new kind of belt, so we came up with a brilliant idea. Our extraordinary belt design was crafted with these five concepts in mind:  

1. Minimal and Inspiring

2. Simple, but stylish and meaningful

3. Unique buckle mechanism and innovative belt strap material

4. Solution to all common belt problems

5. Very durable

 

This was the beginning of "MIN Belt".

 

 

 

The MIN Belt, features a unique, patent-pending buckle design, that is both versatile and highly functional. The buckle is created out of a single piece of stainless steel, transformed through laser cutting, forming, sandblasting, and a jewellery-grade PVD (Physical Vapor Deposition) finish.  

The MIN Buckle has a unique, simple, and elegant design, that functions as a 2-tier clip, holding belt strap in place.

 

 

 

The "M-I-N" typographic design buckle is made from special stainless steel, featuring a matte finish, followed with jewelry-grade PVD color coating that is both strong, and beautiful: the perfect finishing touch, to your everyday outfit. 

 

The belt strap itself, is very important to the overall feel of the belt you choose. It is also where most problems lie.  

We have researched, tested and experimented with many belt strap prototypes.  

Finally, we developed our unique belt strap material, which has a great feel, beautiful colors, great texture, as well as being extremely durable. It has to be very comfortable to wear, and must be a perfect match for the MIN Buckle.  

The MIN Strap is 35 mm-wide premium-grade polymer-based coated webbing that is super durable and water resistant. The strap has a texture that is similar to leather, but a lot more durable. You will immediately sense the superb strap quality and texture from a distance, and the overall feel will be summed up in just one word….”Premium”.

 

 

We are offering two MIN Strap colours: Black and Brown. More strap colors will be added later.

 

 

 

MIN Belt features a minimal design without holes, flaps, loops, or any unnecessary stuff. It is a simple combination of the MIN Buckle and the MIN Strap. Together, the MIN Belt fixes all of your typical belt problems. It offers a new belt experience with plenty of benefits over ordinary belts. You no longer need so many belts in your closet from now on!

 

 

The MIN Belt is stylish and looks stunning with any outfit, allowing it to be mixed and matched with any dress code for any occasion.

 

 

 

 

 

Wearing the MIN Belt is also quick and easy.

 

 

 

The MIN Belt is interchangeable with many other possibilities, meaning that it is open to your creativity. Varieties include original, reverse, short tongue, upside-down, double, and more options. The options are limited only by your imagination.

 

 

The MIN Belt is also designed to last for a long time. People will immediately feel the quality of the MIN Belt.

 

The MIN Belt is water-resistant, as the buckle is made from top-quality stainless steel, which is highly resistant to rust and corrosion. The MIN Strap can be cleaned, but it is also rugged enough for use in extreme conditions.

 

The MIN Belt has been tested under regular usage every day for almost a year, and the results are phenomenal. The MIN Strap remains intact without any kinks or cracks, unlike most traditional belts. This proves that the MIN Belt is not just stylish but also super durable.

 

Frequent flyers in particular love how the MIN Belt helps to tidy up their suitcase. Packing multiple MIN Buckles is also incredibly easy!

 
 

The MIN Belt is also TSA-friendly, meaning that you don't need to take the MIN Belt off completely. Simply take the buckle off and then put it on later after passing through the security checkpoint at the airport.

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

The MIN Buckle has two slots. Slide one end of the MIN Strap into the front slot of the MIN Buckle to attach them together. You can put on the MIN Belt in two unique and simple steps.

 

 

The inspiration behind the MIN Belt was a YouTube video called The Last Lecture by Dr. Randy Pausch. He shared his wisdom with millions of people before he died of cancer, but his message was really for his children. It is an inspiring message that everyone should check out. This video really hit me.

 

As a father and an engineer working as a product designer, I thought that it would be nice to create something easy and simple that could change people's lives in a positive way. All that work would be a legacy for my young son, Kin. He has no idea what he has done to inspire me, but he will find out after he grows up, and perhaps he will be proud of his father.

 

 

I hope that our project will inspire other people to do something good for this world in their own way. However, the MIN Belt cannot become a reality without your support. Our story is meaningless without you, which is why we need your help. Please back us and share this project to others who may be interested in changing their belt experience forever! 

 

We have tweaked every detail of the MIN Belt to get a working prototype, but we need to invest in the tooling, molds and place a minimum order for the first production run in order to make enough for everyone that is interested and supportive of our vision. That's why we want to offer the MIN Belt to this awesome community before anyone else.

 

The MIN Belt began with a basic idea back in 2014. We have come a long way since then, thanks to a lot of effort, countless working hours, and a multitude of prototypes. Below is a brief outline of our journey from the initial idea to now. If you support the MIN Belt, you can also become a part of this exciting history.

 

 

 

 

 

30 seconds of your time will make a huge difference in growing the MIN Belt community. Click one of the buttons below and tag a friend or co-worker who needs a MIN Belt!

story:
This is about Fresh Riviera®, my dream label of sleep(wear) crafted with a clear conscious. Dreamy soft, organic cotton jammies, designed & ethically crafted right here in the USA.

Like many, I have long dreamed of being involved in the fashion industry, even attending college studying fashion before graduating with a degree in social work. I have also long been involved in and concerned about sustainability issues. Now with two very aware young girls (ages 7 & 11) who are both fashion and very environmentally conscious and having married into a family of lifelong entrepreneurs, I have been inspired to go for my dream of creating my own fashion label, a sleepwear brand that my ‘aware’ children will be proud of when they look behind the label, a brand that will allow me (and hopefully you too) to sleep with a clear conscious.
Made sustainably and ethically in the USA, and ideally right here in the Great Lakes region. Our Mission is to make dreamy soft, comfortable sleepwear that doesn’t harm the earth or health of the wearer.

A bit about myself. I was born and raised on the Great Lakes and now living in Door County amongst the greatest body of freshwater in the world, and given the challenges, the traditional fashion industry creates, I plan to do good while making a positive impact. We have a corresponding .org in the works that will highlight issues and challenges related to the Great Lakes while promoting awareness and solutions to help keep our lakes ‘fresh’ for generations to come before it takes on an orange hue!

THE LAUNCH COLLECTION:

        

Our launch design is a very comfortable, slightly retro look. Loose fit, faux wrap top with loose fit track style shorts with coordinating trim. Currently available in two colors, inspired by a relaxing evening of watching the sunset on a sandy beach on your favorite spot on The Great Lakes. 

   Sunset Blush with coordinating Sand shorts.

   Aqua Breeze with coordinating Sand shorts.

THE PLAN:

  • Launch my dreamy soft organic jammies that are made in the U.S.A. 
  • Take orders and supporters and craft and deliver my jammies.
  • After fulfillment, near term, design and ethically produce my winter and spring collections.
  • As we grow I plan to create a real, ethical, business with real jobs and continue to offer more quality products that will delight my customers. 

MORE DETAILS: 
My ambition is to weave social consciousness and sustainability into the fabric of the brand. I care about the process, the who, the where, the what goes into the clothes that I wear. As a mom of young children who get ‘it’ about concerns of our environment, I would be cheating them of the clean future they deserve if I just went the “business as usual” route and profits at all costs, humans, and environment be damned, I gotta get mine. Yuck! How do people sleep at night with that mindset? We all know there is a better way.
I feel strongly as more and more people hear our story and enjoy our boutique pj’s, we’ll find an increasing number of concerned consumers who realize the impact and power of their dollars spent and who want to be part of the solution.  
We are inspired by the Great Lakes and their beautiful, life-sustaining water that forms the largest body of freshwater on the planet by area and contains 21% of the world’s freshwater by volume. The waters from these lakes impact our life and the lives of over 30 million people who live around the Great Lakes basin on a daily basis.

Those who live, work and play here know, there are many special places in our Great Lakes region and they need our attention and protection. It is our belief that just by proximity alone we are stewards of this incredible resource and want to do our part to help sustain them for many generations.  

Knowing what goes into our pj’s and what doesn’t, we know you will sleep good at night, and lord knows we all could use a good night sleep these days! At Fresh Riviera® Clothing We call it Enclothed Cognition. Wear what makes you feel good! Inside & Out!

Why Pre-Order?
Your support helps make an impact in the world... plus you get a super comfy pair of organic cotton pj's.
Not gonna lie, creating a simple pair of ethically, made in the USA pj’s using earth-friendly fabric is not a simple as it may seem. It took a lot of research to find the right fabric supplier who was willing to work with small minimums. It also took a lot of work to find a cut and sew contractor in the US willing to work with small orders to start with and can scale up with us. But after nearly a year of sourcing, we found the right fabric supplier with organic cotton grown and milled in the USA and a great cut & sew contractor that we are really excited to be working with. A highly skilled group of women and men who take pride in the work they do. Located in a pleasant and clean studio in a charming community just blocks from the Great Lakes! Once we finally found our contractor we knew they were “The One”. We know you will sleep better at night knowing where, how and with what your pj’s were made.

Our initial goal is  $1,500 in pre-orders. This, of course, will go to the production of the pj’s themselves with some of the funds allocated towards marketing and tradeshows to help us build our brand and awareness and the rest of it will go towards the launch and production of collections.

For our launch collection, our patterns are made and samples have been finalized and approved, we are production ready. Your Pj’s should arrive within 60 days of ordering. We also have some really fun packages for those who want an all-inclusive, relaxing Great Lakes vacation experience, including a pair of monogrammed jammies, lunch with the designer (yours truly), where you can hear about how the name came to be and get some sneak peeks at future designs.

See our list of perks for more details. Fresh Riviera logo sticker included with all orders. Options for custom monogramming also available.

We are excited and dedicated to doing all we can to help reach our goal! And as this is a pre-order campaign, all orders will be completed regardless of how many there are.

So I thank you in advance for any level of support. Every dollar of support is greatly appreciated and put to good use in creating a business that is good for you. I have a team of advisors who have both decades of diverse business experience, some in fashion, and a couple who have a deep passion for and experience in doing business in impactful ways.

Other ways to help besides ordering a pair of comfy jammies?
    We’d love everybody to share our opportunity with the Indiegogo tools.
    We have support levels that start at $10.00 and up.
    We will have additional perks coming very soon.

Additionally, 
    We’d love to have a couple brand ambassadors to help share our story in earnest.  
    We are also looking for a couple of 'communicators'  that are very passionate about this life-giving, greatest body of freshwater, the approx. 11,000 miles of freshwater coastline and the surrounding communities (aka/ the Fresh Riviera ), the 40 million or so that live in the in the world of our intermingled effort to raise awareness, curate and blog, engage in social media and inspire our youth to embrace and actively call out and monitor and maintain... contact me directly about these opportunities please.

Thank you so much and sleep well tonight.
~~~

Concerns about the traditional fashion industry? 

While much has been exposed on the news to get a real look at the problems and business, as usual, please watch the documentary THE TRUE COST (available on NetFlix), showing how appalling much of the traditional fashion industry is, 2nd most polluting industry, unconscionable labor practices and more or worse. Conversely, I am focused on crafting my clothes right here in the U.S.A. in boutique cut & sew shop(s) that I have personally visited and approved, shops that treat their staff with respect and a decent wage. Made with U.S.A grown, organic cotton.

Why we are concerned about the Great Lakes?

We are inspired by the Great Lakes and their beautiful, life sustaining water that form the largest body of freshwater on the planet by area and contains 21% of the world’s freshwater by volume. The waters from these lakes impact our life and the lives of over 30 million people who live around the Great Lakes basin on a daily basis. Those who live, work and play here know, there are many special places in our Great Lakes region and they need our attention and protection. It is our belief that just by proximity alone we are stewards of this incredible resource and want to do our part to help sustain them for many generations. We are in the process of creating our corresponding .org blog which will feature more of the issues the Lakes are facing with real action items we can take to help protect them. We are also allocating 5% of profits to an organization we feel is making an impact helping to protect our Lakes. 

If you love the Great Lakes and want to support a business that is doing things in a sustainable and ethical way we sincerely hope you consider backing this effort and purchasing a pair of dreamy soft organic cotton pajamas. Thank you so much for taking the time to review this and thank you in advance for your support!!

Currently available in two colors, inspired by a relaxing evening of watching the sunset on a sandy beach on your favorite spot on The Great Lakes.    Sunset Blush with coordinating Sand shorts.   Aqua Breeze with coordinating Sand shorts.THE PLAN:
Launch my dreamy soft organic jammies that are made in the U.S.A. 
Take orders and supporters and craft and deliver my jammies.
After fulfillment, near term, design and ethically produce my winter and spring collections.
As we grow I plan to create a real, ethical, business with real jobs and continue to offer more quality products that will delight my customers. 
MORE DETAILS: My ambition is to weave social consciousness and sustainability into the fabric of the brand. I care about the process, the who, the where, the what goes into the clothes that I wear. As a mom of young children who get ‘it’ about concerns of our environment, I would be cheating them of the clean future they deserve if I just went the “business as usual” route and profits at all costs, humans, and environment be damned, I gotta get mine. Yuck! How do people sleep at night with that mindset? We all know there is a better way.I feel strongly as more and more people hear our story and enjoy our boutique pj’s, we’ll find an increasing number of concerned consumers who realize the impact and power of their dollars spent and who want to be part of the solution.  We are inspired by the Great Lakes and their beautiful, life-sustaining water that forms the largest body of freshwater on the planet by area and contains 21% of the world’s freshwater by volume. The waters from these lakes impact our life and the lives of over 30 million people who live around the Great Lakes basin on a daily basis.Those who live, work and play here know, there are many special places in our Great Lakes region and they need our attention and protection. It is our belief that just by proximity alone we are stewards of this incredible resource and want to do our part to help sustain them for many generations.  Knowing what goes into our pj’s and what doesn’t, we know you will sleep good at night, and lord knows we all could use a good night sleep these days! At Fresh Riviera® Clothing We call it Enclothed Cognition. Wear what makes you feel good! Inside & Out!Why Pre-Order?Your support helps make an impact in the world... plus you get a super comfy pair of organic cotton pj's.Not gonna lie, creating a simple pair of ethically, made in the USA pj’s using earth-friendly fabric is not a simple as it may seem. It took a lot of research to find the right fabric supplier who was willing to work with small minimums. It also took a lot of work to find a cut and sew contractor in the US willing to work with small orders to start with and can scale up with us. But after nearly a year of sourcing, we found the right fabric supplier with organic cotton grown and milled in the USA and a great cut & sew contractor that we are really excited to be working with. A highly skilled group of women and men who take pride in the work they do. Located in a pleasant and clean studio in a charming community just blocks from the Great Lakes! Once we finally found our contractor we knew they were “The One”. We know you will sleep better at night knowing where, how and with what your pj’s were made.Our initial goal is  $1,500 in pre-orders. This, of course, will go to the production of the pj’s themselves with some of the funds allocated towards marketing and tradeshows to help us build our brand and awareness and the rest of it will go towards the launch and production of collections.For our launch collection, our patterns are made and samples have been finalized and approved, we are production ready. Your Pj’s should arrive within 60 days of ordering. We also have some really fun packages for those who want an all-inclusive, relaxing Great Lakes vacation experience, including a pair of monogrammed jammies, lunch with the designer (yours truly), where you can hear about how the name came to be and get some sneak peeks at future designs.See our list of perks for more details. Fresh Riviera logo sticker included with all orders. Options for custom monogramming also available.We are excited and dedicated to doing all we can to help reach our goal! And as this is a pre-order campaign, all orders will be completed regardless of how many there are.So I thank you in advance for any level of support. Every dollar of support is greatly appreciated and put to good use in creating a business that is good for you. I have a team of advisors who have both decades of diverse business experience, some in fashion, and a couple who have a deep passion for and experience in doing business in impactful ways.Other ways to help besides ordering a pair of comfy jammies?    We’d love everybody to share our opportunity with the Indiegogo tools.    We have support levels that start at $10.00 and up.    We will have additional perks coming very soon.Additionally,     We’d love to have a couple brand ambassadors to help share our story in earnest.      We are also looking for a couple of 'communicators'  that are very passionate about this life-giving, greatest body of freshwater, the approx. 11,000 miles of freshwater coastline and the surrounding communities (aka/ the Fresh Riviera ), the 40 million or so that live in the in the world of our intermingled effort to raise awareness, curate and blog, engage in social media and inspire our youth to embrace and actively call out and monitor and maintain... contact me directly about these opportunities please.Thank you so much and sleep well tonight.~~~Concerns about the traditional fashion industry? While much has been exposed on the news to get a real look at the problems and business, as usual, please watch the documentary THE TRUE COST (available on NetFlix), showing how appalling much of the traditional fashion industry is, 2nd most polluting industry, unconscionable labor practices and more or worse. Conversely, I am focused on crafting my clothes right here in the U.S.A. in boutique cut & sew shop(s) that I have personally visited and approved, shops that treat their staff with respect and a decent wage. Made with U.S.A grown, organic cotton.Why we are concerned about the Great Lakes?We are inspired by the Great Lakes and their beautiful, life sustaining water that form the largest body of freshwater on the planet by area and contains 21% of the world’s freshwater by volume. The waters from these lakes impact our life and the lives of over 30 million people who live around the Great Lakes basin on a daily basis. Those who live, work and play here know, there are many special places in our Great Lakes region and they need our attention and protection. It is our belief that just by proximity alone we are stewards of this incredible resource and want to do our part to help sustain them for many generations. We are in the process of creating our corresponding .org blog which will feature more of the issues the Lakes are facing with real action items we can take to help protect them. We are also allocating 5% of profits to an organization we feel is making an impact helping to protect our Lakes. If you love the Great Lakes and want to support a business that is doing things in a sustainable and ethical way we sincerely hope you consider backing this effort and purchasing a pair of dreamy soft organic cotton pajamas. Thank you so much for taking the time to review this and thank you in advance for your support!!
campaign_city: Sturgeon Bay, Door County, United States

story:
Who are we?

We are Adornment Archive. We, Ellen Thomas and Amy Levinson met at Northumbria University on the Designers in Residence scheme in 2010. A lifelong love of design, architecture, craftsmanship and, of course jewellery has lead to the birth of our business.

What do we do?

At Adornment Archive we create jewellery for collectors and design lovers. Our debut collection was designed in London and inspired by the Brutalist architecture the city is so famous for. Our design process combines traditional and modern craft techniques including 3D modelling, 3D printing and traditional silver casting processes. All of our jewellery is designed by us with our unique style, and is handmade using traditional silversmithing processes.  

 

Our Promise:

Our jewellery is handcrafted from sterling silver and is designed to keep, we want to combat modern disposable attitudes. Adornment Archive wants you to love and cherish our designs as much as we do, so if you don't love your jewellery we'll refund you.

We believe in equality, that's why we want to ensure that everyone involved in the making of our jewellery is paid a fair living wage. Reaching our funding target will help us to continue working with companies who hold the same values.

We believe that brands have a responsibility to represent healthy and diverse bodies, so we are committed to working with models and influencers whose views align with ours. 

Why do we need Indegogo funding?

We have spent well over a year designing, developing and prototyping our initial collection, ensuring the style and quality of our products is just right. We now finally feel ready to reveal these products to the world! However, we have realised that we need a little financial help…

So far we have been completely self-funded, but a small cash injection would help us to springboard the launch of our brand!

The initial costs and minimum order quantities in manufacturing our jewellery are quite high, so we need some support to begin our first production run. Your support will allow us to invest in tooling, launch our online shop, make marketing materials and buy stock to send out to stockists.

Risks & Challenges

We have spent over a year establishing our supply chains and building relationships with the artisans who will be making your jewellery, so the risk of your order going unfulfilled is minimal!

To show our respect and appreciation for your support, we promise that your jewellery will be sent to you before it is available to purchase anywhere else. We also promise to keep all backers informed during the production process.

To date the business has been entirely self funded. The largest risk to us would be to not take the next step in launching our brand. Having both previously owned our own businesses we know the costs and time involved in getting a product to market, but we also recognise the feeling of elation we get when we can see our business evolving!

How is our project making a valuable contribution to the world?

We also want to do something positive through this campaign; we want to give something back to the city that has inspired us. This is why we have decided to give to the London based charity Magic Breakfast. Magic Breakfast provides school children with a nutritious breakfast to make sure that no child is too hungry to learn. Just 22p provides a child with a nutritious breakfast, ensuring they have the best possible start to the day. For each item of jewellery we sell we will buy a hungry child breakfast.

Where will the funds go?

We have set our funding goal at a modest £1,500.00. This amount of money will enable us to setup and run our online store for a year, invest in the tooling to create our first production run and implement our first marketing campaign.

8% of the funds raised will go to Indegogo for providing this platform for us to promote our business on, and to help them to continue to do the excellent work they do encouraging entrepreneurship across the globe!  

For each piece of jewellery we sell we will also donate 22p to Magic Breakfast.

Where will the funds go if we don't reach our entire goal?

At Adornment Archive we are self-starters, if we are not able to reach our funding goal we will use the profits we do make to invest in manufacturing our products and we will do everything else ourselves. Not reaching our target goal will slow down our progress, but it will not prevent us from launching our brand!

Other ways you can help...

We understand you might not be in a position to contribute right now, but we would really appreciate it if you would still share our story. 

Sign up to our mailing list at: info@adornmentarchive.co.uk

Instagram @adornmentarchive @amyadornmentarchive

We would like to say a special thanks to...

@jameswfortune for the brilliant product shots and stunning product photography!

@megankstory for the beautifully styled studio shots!

@raissaleme_ for modelling our rings!

story:
Unlike other thin wallets, Stealth Wallet was made to last and was built to be practical and durable.

It can carry 8 cards at a time, is RFID protected, and has a ballistic bungee loop to easily hold & slip in cash - all while being ultra thin.

Best of all, Stealth Wallet stays ultra-thin even after stuffing it with cards and using it overtime.

 

Five years ago, I broke my back riding BMX. During recovery, I realized sitting on my thick wallet was causing serious back pain. So I took it out and set it by my hospital bed. Next thing I know, it’s gone!

Maybe bulky wallets don’t make your back hurt, but they sure are uncomfortable and extremely ugly in your pocket (unless you like having a tumor on your butt). 

Sure, you can put it in your front pocket - but unless you’re looking for a confidence booster, having a bulge in the front is not very appealing either.

So enter in thin, minimalist wallets... 

When I looked into the options for minimalist wallets, I immediately saw problems. 

First off, the wallets weren’t even thin enough - especially after putting in cards! They still created bulge and, at least for me, still gave me back pain!

Next was the durability. All the wallets I found were cheaply made and wore down easy. The pockets would stretch (making it bulky), the seams would rip, the material would degrade. Within a few months, I would have to replace them.

Last, and this was the most difficult, they didn’t carry enough cards. Each wallet company kept telling me that 1 or 2 cards was more than enough for my needs. They would even say there was a “bonus” 3rd and 4th card slot. Seriously? 

I had to constantly switch out cards for my needs and even misplaced my ID a few times! Not to mention, I couldn’t carry any cash.

I needed a wallet that was ultra-thin, even when full, strong enough to hold up to my active lifestyle, and made to last.

So me and my team went to search for the most advanced technical materials science had to offer. The wallet material had to be super thin, ridiculously strong, ultralight, and sustainable.

We also developed a never-before-used Exo design that uses your cards to provide structure to the wallet - eliminating internal layers that add unnecessary thickness.

After countless designs, engineering tests, and prototype iterations, we finally did it. 

A truly thin wallet that is built to last and will carry everything you need without creating bulk - all in a classic bifold design.

We used a military-spec ballistic material that is 15x stronger than steel and thinner than a razor blade. This next-gen material is the same stuff in body armor used by the military and keeps your Stealth Wallet from stretching, tearing, breaking, or wearing out.

Our wallet material is the newest breakthrough in material science and is currently used in body armor, car armor, motorcycle gear, cut-resistant gloves, mining & tow ropes, and air cargo nets in the military.

Don't believe us? Check out a group of strong men trying to destroy the Stealth Razor Wallet.

Not only is our material strong, it’s incredibly thin & lightweight! The material itself is much thinner than a razor blade making it perfect for ultra-thin wallets.

No more stretched out wallets! We only used the best materials and stitching so you won’t have any baggy pockets after you stuff your Stealth Wallet full of cards and cash.

Stealth Wallet is made to last. From the material to the manufacturing, we made sure every aspect of the Stealth Wallet was designed, engineered, and chosen to stay strong and durable for a long time.

Stealth Wallet will last you much longer than your typical wallet and most definitely longer than other “thin” wallets.

While most slim wallets only have space for a couple cards, we refused to compromise. The Stealth Wallet’s patent-pending design uses offset card slots to optimize capacity without creating bulk. As a result, you can carry 8 cards plus cash in an ultra-thin minimalist wallet. It’s just better engineering.

Stealth Wallet can hold up to 8 cards securely in its innovative slot design. Cards can be easily seen and accessed from the slots - so you don’t have to fumble around to get the one you need!

Most wallets (even “thin” wallets) use a piece of cheap cardboard or plastic to give structure to the wallet. Stealth Wallet uses a patent-pending Exo design that lets your cards provide structure to the wallet and doesn’t need any additional internal layers to keep structural integrity. This keeps your wallet exceptionally thin, even when it’s packed!

Our structure design is completely unique to Stealth Wallet and has never been seen or used in wallets before!

Maximize accessibility and usability with card stacking. Get to your cards quickly and easily without forgetting what pocket they’re in. 

Our patent-pending ballistic bungee cash loop holds cash in place with easy removal and better cash organization. Slip cash in and out without having to fold any bills or fumble in a pocket. 

Our ballistic bungee is powerfully secure. Your cash is firmly locked in your wallet until you want to take it out. No folding needed!

The bungee lets you easily take out your cash without any fumbling, searching, or unfolding. Simply flip to find your bill and pull to remove it. Get the exact bill you need quick and easy.

You can even use your cards without taking them out with the quick card slide feature!

Our bungee loop makes it easy to search through your bills without removing them. Quickly find and grab your bill while keeping the rest of your cash tied down.

All Stealth Wallets are protected with RFID-blocking lining. This keeps your information secure from data and credit card theft. Travel safe and worry-free wherever life’s journey takes you.

Keep your ID ready at all times. Stealth Wallet comes with an ID Window so you don’t have to fumble around with your ID or mix it with your credit cards.

This is particularly unique for a slim wallet since the window usually adds thickness. We avoided this unnecessary thickness by getting rid of the plastic typically used in the window and using our special design to maintain the structure of the wallet.

Our Stealth Razor Wallet is perfect for all kinds of adventures.

Made to survive even your craziest journeys. Stealth Razor is as tough as you are and will stick with you through all of life’s adventures.

Whether you carry it with you every day or only during active moments, the Stealth Razor will never hold you back.

Stealth Razor is sweat and water resistant. The special material can actually float! This makes the Stealth Razor the best adventure wallet out there.

The Stealth Razor is also ultralight - weighing only 3.9 grams when empty. That’s lighter than a sheet of paper!

Stealth Razor is also 100% vegan and completely free of animal products for all you animal lovers! 

Our Stealth Leather Wallet is perfect for your everyday carry as well as your dressiest occasions. We use super-slim premium performance leather from a European tannery with nearly two centuries of experience. 

Sustainably made, our leather is environmentally certified, and every hide used is a byproduct of the meat industry.

Stealth Leather is made from specifically sourced leather that was made to last. This isn’t your cheap watch strap leather. Our leather is specially chosen and created with  time-proven, state-of-the-art techniques to ensure they don’t degrade quickly overtime.

Stealth Leather Wallets will age nicely with character - rather than wear down in quality and aesthetics overtime.

Super strong, ultra-thin, and extremely practical - Stealth Wallet is made for the modern adventurer. We made zero compromises and ensured that, no matter what, you only receive the absolute best.

Whether you’re heading to the boardroom or to the beach, flying on a plane or jumping out of one, commuting downtown or hiking Half Dome, Stealth Wallet is made for you.

We’re Airo Collective. We design high-quality products built for adventure, durability, and extreme functionality. 

We believe that your carry shouldn’t hold you back from living your adventures and want to make products that help you step deeper into living your life with freedom.

Life is a journey - Live Free.

Steve has been a leader of people in not-for-profit settings for decades as a teacher and pastor. A lifelong inventor, Steve has always thought of ways to help people through innovation, design and engineering. He assisted in building and designing the largest BMX park in Northern California and has been a founding race team member for Kinetic Cycle since 2009. He loves the outdoors and is also a National Champion gold medalist mountain biker with many USA Cup wins.

Jake previously planned and ran operations for a firm in San Francisco managing a portfolio of ~$200m in real estate. Jake is passionate about the outdoors, environmental sustainability, and eating amazing food. He loves woodworking and exercise of all kinds and spends a lot of his time in the gym, on a trail, on a bike, in the water, or on a basketball court.  He is also a 3rd Degree Black Belt in TaeKwonDo - so his friends are always glad to have him around when traveling.

He loves the outdoors and is also a National Champion gold medalist mountain biker with many USA Cup wins.Jake previously planned and ran operations for a firm in San Francisco managing a portfolio of ~$200m in real estate. Jake is passionate about the outdoors, environmental sustainability, and eating amazing food. He loves woodworking and exercise of all kinds and spends a lot of his time in the gym, on a trail, on a bike, in the water, or on a basketball court.  He is also a 3rd Degree Black Belt in TaeKwonDo - so his friends are always glad to have him around when traveling.

story:
Help keep artisans employed in Appalachia and score some awesome handcrafted Jewelry!

What's not to like?


Nora Swanson Arts is based in Berea, Kentucky. We create wonderful pieces of jewelry and interior design using copper, bronze and other metals as well as delightful semi-precious stones.

If you like our work, please back our project

Our little traveling Art-Show

We've driven over 300,000 miles and given our "pitch" to over a hundred thousand people at art shows across much of the eastern United States.

Now, thanks to Indiegogo, we can come directly to you!

 

Our goal is to get as much Nora Swanson Arts "anti-bling" into the hands of as many Swansonistas as possible!

 

 

Our Vision

What started out as a "spacious" 1200 square-foot studio has lately become PACKED with raw materials: 96" x 36" sheets of copper and bronze; 4'x8' sheets of plywood and MDF; various shapes and sizes of steel for table-legs, substrates and so forth; boxes of scrap which we "self-recycle" -- digging through smaller and smaller pieces to use until all that's left is tiny chips; inventory; soldering  and welding supplies; tools that we only use occasionally (like our bead-roller that we use about once a year - but when you need a bead-roller, nothing else will do); worktables; and lots of shelves to store things.

The bottom line is, we're crowding ourselves out of our own studio and its become apparent that we cannot continue to use our art studio for a storeroom.  The space needs to be reserved exclusively for making art and storage needs to be done in another building. 

So, what to do?

We can buy a premade shed, spacious enough for our needs and have it trucked in and set on blocks for $5000. This is a superior method compared to building it ourselves, for a number of reasons:

  • One, if we have it built offsite and trucked in, we don't need a building permit and we don't need to have it inspected. If we build it ourselves, we need to apply for a permit and explain why we "need" another building on our property. If the city decides we don't "need" it; no permit. Also, part of the permitting process involves a waiting period while the city gathers opinions, pro and con, as to whether or not should be allowed to build; again, another chance for the project to be torpedoed when all of that could be simply and easily avoided by having the shed prebuilt and trucked in. Plus there's the waiting part of the waiting period and -- don't forget -- the two inspections. If we fail either one of the inspections, theres even more delay while we fix whatever caused us to fail the inspection. If we have the shed trucked in, there's no inspection required at all. Between the waiting period and the inspections, that makes for a lot of waiting around. The longer we wait, the longer we're struggling trying to move about our overcrowded studio. All of that is avoided, again, by buying a premade building and having it delivered. In short, there's a lot of ways things can go wrong if we try to build the shed ourselves and almost no way things can go wrong if we have it prebuilt and delivered. It really is the best way.
  • Two, we travel about six months out of the year; with layovers at home of usually two days a week, Two days wherein we are madly building more art pieces to sell on the road. That doesn't leave us a lot of time for building a shed.
  • Three, we're metal artists, not wooden shed-builders. While I'm reasonably certain we could build a shed if we absolutely had to, from an economic and time-management standpoint, it makes sense to "stick to our knitting" (jewelry and interior design) and pay someone whose field of expertise is making and delivering sheds. "Division of labor": It's worked for centuries. We see no reason to buck that trend now.

In short, buying the shed and having it delivered and set up, while slightly more pricey than building it ourselves (but only if we ignore the cost of our own labor) is, on the whole, a far better way to go to get the storage capacity we so desperately need.

Having to come up with an additional $5000 on top of our monthly expenses is a daunting task.

Having a shed means we can work better, faster, make more stuff and more kinds of stuff that you can enjoy, but only if we have room to make it in. Do you see the conundrum? We can't make more money to be able to buy a shed until we can clear some room to allow us to take on more and bigger projects so that we can make more money to enable us to buy a shed!

We've set up a tempting array of some rather lavish rewards for those of you intrepid enough to back this project. We hope you'll see something you really like and we can make a deal.

We like making deals

Just so you know, this isn't our first rodeo:

  • Our work has been juried into the Kentucky Crafted program, administered by the Kentucky State Heritage Cabinet; making us full members of "Kentucky Crafted"

  • We are members of Louisville Arts Guild
  • We're also members of the Kentucky Guild of Artists and Craftsman
  • Niche Magazine "Top Ten Trendsetter" in Fashion Jewelry in North America.

Here are just some of the galleries where our work has been shown:

    Completely Kentucky
    Copper Moon Gallery
    Indigenous
    Skipping Stone Studios
    Sevigny Studio
    The Greatest Gift
    Merlin’s Silver Star
    The Wild Fern
    Malgorzata's
    Happy Valley Gifts
    Abler Art Glass Gallery
    Handtiques
    North Street Market
    All Things Original
    SwellColors Glass Studio
    Dancing Colours Studio
    Isherwood & Company
    Whidden Hill
    Kapfer Glass Studio
    River's End Gallery, LLC
    Spirit Dreams
    MindWorks Gallery
    Abundant Living Gallery, LLC
    Gallery at 3040 Main Street
    FlyPaper!
    IT'S YOU! Art Gallery
    Layne’s Country Store
    Tin Cup
    A Point of View Gallery
    In The Mood
    Gallery of Fine Art
    TAS design & craft gallery
    Artisan's Collection
    Valley Originals
    Live An Artful Life
    Earthen Vessel Gallery
    Artisan's Collection
    Out on Main
    Caribbean Trading Company
    Truly Bluegrass
    River's End Gallery, LLC
    Indulge Gallery

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Optimism rules and Opportunities never cease. We started Nora Swanson Arts over 10 years ago and we have, combined, over 60 years experience in the art business.

We're very confident in our ability to meet demand for this project. The "exclusive" pieces have already been made and are resting comfortably in their glass case (case not included with purchase), anxiously awaiting news of who their new owner will be! We've also made a goodly supply of our "popular" items and if we run low, no worries. We can make more. We've done this before; a couple of times! So, as before, even if you're the ONLY person who backs us, you'll still get your pieces. We have a fully equipped (if extremely primitive) shop. So, if any contingencies arise, we've got them covered. And we're pros at shipping. We've been shipping our work for many years. So again, you have nothing to fear. If any unforeseeable setbacks or delays occur, we'll be sure to let you know, ASAP!  We realize we're a mighty small fish in a mighty big pond. But nothing was ever accomplished by saying, “I can't”. This is just the start.

Join us! With your help, we can make good things happen!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people, no matter how much they may want to, just can't contribute monetarily.
    We understand that. And it doesn't mean you can't help
    Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign
    Put us on Facebook and Twitter and all of your social networking sites
    Don't forget the Indiegogo share tools

So, whether it's by spreading the word through social media, buying an inexpensive art-piece, or buying a top-of-the-line legacy-piece, there are lots of ways to move things forward. We are grateful for your interest in our work!

Thank you!

Chart showing relative increase in "fun" while wearing Nora Swanson Arts jewelry

 

THE PERKS:

Let's face it: We both know you're here for the goodies too, right? So, let's get on with the show!

Pick your pleasure and we'll make sure that it hits your castle doorstep ASAP!

 

1) Novus Cygnum Saeclorum

"The New Swan for the Ages"

Our stalwart foot-soldiers. For your contribution to our cause, you will receive THIS incredible postcard:

with actual images of our jewelry in its natural habitat, signed by the artists,  AND a heartfelt "Thank You!"

 

 

 

Dedicated Swansonistas will remember our Nutmeg patina. It's been a fan-favorite for some time. Here, we proudly present for the first time to the world at large, an entire collection:

 

2) "Dame Swansberg"

Below are the pieces in the $20 category:

(a) Cleopatra's Treasure

     

 

(b) Circles of Repletion

 

(c) Oval Ornaments

 

(d) Terrific Trapezoids

 

(e) Tempting Triangles

 

 

3) "Baroness Swancastle"

Below are pieces in the $35 Range:

 

(a) Charming Chevrons

 

(b) Petite Domes

 

 

4) "Contessa Swansonia"

The $50 range is easy (and there's another one just below this one), just match Charming Chevron cuff to any one pair of five pairs of earrings!

We've provided a menu at check out to help with your selection. Contact us with if you have any questions!

(a) Charming Chevron + Cleopatra's Treasure

(b) Charming Chevron + Circles of Repletion

(c) Charming Chevron + Oval Ornaments

(d) Charming Chevron + Terrific Trapezoids

(e) Charming Chevron + Tempting Triangles

 

5) Contessa Swansonia II

Second verse, same as the first! This second part of the $50 range is just as easy as the first part; Just match a Petite Dome cuff to any one of five pairs of earrings!

(a) Petite Dome + Cleopatra's Treasure

(b) Petite Dome + Circles of Repletion

(c) Petite Dome + Oval Ornaments

(d) Petite Dome + Terrific Trapezoids

(e) Petite Dome + Tempting Triangles

 

6) "Duchess Swantastic"

The next three sets of earrings, below, are in the $85 range:

 

(a) Lemon Drops!

What could be more fun?

There is one downside though; This is the ONLY pair! Better order now!

 

(b) Spiny Oyster Shell!

This is the only pair of these as well

 

(c) Tiger-Eye and Sea Foam

Only one pair of these exists, also

 

Next Up:

7) "Princess Swan Lake I"

 Any pair of earrings in this collection may be had for only $125:

(a) Genuine Kingman Turquoise in a Fire Patina with Fine Silver bezel and Bronze Filigree

This is the only pair; when they're gone, they're gone!

 

(b) Genuine Kingman Turquoise with Fine Silver bezel and Bronze Shell motif

Here too, we have the only pair in existence; she who hesitates, has no earrings!

 

(c) Genuine Kingman Turquoise with Fine Silver bezel and Bronze Leaf motif

You guessed it! This is the only pair!

 

(d) Genuine Kingman Turquoise in Fire Patina with Fine Silver bezel and Bronze Shell motif

One pair only

 

(e) "Spinners" - Genuine Kingman Turquoise in dark patina with Fine Silver bezel

the only one of its kind

 

 

Princess Swan Lake II

The second half of our "Princess Swan Lake" Collection: Any pair of earrings here, may also be had for only $125:

(a) Genuine Kingman Turquoise in dark patina with Fine Silver bezel and twin-leaf motif

there's only one pair

 

(b) "Trapezoids"; Genuine Kingman turquoise with Fine Silver bezel and bronze filigree

one pair only

 

(c) "Drops"; Genuine Kingman turquoise with Fine Silver bezel and bronze filigree

in the end there can be only one!

 

(d) "Ovals"; Genuine Kingman turquoise with Fine Silver bezel and bronze leaf motif

yet another "singularity"

 

(e) "Diamond"-shaped (please note, there are NO actual diamonds in this piece!), dark patina with bronze filigree

One pair only

 

And that, my friends, closes out both of our "Princess Swan Lake" collections.

Also, please note, NO Princesses were harmed in the making of this jewelry!

So... happy so far? Then let's step boldly into our next category which is the lovely

 

8) Empress Swan

All five pieces in this category may be had for a mere $250 each

(There is only one of each)

 

(a) An austere bronze band with Kentucky agate, fine silver bezel and copper twist detail

 

(b) "Anticlastic" cuff with Kentucky agate, copper bezel

 

(c) Dark patina, heavy rope twist and Kentucky agate

 

(d) Genuine Kingman turquoise with bronze leaf motif

 

(e) Bold, dark patina, heavy braid boarder, triangular Kentucky agate

 

 

9) Regnate Magnus Imperium

Our "Legacy" pieces. Each piece is one-of-a-kind and can be added to your collection for only $500

 

(a) Massive marbleized "blood" Kentucky agate on a super-comfy "anticlastic" bronze cuff.

Sure to impress!

 

(b) Our super-gnarly "hedgerow" braid with Kentucky agate and ornate leaf detail

a bold piece that clearly speaks for itself!

 

(c) "Gold-on-Gold", our signature "Nutmeg" patina on bronze with "Golden" Kentucky agate!

A born winner!

 

(d) Genuine Kingman turquoise on bronze with attractive leaf motif

from the last turquoise mine in America!

 

(e) A Triple Treat! Three matched stones; Kentucky Agate; on a gracefully tapered bracelet

Three times the fun!

 

Now, you may be thinking: "Why is there only one of each piece? You guys are artisans! Can't you make more?"

Yes, of course we can make more. But the nature (and some would say "the charm") of handmade pieces is that they are never exactly duplicatable; there will never be pieces of turquoise ( or Kentucky Agate) exactly like these pieces, and we'll never do metal work that exactly duplicates these pieces.

With that in mind, if you've seen a piece anywhere on our IGG page that you like, and you think you'd like something similar, please contact us via email. We'll do our best to fulfill your wish. Thanks!

 

10) Design your own piece with us, online:

$1500

An online consultation and design session hosted by Nora in which you can design your own piece! After your online session ends, we will proceed apace with the final layout and drawings which we will submit, within the next several weeks, for your approval. Pending approval, we'll begin work on the piece that you designed, and ship it to you ASAP!

 

  11) Super Fan/Super Tour!*

Eleven! That's one more!

$5000

Meet Nora and Dale! Tour our studio and grounds. Enjoy a home cooked, gourmet meal with us!
AND help design your own original art-piece which will be signed by us and shipped, free of charge, to you when it's finished.
A photo of this fabulous piece will be displayed forever on our website along with
YOUR portrait listing you as a "Designer" for Nora Swanson Arts!
AND, when you're all done, enjoy a relaxing night's sleep at the historic Boone Tavern. We'll even tuck you in!
Travel extra.

*(Why is the Super Fan/Super Tour not available until December? For a very simple and good reason: When our IGG campaign ends, we will be scrambling madly to fill orders and make any additional items needed. As soon as that's done, the Art Show Season begins. We will then be traveling, five days a week, to Art Shows around the eastern half of the country, On the two days that we're home, we're either unloading the truck, making more pieces to sell, or loading the truck and preparing to leave for the next Art Show. That doesn't leave us a lot of time for entertaining and in any case, we wouldn't be much fun! The Art Show season ends in late November and then we'll have time to tidy up a bit and prepare to receive visitors! So, that's why we can't have you over until December. Sorry! On the plus side, winters are generally mild here and you can enjoy our fantastic wood-stove while we tour the studio and design your jewelry! We'll buy the beer! That's not so bad, eh?)

 

EXTRA! EXTRA! NEW PERK ARRIVES TODAY!

 

12) Metal 'n' Stone*

$350

Our large-sized HEAVY hand-tooled "Fugly" bracelet, matched with our banded cuff/banded stone bracelet. The perfect his'n'her combo for any occasion!

*Limited Edition

 

 

 

So, what else is new?

Sometimes, we get asked, "Besides making jewelry, what else do you do?"

We're glad you asked! Check out the video below to find out a bit more about us. This clip will give you more of a feel for our operation and how we like to do things. We're "old school"; smokin' hot metal and big hammers! We're definitely not building smart watches!

If you like our work, you can click the BACK IT button at the top-right of the page to donate any amount for no perk.

Oh! And the next video is a bit further down the page. Thanks!
 

 

 

Where does the money go?

In our case, that's relatively easy to answer:

A big chunk of our monthly expenses go to studio overhead including,

  • The mortgage: we own the studio, so someday, we'll be done paying for it! But for now, we have to keep paying or the bank won't let us use it anymore!
  • Utilities: Water and electricity; We heat with wood, but we use a lot of electricity for lighting; fans; (you need exhaust fans when you're welding and soldering so you don't poison yourself with the fumes!), power tools - drills, sanders, grinders and so on; the welder uses a lot of electricity; all of the jewelry gets washed thoroughly, multiple times - that uses a lot of water.
  • Raw materials: copper, bronze, silver, stones, wood
  • Expendables: solder, flux, welding rod, welding gas (argon), acetylene, sandpaper, glue, grinding wheels, cutting wheels, drill bits
  • Depreciation on tools: The major tools; the welder, the drill-press and other expensive items all wear out eventually, and so do pliers and sheers and files and angle-grinders and saws. Hammers never wear out, for some reason. "Depreciation" means you're setting aside a portion of the value of that tool over time, so when it comes time to buy a new one, you have the money.

The rest goes to:

  • Paying our part time helpers
  • Paying ourselves

We run a pretty tight ship here. Our "new" truck is five years old. We do nearly all of the maintenance on it ourselves. We cut and split wood rather than use gas or electricity for heat. "Wood warms you twice", remember! We cool the studio in the summer, using an ingenious device that I invented (without cooling, the studio interior reaches 120 degrees Fahrenheit in the summer!). That will be subject for a another crowdfunding campaign in the near future. Yeah, I know that's a tease! Deal with it! Or donate a buck and get on our mailing list!

Picking up an extra $5000 for a shed is not going to be easy, but with your help, we can do it!

 

 

Stretch Goals:

Assuming we exceed the goal set out for this campaign and we get a shed installed and we make more working room in our studio, the next step, which is our first "stretch goal", is to acquire a "brake". A brake is a sturdy, precision machine that will allow us to make accurate bends on large pieces of metal very quickly. A brake of the design we need to do the work we want to do costs about $9000; delivered and set up.

Currently, we can do this type of bending by hammering, but hammering is a very slow and tedious process and extremely prone to error. With a brake, as long as one makes accurate measurements, the bending is nearly foolproof! This will speed up production; allowing most bending jobs to be done in minutes rather than days. This will allow us to greatly reduce costs (not to mention saving a lot of wear and tear on our many-decades-old wrists and elbows!). That's our first "stretch goal" for this campaign, and if we don't quite get there, we'll start a new campaign with new perks very soon. So, if we hit $14,000 that gets us a brake, and we've nearly reached another of our goals of being able to produce large wall-art pieces entirely "in-house". Ambitious? Yes! "Fortune favors the bold"; No one ever achieved a big, hairy audacious goal by staying home hiding under their bed! 

The third element, and our second "stretch goal" -- on the road to producing larger pieces in-house -- is a "cabinet table saw". A "cabinet table saw", which we will refer to as simply a "table saw" hereinafter, is a highly precise, large table saw used for making extremely accurate cuts in wood. Currently, we use a hand-saw with a guide; a method that is, again, very slow and prone to error. A table saw allows us to be quick and accurate -- speeding up the work and allowing us to make better art.

A table saw adequate for our needs, delivered and set up, is about $5000. So, if we reach $19,000 we're adding the table saw to the mix and we're able to create the larger pieces we want to create. Again, everyone who contributes to this campaign is on the list to be notified when our larger art-pieces are begun.

  • Don't forget to ask about our "Hidden Perk"!

 

If you like our work, please back our project
