story:
UPDATE 2: I did an interview with Good Day Sacramento! We talked about chainmail and bow ties.  You can check it out here: http://gooddaysacramento.cbslocal.com/video/109...

UPDATE 1:  Due to popular demand, hair bows are now available!  They're the same as the Standard or Premier bow ties, but you'll be able to pick that option when the post-campaign survey goes out in December!


That's the philosophy behind Chained Beauty Designs; to create new, fashionable, eye-catching pieces using old-world techniques.

My name is Peter, and I've been making chainmail for five years. When I started to get serious about my craft, the idea to make unique, never before seen pieces was always the goal. Well that time is now, and the first step is to make some seriously awesome bow ties.


I hand-make each bow tie from a mix of anodized aluminum and EPDM rubber rings. The result is a lightweight, soft bow tie that's completely unique. The first one that I made was such a hit, I knew that I had to make more of them. I've received a lot of good feedback and advice while making my initial patterns, and have worked and reworked them until I was able to make a comfortable, easy to wear tie without sacrificing any design capability.

For this run, I've created eight initial patterns for people to choose from, and have broken them down into two categories: Standard and Premier.




There are nine different colors to choose from, and each bow tie is made from up to two different colors. That's a lot of different combinations, making for some unique bow ties.

*Colors can vary slightly from batch to batch, such as one orange turning out a little brighter, or a purple having more blue hue in it*


Each bow tie normally comes with an band made from soft, double-lined elastic. The kind that wont pinch so it's comfortable to wear against the skin.

However, a bow tie can be upgraded to a chainmail band by adding $5 to your pledge. This is just to cover the cost of materials and extra construction time for the band itself. The chainmail will be a bit more durable than the elastic, but both are equally comfortable to easy to put on.

You can also choose to have your bow tie made into a hair clip, at no additional cost.  The clips are woven into the bow itself, to keep it strong and reinforce it enough to hold the bow in place.

A survey will go out after the campaign is finished, in order to find out what colors/designs everyone wants, and you'll be able to pick your preferred attachment then.

Custom Bow Ties

There are a few reward tiers that give you the option of creating your own bow tie. Each one of these will have the chainmail strap (because you're awesome), and can incorporate as many colors as you'd like. I'll be in constant communication with everyone that chooses one of these. Because each one will be made using a unique design, they will take a bit longer to get out to everyone.


Treasure Box

One of the things I've worked a lot with is Structured Chainmail, i.e. 3-Dimensional chainmail statues and pieces that are solid and hold their shape incredibly well. Using these techniques, I'm offering a few special people a custom chainmail box that will fit their bow tie in it. I'm still working out the design, but will post an update during the campaign with prototypes and the finished version.


Titanium Bow Ties

Titanium is fun. It's tough and lightweight, even more so than aluminum. It can also be anodized into different colors too! Since it's a different meal alloy, the coloring can be quite different, focusing mostly on pastels. It's not a cheap material to work with, but it can create an even more unique bow tie, so I'm offering to make one for any interested person.


Sterling Silver Bow Ties

Now this is just fancy. Who doesn't want to show off how classy they are with a bow tie made completely out of sterling silver, including the attachment strap? Like the titanium bow ties, I'm offering these up to anyone that wants one. I'm offering to make these only during the campaign, as the cost of material makes these prohibitive to make normally.


There's still a lot that needs to be done, and this is simply the first step. Because each of these ties are handmade, the majority of my time during the campaign will be dedicated to the pre-work of making a lot of bow ties, such as:

  • Securing Supplies

  • Making an Inventory

  • Answering Questions

  • Putting out any other fires that come up

The goal is to be able start work the moment the campaign is finished, so I'll be in constant contact with everyone. There will be a few surveys that will go out before the end so I can get a gauge of the amount of each color I'll need, and what designs I'll be making the most. After the campaign closes, I will be in touch with those individuals that have ordered the custom bow ties. My goal is to be shipping everything out by the end of May. This is the largest project I've done to date, so I made sure to give myself plenty of time to get everything together and allow for any hiccups that may occur.

Sharing this project is real important. I'm going to need your help to get the word out there, so please consider spreading the word. You can also like my Facebook page, it's where I post progress photos and finished pieces.


I am but one man, and as such production is based on my hands not falling off. I'm confident that I've estimated the proper amount of time to produce and ship enough orders. If things get crazy, I can quickly expand my production by bringing in others from my network of chainmail artists.

Supplies can be another concern. I have multiple sources for much of the material, but there is always the chance that a certain color of rubber rings might be on backorder everywhere. The worst possible scenario is that it delays a few orders. Because of this, planning ahead, as well as keeping a constant inventory of supplies is important.

But the rewards are much, much greater, especially in the long run. Outside of the actual bow ties themselves, this is another step towards bringing chainmail back into modern culture. By showing the interesting and unique things that can be made using these old-world designs, we can show that chainmail isn't simply used for costumes and historical reenactments, but rather has a much larger breadth of uses.


What are these made from?

Each bow tie is made from a mix of anodized aluminum and EPDM rubber.

The anodizing process gives the aluminum it's color, while also making it much, much stronger. This allows for a tough metal that's lightweight, and has permanent color that wont fade or chip off. EPDM is a polymer of rubber that's sanitary and food-safe, being used in many parts of the food industry. Because of this, it makes for a great rubber to use in chainmail, as it doesn't have any adverse reactions to skin.


I want more than one bow tie, how do I add more orders to my pledge?

Simply add the dollar amount of a second, third, or twelfth bow tie to your pledge. You can still upgrade each one to a chainmail attachment by adding an additional $5 per tie.

If the campaign is successful, emails will go out soon after it's ended with questionnaires to determine what colors and patterns you'd like, and if you've requested multiple ties, an area for those as well.


How do I pick the design and colors that I want?

If the campaign is successful, emails will go out soon after it has ended with questionnaires. Filling this out will tell me what patterns and colors you want for your bow ties.

story:
Dr. Nate Logan works as a Rehabilitation Specialist in Baltimore, MD, and has an Education Specialist and Psychology degree from Liberty University located in Lynchburg VA.  He has over 10 years experience in rehabilitation and lives for helping individuals in the community. He has been noted to possess strong analytical skills in the areas of communication and in his tendency to make customer service his number one goal.  He has also worked for the United States Navy as an Administrative Specialist and was a member of the Presidential Honor Guard. He enjoys such outside activities as swimming and joining in basketball games. He also appreciates good movies and reading books, especially those written by Derek Walcott or Edwin Abbott, as well as “Dracula” and the “Lord of the Rings” trilogy.

My invention is different because there are no other comfortable socks out on the market that protects the toenail from being damaged. The Jock sock has five toe inserts with gel coating that protects the toenail from being damaged and avoids having your toenail come off.

This invention is an improvement on what currently exists. My invention is different because it not only helps athletes of all sports, but also individuals who are diabetic that are having problems with their toenails.

Athletes need protection especially in physical sports because having a damaged or broken toenail, which may eventually come off hurts for an extended amount of time.Plain socks just don't work for protecting the toenails when it comes to physical sports.

The Jock sock should be handmade and the toe protection made from gel can for instance work by absorbing shock and abrasions, thus protecting the toenail from injury. It can be used both as a preventative measure, e.g. ,football, basketball, baseball, when hiking, or to protect your toes in any sport and in cases where you may have an already sore area such as an ingrown nail.

Please share the Jock Sock with friends and family around the world.  We need to make this happen for athletes in all sports. "No more damaged and irritated toenails."

story:
Shadow Heart by HIROYUKI is innovative jewelry that elegantly casts a silhouette of the heart symbol.

It is a special gift, especially for the one you love or for yourself. There is no greater force than love, and the Shadow Heart speaks to this love in a charming way. Love is invisible, but felt even in the absence of another's embrace. It's an eternal link, binding two hearts. Unseen, but ever present. As you or a loved one wears the Shadow Heart, you feel the love of its shadow.


The best time to see The Shadow heart.

Facing the sun on a sunny day, between the hours of 11am and 2pm, will create the perfect heart silhouette. It can also been seen when standing under a bright light. 

The Origin of the Shadow heart

I have designed products all over the world including Japan, Korea, China, UK and the USA. As a designer, I have a dream to create objects that evoke emotion. Jewelry is the is perfect subject to make that dream come true. For me, the challenge of designing jewelry was not just creating the shape, but portraying it’s meaning in a unique way. The concept of the Shadow Heart is to cast the silhouette of a heart from an object, making it a better representation of love. It is present and felt, but not always seen.

  • CAD rendering of Shadow heart necklace

  • CAD rendering of Shadow heart ring

  • Sketches

The Shadow heart size

  • Necklace length

  • Ring size (I will ask you by e mail when the funding process completes.)

The Shadow heart will be made in NY, USA

The Shadow heart by HIROYUKI will be made in NY, USA. All pieces will be cast with precious metals such as platinum, 18K gold, and sterling silver. All Shadow heart designs are copyrighted by HIROYUKI, and Patent pending.  "Shadow heart" is a Trademark of HIROYUKI.

The Shadow heart Ring made of sterling silver.

The Shadow heart Necklace made of sterling silver. (Silk string)

The Shadow heart Ring made of 18K Gold.

The Shadow heart Necklace made of 18K Gold. (Gold chain)

The Shadow heart Ring Diamond Edition which is made of platinum and has three inlaid Diamonds.

The Shadow heart Necklace Diamond Edition. The pendant is made with platinum and includes three inlaid diamonds. (White gold chain)

story:
One Fantastic Lady...

Virginia Henetz wasn't just a spicy full-blooded Italian with a fierce love for friends and family; she was also a talented cook who kept a kitchen with an open invitation.  Virginia Henetz made meals so good they brought people together.

Let's invite her back for the holidays.

To honor Virginia's tradition of creating community through cooking, this holiday season the Henetz family and friends will:

  • Provide a week of meals for the clients of OPCC, a community organization serving our neighbors most in need in West Los Angeles, and
  • Personally serve an evening meal of Grandma's famous cacciatore and antipasto for the 35 residents of OPCC's Daybreak Shelter on Monday, December 9th. (Let us know if you'd like to join us!)

Why YOU ought to get cooking with us!

On any given day, 170 homeless people are depending on OPCC for temporary shelter, case management and 3 hot meals. That's 3,570 meals a week. OPCC really makes a dollar stretch: $2,104 will provide a whole week of meals for every resident.

By providing a basic need, like hot meals, we are helping OPCC's clients to focus on their many other challenges, like physical ailments, substance addiction, and mental illness.  Therefore, the larger benefit of these full plates isn't just satisfied tummies, it is the freedom we provide to a small group of people to truly transform their lives.


Please help; donate a few bucks now :)

This season, the Henetz family has committed to providing a week of full plates and an evening meal for our neighbors, please join us!  Together, we can help to empower a few more of our neighbors this holiday season.

story:
Here's your chance to pick up these Italian made sunglasses at wholesale pricing and help some dreams stay alive by participating in a our marketing campaign.

Our efforts with this project are not just to continue to build our company and support the athletes. This campaign helps SikkShades better understand which frames are being chosen with each contribution.  This allows us to advise and help our distributors as well as make better decisions in our factoring of SikkShades by Eddie Bauer,Jr

"SikkShade by Eddie Bauer Jr prides itself in supporting the underdog -- the privateer scraping enough money to get to the next event or the Olympic hopeful who just needs a bit of assistance getting to the qualifying run. We have formed alliances with a number of athletes who are at the top of the game or on the verge of breaking out.

SikkShades by Eddie Bauer Jr has always been and will always continue to give  back support that will allow these athletes to pursue their dreams. That's what SikkShades are all about: the eyewear of choice for those who live their dreams."

We are now asking for your to help build those dreams further. Allowing SikkShades to not only provide designer, game changing eyewear but continue our efforts in helping the underdog."  Eddie Bauer, Jr.


SikkShades by Eddie Bauer Jr is a registered trademark and a brand unto itself. SikkShades are not affiliated with Eddie Bauer LLC in any way. 


Handmade in Italy, the SikkShades brand stands on its own by incorporating breakthroughs in design with new technology. 

Showcasing these innovations are our two flagship frames:

The perfectly weighted and balanced Huckleberry, a slightly over-sized wayfarer,

Alessi800 Clear Frame Huckleberry w/red iridium lens

Black Huckleberry w/blue iridium lens


 and

The classic wraparound design of Qualifier.

White Qualifier w/red iridium lens

Black Qualifier w/blue iridium lens


In the beginning

I had no desire to slap my name on someone else's frame and call it my own. I wanted to make great, stylish sunglasses that were durable yet fashionable.

Tired of the overpriced monopoly I perceived in the marketplace, I set out to design frames that were:

Affordable, and 

Out-performed what was available. 

The vision was clear. The road ahead -- not so clear. Looking back, it’s safe to say I had no idea the journey I would travel to realize the dream. 

I knew I wanted sunglasses that were stylish enough, safe enough, and durable enough for outdoor-oriented people to wear during their chosen pursuits. 

The best way to learn their preferences was to ask. I consulted with many, many action sport athletes -- as well as Olympic hopefuls in many disciplines – asking questions and taking notes. 


I took those notes to a designer I had the good fortune of becoming friends with who has helped some of the world’s biggest brands. A fan of what I was trying to accomplish, and the extensive field research I had performed, he agreed to collaborate. 

Our work then led me to the doorstep of one of the oldest independent eyewear manufactures in Italy. They brought my designs to life. Here the Iconic Huckleberry and Qualifier were born. 


About design

Both designs features perfectly weighted and balanced frames that reduce pressure points and fatigue. Both are fitted with locking quad core hinges that will not bore -- keeping the temples nice and fit.

During my countless pre-design interviews I knew that once perspiration began, many frames slid down the athlete’s nose. 

To prevent similar discomfort and irritation of skin against plastic, I fitted SikkShades frames with a flush, padded, nonslip nose cradle. 


About the lenses

In today’s marketplace the word “polarized” helps sell sunglasses. Big brands know that with it comes a pricing premium of typically a hundred bucks or more.

Polarized lenses vary wildly in quality and construction. Because of this, shades costing under $50 featuring cheap polarized lenses can harm and stress the eyes. Some can make the wearer nauseous. 

The SikkShades technology is Carl Zeiss's Flash Electric Coating. This process infuses the iridium of our lens, which enables it to outperform polarized in many tests measuring glare, clarity, and UV protection. 

"Polarized lenses allow more light to come in to the eye than the pupil actually can "see." In a sense, the polarized lens fools the eye and doesn't screen the harmful light rays, allowing more light in than your eye can safely handle." -David Solomon editor (Nutz and Boltz).

  • Now I'm no doctor or scientist I am only presenting what other doctors and scientists have found in their research and reports may vary. I am only offering a durable,stylish equal alternative to polarized lens and not looking to berate them.

(Without Flash Electric)                                              (With Flash Electric)


The big bonus with SikkShades Flash Electric lenses is that you do not get the prism and distance distortions that come with a polarized lens. 

Those distortions are why pilots, golfers, Olympic snowboarders and accuracy dependent athletes do NOT wear polarized lens. They cannot see instruments or properly judge distance as acutely as they need to in order to sustain top performance. 

The final design touch

The "Sikk Groucho" embedded metal moustache badge is a design icon we added as a classy classic signature of the Eddie Bauer Jr that will identify the eyewear line for many years to come.


Testing and distribution

Now that we have had months of testing – including wind tunnel tests to prove performance – we have samples in inventory and distributors lined up. But in order to grab a greater market footprint and increase public awareness, we need you!

The big brands do not want to see SikkShades out on the market. Value and performance comparisons will force them to change their performance frame marketing and pricing. 

SikkShades has a large and growing following and will continue to educate the public about sunglass technology. 

The current brand giants don't want people to know the ins and outs of sunglasses. We do. Yes it would have been easier to just put in polarized lens and follow along but that ain’t my way. 

My way is to build the glasses the way they should be built, price them so everyone who wants to wear SikkShades can, and trust that a quality value-priced product will always foster reference sales and repeat buyer loyalty.

But in order to get our contracts with these distributors we can't have hiccups. We must get into production. With just a bit of support from the community we can achieve our next step in the dream: facing off with the giants.

Retailers are licking their chops to display SikkShades by Eddie Bauer Jr in the window.

 

How you can help

To see for yourself, order and test-drive a pair of these cutting edge iconic frames with matching iridium lens at cost –- roughly half of retail price. 

Be first among your friends to be seen with the SikkShades by Eddie Bauer Jr frame on your face, before they hit the mainstream. 

If you would like to support our efforts we have a few of affordable options for any budget.

Our Athletes

Mike Alessi and Kyle Cunningham signing autographs at Phoenix Supercross.

Multi time Gold medal in MX enduro and Snowskate Phil "Samgical" Smage

Amatuer Florida surfer Nate Lyons heading out for a session

Olympic hopeful Nate Kern doing his thing

In closing, 

I want to thank you for taking the time to read all this and giving the SikkShades project some thought. Sign up for our emails at our website for specials promo codes. Updates will be abundant (and we won't forget you on your birthday, either). Visit www.SikkShades.com for more information.

Best of luck always with all of your outdoor pursuits and we'll see ya at the beach!



OUT TAKES

story:
Hallo World. / WRUFF!

We are The Dogs BolloXX! No seriously, that’s our name. We are a London start up focused on Human Pet Play Accessories and high quality Fetish Kit.

After 1 ½ years in business we want to bring the puppy’s n kittens of this world one more way to show whosagoodboi. With our own line of T-shirts and Tags!

No Idea what a human puppy is? Watch the video of our Crufts Show at the London Fetish Fair:


The funding will be used for:

  • Producing the first marge of T-shirts (7 Styles)
  • Producing paper tags for the shirts
  • Producing the first marge of Tags
  • Advertisement


What you give and what you get

Our perks reach from “belly rubs” to “Full Tank” which includes one of every shirt in your size, one of every tag in your chosen colour and, here it comes: One of what ever else we will release under the TDB Fashion line in addition to the first motives and tag styles over the next 12 month. Planned products are as followed below. Send out to you once we have it. (Surcharge for international shipping.)


What comes then?

We are planning on releasing after the success of the initial campaign: more shirt styles, our own puppy bandanas, a pride flag in rubber, genuine leather wrist wallets in puppy pride style and/ or with paw prints and… now wait for it… Bleachers with a paw print on the back pocket and a two-way zipper for tails! ARRROUUU! Sorry, I got carried away.

But first we want to stay humble and start off with shirts and tags to see if you pet players out there care for our vision as much as we do.


Other ways to help:

If you like our Idea but you’re not a pet player, prefer blouses over t-shirts or need the money for a new tail; you can still help us by spreading the word on social media or telling all your waggy friends.

Thanks You!

The Dogs BolloXX – We like it WRUFF!

story:
Findables ties your real and online life seamlessly

 

FINDABLES FAMILY OF PRODUCTS

"Findables is one of those innovative products that as soon as you see it you wonder why it doesn’t already exist, because it makes so much sense." - PAD GADGET

"With a Findables account, a Personal Digital Fingerprint and several tags, the things you care about are safer and other people can connect with you easier." - APPS RUMORS

"I like the idea, and I think the cases are a nice touch" - GOTTA BE MOBILE

What does being "Findable" mean? 

Findables is About.me... on steroids! And connected to the real world! When you become Findable, you create a personal page, a business page, even a lost and found page in case you lose any of your stuff. The options are limitless.

And we make it easy to put a Findables Digital Fingerprint on anything, from your iPhone case to your dog. With a quick scan, you can share the right profile, with the right person, at the right time.

When you are at a work related event, you can have your Digital Fingerprint on your phone scan to your business profile that details what you do, and makes it easy to connect on LinkedIn. No more business cards!

Just a 1 dollar pledge will reserve your customized URL NOW!  

You can use Findables on your stuff with our fingerprint embedded mobile phone and iPad cases, and tags. You can even assign a Digital Fingerprint to anything with our Findables stickers! 

 

 

The Findables Case : Unassumingly simple design

Our cases, designed in San Francisco, CA., are lightweight, form fitting, and sleek, with a minimalist design. 

  • 100% polycarbonate with anti-static finish repels dirt, dust, and lint in order to keep your device looking new
  • Ergonomic ports ensure your fingers (and headphone jacks) find exactly what they are looking for at any time
  • Two-piece design allows mix n match colors and easy access to docks 
  • Large camera aperture eliminates annoying flash reflection

We built our favorite iPhone case, adding the Findables platform to the mix is just a bonus!

iPad (2 and new) cases will be available - As well as iPhone 5!

iPAD CASE IN NEON ORANGE

  

Android Lover? We got you. The Galaxy S3 Case

THE BEST CASE FOR THE BEST ANDROID

Colors!

All items are available in 7 colors plus 2 Glow-in-the-Dark options.

AVAILABLE IN 7 COLORS

 

Glow in the dark!

GLOW FOR IT!

 

Currently, our cases are in pre-production.  With your support, we plan to start shipping in October as well as launch additional items, build an awesome accompanying app and get into stores quickly this fall. Please take a look at the amazing packages we have put together for you! 

Thanks for your support!

story:
Because of the economic situation, many programs have been cut from the school system home economic being one of them. Male and Female students will be taught the basics of sewing, how to read a pattern, cut properly and construct, the funds will be used to help purchase; sewing machines, sergers, body doubles, scissors, thread, notions etc.. also literature for my students.

My students will receive a certificate of completion at the end of the 6 week course; final step is a fashion show where they will model their garment.

Thanks

Gloria Smith

story:
Introducing VoidScan

With the same size as any standard credit card or debit card, VoidScan is a convenient RFID protector. All you do is slip it into your wallet, and it will scramble electromagnetic waves to keep your data safe from high-tech thieves. Unlike RFID wallets or RFID sleeves, VoidScan fits right inside the wallet you already own. This is the simplest, most affordable RFID blocking option there is.

 

What does VoidScan do?

   

VoidScan blocks unauthorized scanners from stealing your information

See the Science! 

Because of its transparent design, VoidScan makes it possible for you to see how everything inside it works: utilizing a skeletal transparent design, you are able to see the RFID microchip, transmitter wire, and antenna that jams incoming signals. A node where technology and art meet, VoidScan puts science on full display for you. We hope that our device piques people’s interest in how the technology works!

 

Why do I need VoidScan?

Our lives are becoming easier as contactless card payments become even more popular, but the risk of theft is growing. RFID technology is the solution you need to prevent thieves from accessing your credit or debit card using scanning devices that anyone can buy online. RFID combined with Near Field Communication (NFC) jamming technology, is the defense strategy that we have built into VoidScan in order to keep you safe from identity theft and data skimming once and for all!

 

How do you use VoidScan?

Place the VoidScan card in the middle of your wallet to protect all RFID-enabled cards in wallets up to 4cm (1.6in) thick!  Contactless payment can still be used as normal - just ensure VoidScan is held at least 16cm away when making tap payments.

Protects Wallets up to 4cm thick!

 

Why Choose VoidScan?

 

What does VoidScan Protect Against:

Operating at the 13.56MHz frequency, VoidScan protects all your credit cards, debit cards, driver’s licenses, and passports.  VoidScan uses variable power jamming to automatically detect and interrupt any RFID/NFC reader and protect your data. VoidScan will not jam signals from office key cards or apartment tags, which typically operate at the 125 kHz frequency, so you can still conveniently access your building without removing VoidScan from your wallet.   

 

 

 

What is RFID Theft and Why Is It Dangerous? 

 

Contactless Payments Are Everywhere

What is RFID?

RFID stands for Radio-Frequency Identification, which is the technology that allows you to make contactless payments. It is convenient because it requires no pin or signature, however by using a modern scanning device, anyone can scan RFID chips from as far as 20 feet away, putting your personal information at risk.

How does RFID technology work?

RFID tech uses a small chip and an antenna to relay information from credit and debit cards to contactless scanners, serving the same purpose as a barcode or magnetic strip on the back of a card. Contactless payment cards are convenient as they don’t need to be in direct contact with the scanner to work and don’t require a PIN or signature. However, the long-range nature of the technology enables an RFID chip to be read from up to 20 feet away with a high-powered skimming device – compromising personal data.

Where is RFID used?

Most of your credit cards, debit cards, passports, and driver’s licenses use RFID at this point. In addition, most RFID enabled credit or debit cards will carry the following sign:

 

Indicating your data is at risk of being scanned from RFID readers

Scanners can easily steal your data

International Delivery

VoidScan will offer international shipping to all our supporters during the Indiegogo campaign! Shipping times will vary from 1-2 months starting December 2020. 

Warranty

The Team of Engineers behind VoidScan's design believe in its reliability and durability to protect your data, which is why we offer a 5 year warranty for every card. Every Backer will be given the VoidScan card combined with our full-inclusion warranty!

What We Need & What You Get 

Our team has fully designed and tested VoidScan.  Right now, we have come to you for help in raising funds we need to manufacture, market, and distribute VoidScan on a global scale. To show our appreciation, we are offering some exciting rewards for contributors, including early access to VoidScan and discounts on multiple units! We have been funded over our current goal of CAD $10,000, on Kickstarter and would like to extend the early rewards to backers on Indiegogo! 

Other Ways You Can Help 

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for VoidScan by sharing a link to our campaign on any social media platforms you use. Spread the word far and wide! Facebook and Instagram are all suitable avenues for letting your friends and family know that convenient, stylish RFID protection is finally here! We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

FAQs  

Who needs VoidScan?  

Everyone who wants to protect their information! Anyone with a payment card, passport, or driver’s license can conveniently be protected from identify theft.

What does VoidScan do?

It automatically stops criminals from electronically accessing your personal information.

Where does VoidScan fit?  

You can place VoidScan in any wallet, purse or with your identity cards/travel documents. For wallets thicker than 4 cm, we recommend placing a VoidScan card on both sides.  

Really... why do I need VoidScan?  

For the price of a couple coffees, VoidScan will protect your cards and identity. Don’t leave yourself susceptible to fraudsters and thieves!  Other RFID blockers come in the form of flimsy sleeves or bulky wallets while VoidScan allows you to protect and use any wallet of your choice. 

How long will VoidScan work? 

VoidScan uses the latest auto-recharging technology to permanently emit jamming signals as long as it is placed in your wallet. There is never any charging required! We also offer a 5-year warranty for every card! 

Is it safe to use VoidScan? 

VoidScan will only jam incoming RFID readers from stealing your data; it will not affect your cards from working or emit any harmful frequencies to yourself. VoidScan does not do any damage to your cards, and you can still use contactless payment by simply ensuring cards are 16cm away from VoidScan when using your credit/debit tap function. 

Risks and challenges

VoidScan has been fully designed and tested to protect your wallet for years, backed by our full inclusion 5-year warranty your RFID needs will be fully covered without pause. VoidScan has completed the final production ready design and is committed to deliver an effective and unique product worldwide at an affordable price.

We have streamlined all of our processes behind the scenes and have been working closely with a trusted manufacturer for the past 2 years.

As with all projects there will always be a delivery and manufacturing risk and our team has worked relentlessly to minimize these risks.

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

Designed with durability in mind, this product is made to survive impacts, extreme temperatures, and wear & tear. VoidScan's ability to prevent jamming does not degrade over time.

Sustainable Distribution

Sustainability is a key pillar in VoidScan's philosophy. All products are shipped in sustainable and compostable flat envelopes.

All you do is slip it into your wallet, and it will scramble electromagnetic waves to keep your data safe from high-tech thieves. Unlike RFID wallets or RFID sleeves, VoidScan fits right inside the wallet you already own. This is the simplest, most affordable RFID blocking option there is. What does VoidScan do?   VoidScan blocks unauthorized scanners from stealing your informationSee the Science! Because of its transparent design, VoidScan makes it possible for you to see how everything inside it works: utilizing a skeletal transparent design, you are able to see the RFID microchip, transmitter wire, and antenna that jams incoming signals. A node where technology and art meet, VoidScan puts science on full display for you. We hope that our device piques people’s interest in how the technology works! Why do I need VoidScan?Our lives are becoming easier as contactless card payments become even more popular, but the risk of theft is growing. RFID technology is the solution you need to prevent thieves from accessing your credit or debit card using scanning devices that anyone can buy online. RFID combined with Near Field Communication (NFC) jamming technology, is the defense strategy that we have built into VoidScan in order to keep you safe from identity theft and data skimming once and for all! How do you use VoidScan?Place the VoidScan card in the middle of your wallet to protect all RFID-enabled cards in wallets up to 4cm (1.6in) thick!  Contactless payment can still be used as normal - just ensure VoidScan is held at least 16cm away when making tap payments.Protects Wallets up to 4cm thick! Why Choose VoidScan? What does VoidScan Protect Against:Operating at the 13.56MHz frequency, VoidScan protects all your credit cards, debit cards, driver’s licenses, and passports.  VoidScan uses variable power jamming to automatically detect and interrupt any RFID/NFC reader and protect your data. VoidScan will not jam signals from office key cards or apartment tags, which typically operate at the 125 kHz frequency, so you can still conveniently access your building without removing VoidScan from your wallet.      What is RFID Theft and Why Is It Dangerous?  Contactless Payments Are EverywhereWhat is RFID?RFID stands for Radio-Frequency Identification, which is the technology that allows you to make contactless payments. It is convenient because it requires no pin or signature, however by using a modern scanning device, anyone can scan RFID chips from as far as 20 feet away, putting your personal information at risk.How does RFID technology work?RFID tech uses a small chip and an antenna to relay information from credit and debit cards to contactless scanners, serving the same purpose as a barcode or magnetic strip on the back of a card. Contactless payment cards are convenient as they don’t need to be in direct contact with the scanner to work and don’t require a PIN or signature. However, the long-range nature of the technology enables an RFID chip to be read from up to 20 feet away with a high-powered skimming device – compromising personal data.Where is RFID used?Most of your credit cards, debit cards, passports, and driver’s licenses use RFID at this point. In addition, most RFID enabled credit or debit cards will carry the following sign: Indicating your data is at risk of being scanned from RFID readersScanners can easily steal your dataInternational DeliveryVoidScan will offer international shipping to all our supporters during the Indiegogo campaign! Shipping times will vary from 1-2 months starting December 2020. WarrantyThe Team of Engineers behind VoidScan's design believe in its reliability and durability to protect your data, which is why we offer a 5 year warranty for every card. Every Backer will be given the VoidScan card combined with our full-inclusion warranty!What We Need & What You Get Our team has fully designed and tested VoidScan.  Right now, we have come to you for help in raising funds we need to manufacture, market, and distribute VoidScan on a global scale. To show our appreciation, we are offering some exciting rewards for contributors, including early access to VoidScan and discounts on multiple units! We have been funded over our current goal of CAD $10,000, on Kickstarter and would like to extend the early rewards to backers on Indiegogo! Other Ways You Can Help Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for VoidScan by sharing a link to our campaign on any social media platforms you use. Spread the word far and wide! Facebook and Instagram are all suitable avenues for letting your friends and family know that convenient, stylish RFID protection is finally here! We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.FAQs  Who needs VoidScan?  Everyone who wants to protect their information! Anyone with a payment card, passport, or driver’s license can conveniently be protected from identify theft.What does VoidScan do?It automatically stops criminals from electronically accessing your personal information.Where does VoidScan fit?  You can place VoidScan in any wallet, purse or with your identity cards/travel documents. For wallets thicker than 4 cm, we recommend placing a VoidScan card on both sides.  Really... why do I need VoidScan?  For the price of a couple coffees, VoidScan will protect your cards and identity. Don’t leave yourself susceptible to fraudsters and thieves!  Other RFID blockers come in the form of flimsy sleeves or bulky wallets while VoidScan allows you to protect and use any wallet of your choice. How long will VoidScan work? VoidScan uses the latest auto-recharging technology to permanently emit jamming signals as long as it is placed in your wallet. There is never any charging required! We also offer a 5-year warranty for every card! Is it safe to use VoidScan? VoidScan will only jam incoming RFID readers from stealing your data; it will not affect your cards from working or emit any harmful frequencies to yourself. VoidScan does not do any damage to your cards, and you can still use contactless payment by simply ensuring cards are 16cm away from VoidScan when using your credit/debit tap function. Risks and challengesVoidScan has been fully designed and tested to protect your wallet for years, backed by our full inclusion 5-year warranty your RFID needs will be fully covered without pause. VoidScan has completed the final production ready design and is committed to deliver an effective and unique product worldwide at an affordable price.We have streamlined all of our processes behind the scenes and have been working closely with a trusted manufacturer for the past 2 years.As with all projects there will always be a delivery and manufacturing risk and our team has worked relentlessly to minimize these risks.Environmental commitmentsLong-lasting designDesigned with durability in mind, this product is made to survive impacts, extreme temperatures, and wear & tear. VoidScan's ability to prevent jamming does not degrade over time.Sustainable DistributionSustainability is a key pillar in VoidScan's philosophy. All products are shipped in sustainable and compostable flat envelopes.

story:
There is nothing more uninspiring than a boring blank wall.

That's why we have created the SprayPrinter


SprayPrinter is a device that delivers designs and images from your smartphone to any wall.

It's like with good live music - every time someone interprets a tune, their way of playing gives the piece a unique and never before experienced touch.

On your Smartphone you have to have the SprayPrinter application that is included in the price. From there you choose the design you like or upload your own and load it to the printer via Bluetooth. Once that is done you are ready to set up your phone on a stable platform or a tripod facing the camera toward the wall you want to decorate. You can adjust the size and the position of the design by moving the phone closer or further from the wall. You can see how the design will look on you wall through your phone’s screen. Now you are ready to print.

While you are printing the design on the wall, your phone tracks every movement of the printer and knows its exact position all the time. We’ve achieved that by combining several sensors on the printer plus the computing powers of the Smartphone. The printer has an LED light that is tracked by the Smartphone’s camera. This gives us a rough position of the printer. But to really pinpoint the position we’ve added an accelerometer and a gyroscope to the printer. So by combining data from the sensors with phone’s data about the position of the LED we get the accurate position of the printer in real time. Once we know where the printer is it is simple to decide for the program weather to release the pixel or not.

The other big part of the printer is the mechanics. Our core innovation is fast acting electromagnetic valve that can open and close up to 200 times per second. This means you can print up to 200 pixels per second giving you the freedom to move your hand freely just as you would with the regular paintbrush.


SprayPrinter works best with MTN94 water based colours that are suitable for both in- and outdoor use. You can get those colours from all around the world.


SprayPrinter community

It's fun to print a selfie once, but for professional designs we are creating a platform, where the owners of SprayPrinter can purchase designs from professional designers. 


PRESS KIT

story:
Interested in writing about us?

Please feel free to email us directly at pr@maisonwasabi.com

 

 

Our company was established 6 years ago . Continuously designing, developing, and producing products to be professionally delivered. We have the expertise and experience to manufacture high-quality furniture and home accessories.

Our products are 100% handmade in our workshop. Products are produced under a strict quality control before packaging, managed by our professional and organized team in order to provide you with the highest quality products.

We live on a planet where everything and anything can happen :) Whatever the issue, we will ensure you, that you will receive the product that you pledged, and should you have any inquiry our professional team will always be available to reply and assist you.

For us, trust and satisfaction is our motto and you naturally deserve it.

Any inquiry? Drop us a message to: info@maisonwasabi.com

story:
It all started with a simple idea, a dream to make the World a better place...

FlipSlips are foldable designer flats on the go that can easily fit into a small purse or a pocket. We have reduced the shoe to the size of an iPhone and made it fold so that it doesn't get your belongings dirty.

The FlipSlip's Unique Patented Technology is the only shoe that folds sole-to-sole and has a reversible upper so it is compressible and hygienic.

 

 

FLIP SLIP DESIGN PROJECT ON INDIEGOGO

WATCH OUR PRESENTATION ON YOUTUBE: http://youtu.be/w3uuwEhkCfs

Hey Indiegogo! We’ve all had this problem before. It’s the end of a grueling workday or a fun night out. You’ve been looking good rocking those heels but now all you want to do is kick back and relax. Wouldn’t it be great if you had a pair of on-the-go comfortable flats to slip into?

Introducing the FlipSlip! The 2nd pair that EVERY woman needs.

Say "Goodbye" to walking the city streets barefoot, and say "Hello" to a relieving stroll back to the car, or walk home.

What are FlipSlips?

FlipSlips are The World’s First and ONLY compact shoes to fold sole-to-sole. They can be conveniently taken anywhere. We’ve worked hard to design a shoe that folds down to the size of an iPhone to easily fit into a small purse or pocket, perfectly within arm’s reach for when that moment comes along. You’ll be relieved knowing that unbelievable comfort is just a Flip Slip away!

The patented technology is simple and easily folds or unfolds in mere seconds!

Thanks to its hygienic design, The FlipSlip is the ONLY shoe on the market to fold sole-to-sole which means all the dirty parts are kept inside.

Its slim design allows it to be taken everywhere. It’s quality neoprene upper makes it waterproof, yet breathable for all occasions. The padded, foam cushion insole makes walking a comforting breeze.

Flip Slip is TRULY an all-purpose shoe and we love it!

We’ve come a long way to get to this point and wish to spread the love and joy we’ve experienced with others even more.

One of the next steps to achieve this is to create new designs to satisfy the growing demand’s different tastes! We understand that this is going to take time, money, and plenty of help from those around us and this is what brings us to IndieGoGo and our Community Design Project!

We strongly believe that the solution lies in working with our supportive communities and enriching the lives of others. We launched the Community Design Project to increase the designs in our collection and are doing so by actively involving the creative artist community in the process.

We called on artists from all over the U.S. to help us create the newest Flip Slip Foldable Shoes Collection. 


They each had a couple of weeks to create the design and build a prototype and were given our pre-existing design to use as the base. In exchange, they received an opportunity to have fun sharing their talent with the world, receive full recognition for their work, learn about the process behind making shoes, as well as get a chance to be fairly compensated along the way; each artist will receive 25% percent of the profit from their designs. A golden opportunity during such tough economic times.

 

But in order to truly make this a success, we need your help! Although this is a competition, with your help – ALL designs that meet our factory minimums will be made. All the artists can win. All of us can take one step towards achieving our dreams – together.

So this brings us to our next “step,” which is explaining in more detail, the benefits of supporting this campaign.

For as low as $20, you can get the ultra compact SLIM-Flips --- it has a soft foldable sole, and it’s great for emergency back-up use. You will also get an invitation to our San Francisco Launch Party in August and make a charitable donation to Kiva.org, a non-profit on a mission to alleviate poverty by empowering entrepreneurs through micro-loans.

 

For $35, you can also get our Classic Flip Slips in your choice of 32 different colors! You will have a chance to vote on the top 5 colors, and ALL of our shoes come with an expandable Flip-Tote bag to carry your other shoes in.

Starting at $49, you can take part in our Community Design Project and support our fellow designers:

There are 3 categories, which are The Embellished Collection, The Shoe Aficionado Collection, and The LUX Collection.

You can take a look at our Designer Gallery to see each one and learn more about each design and artist. Please Hurry! The first 200 purchases for each category will receive a 15% discount on their order.

For those who can’t decide, we also have a MYSTERY Shoe that will be the first design and category to reach 200+ pairs. Purchasing the MYSTERY design will also include a pair of SLIM-Flips as a thank you for your support.

We want to bring you a high-quality, handcrafted replica of the original artwork made by each artist. Our factory is ready to go and we already have all the molds and everything we need to get going. The only thing that we need to get going is money.

So how does this work exactly? 

It’s simple. You donate. You get a pair and in turn, help us meet our fundraising goal of $20,000+ for this to be a smashing success. As an added bonus, by pre-ordering a pair of our designer shoes, you’ll also get to take part in the entire creative process and provide feedback on the final design, as well as receive photos and be kept posted on the progress of your shoes.

We are seeking Retailers and Distributors to help us SPREAD the love even more!

If you’re as excited as we are, and want to really make a difference in our campaign, become a distributor, where you will be THE FIRST to get 12+ pairs of FlipSlips at wholesale price before they hit stores! They also make for GREAT gifts.

Anyone, Designers or Sponsors alike, will also have the option to create their own design with our FlipSlip Technology and receive 200 pairs of customized shoes.

Join Us.

We’re always on the lookout for passionate individuals and calling on artists to help with our project. If you want to join our team and work together to achieve our dreams, e-mail us at info@flipslip.com

We hope you’ll love FlipSlips as much as we do. REMEMBER: There are two BIG ways you can support us, you can Like us on Facebook and [SPREAD] the word to all your friends about our project, or donate and receive a pair of our shoes!

Thanks Indiegogo! We’ll see you on the Flip Side!

-

--
The Benefits

Replica of Winning Design

CHOOSE FROM THE FOLLOWING CATEGORIES FROM OUR COMMUNITY DESIGN PROJECT:

 

Receive a pair of FlipSlips! Support your favorite artist and their work and put your favorite design into production.

A "winning design" is one that meets the factory minimum of 200 pairs. If we can exceed our campaign goals (with your help) we will make more designs as we meet the factory minimums so you'll have more designs to choose from.

ALL SHOES THAT MEET MINIMUMS WILL GET MANUFACTURED.

(All of our FlipSlips come with an expandable FlipTote Bag to carry your other shoes). Depending on availability, we will try to accommodate more colors and sizes.

 

--

DESIGNER GALLERY

MEET OUR TALENTED DESIGNERS

 

Designer #1: "Jupiter Exterra" by James Foster Jr.

$79.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select LUX Collection)
$90.00 - Regular Price (Select LUX Collection)

 

 

Watch a Video about the Jupiter Exterra: http://youtu.be/0UM37u7uh4I

See Photo Album: http://bit.ly/KekKu9

The Jupiter Exterra is an athletic sneaker that is comfortable, durable, flexible and folds for easy compact storage in a small gym bag or purse.

Artist's Bio: James Foster Jr. is a Product Designer with an extensive background in 2D/3D CAD, visual communications, retail merchandizing and consumer marketing. 

*Available in men's and women's sizes. We'll accommodate as many sizes and styles as possible.

 

 

Designer #2: "Metallic Strappers" by RAYMONDCHO

$79.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select LUX Collection)
$90.00 - Regular Price (Select LUX Collection)

View the Color Collection and Romanticly Ruching: http://bit.ly/KhWJVE

About Metallic Strappers:

Artist RaymondCho wanted to put the straps in a much more fashion forward way using thinner straps and placing them along the back and wrapping the ankle of the foot.  This metallic finish can come in gold or silver or copper or colors that utilize metallic material. Features a bit of a point for a more interesting and fashion-forward look. The backing that supports the strap can come up 1 inch - 2 inches as long as it sits just on the ankle or above it. This shoe can be worn with a cocktail dress after a party to show off straps or with any shorter bottom piece in any other occasion to best show off the full design of the shoe. 

About RaymondCho: http://bit.ly/JMms8F

 

 

Designer #3: "Exotic Romance" by Meline Katchi

$79.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select LUX Collection)
$90.00 - Regular Price (Select LUX Collection)

CHECK Out Exotic Romance in Detail: http://bit.ly/LLJvzA

Exotic Romance.

About: Meline Katchi is Co-Founder of Sophisticated Primitive at Sophisticated Primitive, Shoemaker [Traditional Shoe Construction], Industrial Design Student at Art Center College of Design at Nu Sole.

 

 

Designer #4: "Peep Toe Antoinette" by Michele Woodford

$79.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select LUX Collection)
$90.00 - Regular Price (Select LUX Collection)

CHECK Out Peep Toe Antoinette in Detail: http://bit.ly/Lmxkd8

The Peep Toe Antoinette Flip Slip in ivory is a great alternative to the classic bridal shoe, can be used as a "second pair" for dancing, or for the reheasal dinner, and then tossed in the honeymoon bag for romantic dinners.  

Featuring a crystal pull tab and beaded French style lace, the Antoinette is also adorned with a vintage style faux shoe clip.

Artist:Michele Woodford, formally a 7th Avenue Knitwear Designer for Calvin Klein Ltd. and Parsons School of Design graduate, now resides in beautiful Marin County, CA.  Currently known as ifanhour on etsy.com Michele designs one of a kind and alternative wedding gowns and accessories and pursues eclectic and sustainable design projects.

 
 

Designer #5: "Heart Deco" by Don Bloom

$64.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)
$74.00 - Regular Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)

 

 

About Heart Deco: Bloom tried to design a shoe that will work with a lot of clothing styles. The Art Deco design gives this shoe a more elegant look and the heart theme is one that is very popular in all types of fashion. The embellished bottom of the heel with an embossed design that echos the top design elements.

By Artist: Don Bloom graduated from the Art Institute of Chicago with a BFA and has over 30 years experience in the commercial art field, concentrating on package design, portraits, illustrations and fine art. Recently he designed a number of metal Art Deco elements for the historic  Wiltern Center in LA. Check out his unique stainless steel license plate designs < www.PL8EFX.com >


 

Designer #6: "Urban Flip Slip" By Agnese Purvinska

$64.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)
$74.00 - Regular Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)

"Urban Flip Slip" is a Party Version of the Original Flip Slip.

It is covered in Neon Green Fishnet Stocking with Additional Glossy Vinyl Detail. A play on a classic Chanel Ballet Flat with an Urban Twist.

About: Agnese Purvinska is an artist in New York City, who spends her days pounding the sidewalks in what always turn out to be the least comfortable shoes. She is thrilled to have finally come across comfortable versatile flats to change into.

 

 

Designer #7: "Neon Jungle Series" by Malarts

$64.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)
$74.00 - Regular Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)

Neon Jungle Series can be viewed at: http://bit.ly/JbpLlp

80's inspired print from everyone's favorite creature: the party animal!

Artist's Bio: Malarts is an illustrator and digital designer by trade, and a multiple medium artist on his own time. His interest are finding ways to reconcile traditional art & craft with modern technology and tools. You can see some of what Malarts is up to here: http://www.malarts.net

 

 

Designer #8: "Sunkiss" by Lilian Lane

$64.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)
$74.00 - Regular Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)

Sunkiss: Main focus of the design was color and print. The orange satin on both the toe and the heel give it a chic look with the help of the bow which makes it playful. The print has a hint of orange which ties the shoe together and makes it kind of uniformed. The medallion in the middle gives the shoe a little attitude and conservativeness at the same time.

Submitted by Lilian Lane, Washington, DC.: Creative Fashion Director, Branding and Management Enthusiast. About: http://bit.ly/J0Tfbd

 

 

Designer #9: "ProduceKicks: GoGo Grapes" by Aaron Duncan

$64.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection) $74.00 - Regular Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)

Go-Go Grapes Photo Album: http://photobucket.com/pkproduce

A plum purple FlipSlip with apple green elastic straps and silken vine embroidery across the front, inspired by fresh produce and colors. Ideal for outfits of bold colors and pairs well for wine tasting.

Please inquire about Produce Kicks Go-Go Grapes and PK Preppy (alternative design) available in children’s (girl’s) sizes.

About Artist: Aaron Duncan, a huge sneaker enthusiast, founder and owner of Produce Kicks, a work-in-progress project, was born and raised in Chicago but now lives in Sacramento, Calif., working with local youth. When not at work, he practices yoga, sings and rhymes a lot, is a huge sports fan, and has a love for fashion and eating fresh fruit. 

 

 

Designer #10: "Sautéed Heartbeat Designs" by Amanda Zaccone

$64.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)
$74.00 - Regular Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)

Aesthetic Design Description: This design is from Amanda's "Spring Theory" series of fine art paintings which is a collection of abstract images  which emphasize color, shape-form, and line work. Additionally, "Spring Theory" is an exploration of atmospheric space. Each exciting design is expressive and unique.

Artist Bio: Amanda Zaccone holds two Associates of Arts degrees from American River College, a Bachelor of Arts degree in Art with emphasis in Drawing and Painting and a Teaching Credential in Art from Sacramento State. In addition to her love for Art, she is passionate to share these experiences with others and would like to combine that with a teaching career.

Amanda is currently a figure drawing art model at many Sacramento area colleges including those where she received her education and continues to explore her artwork and various projects while pursuing her ultimate career goal as a college professor of Art.

 

 

Designer #11: "Painted FlipSlip" by Jena Woodfork

$64.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection) $74.00 - Regular Price (Select Shoe Aficionado Collection)

 A painted FlipSlip by artist Jena Woodfork.

 

 

Designer #12: "Paradise" by Chad Berwald 

$49.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select The Embellished Collection)
$56.00 - Regular Price (Select The Embellished Collection)

A  Bird of Paradise is hand painted using fabric paint. The flower compliments the structure of the Flip Slip. Perfect for the spa, walking around the garden, or taking along on a tropical vacation.
Availble in black (first) and in different color backgrounds as availability permits.

Artist's Bio: Chad Berwald, Ventura County,CA. Berwald has been using fabric paint to create t-shirt designs as well as silk- screening. His series " Blooming" has been in local art shows in San Francisco such as Pancakes and Booze Art Show and Trickster Events, Aline's Closet boutique and now at Hair To Dye For Salon. Find out about Berwald's work at: http://www.chadberwald.com/

 

 

Designer #13: "Meow" by Linda Marie

Early-Bird Price $49.00 - (Select The Embellished Collection)
Regular Price $56.00 - (Select The Embellished Collection)

Meow Detail Photo: http://bit.ly/L2pzWm

Meow is a leopard print bow with rhinestones and a rose patch at toe. Love patch at side rear. Perfect shoe for loafing around the house, or taking on a Safari expedition. 

About Designer Linda Marie: www.shapeofmyart.net 

 

 

Designer #14: "The Strap Marquee" by Art & Mayhem

Early-Bird Price $49.00 - (Select The Embellished Collection)
Regular Price $56.00 - (Select The Embellished Collection)

Strap Marquee detail photo: http://bit.ly/JQjPRG

Artist's Statement: When we received the FlipSlip we felt the design reflected a basic simplicity that we wanted to maintain for convenience and comfort. The Strap Marquee “The Shoe That Expresses Comfort Each Step of the Way” will display positive words/phrase on the strap, preserving the FlipSlip font style on silkscreen. This shoe speaks from the soul, here are some ideas that came to mind to express our comfort:

- Moving On
- Little Steps
- Kick It
 

Funders will have a chance to submit and vote on phrases to display on the Strap Marquee. Perfect for a more personalized gift for a loved one.

 
About Art & Mayhem: Gabriel Alcaraz is a seasoned artist from the Los Angeles area that has experience in the art of tattooing, fashion design, murals, innovative creations and formal presentations.
 
 

Designer #15: "Flip Slip Flats" by Matthew Ronan

$49.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select The Embellished Collection)
$56.00 - Regular Price (Select The Embellished Collection)

Flip Slip Flats: With an iconic and classic design these solid color Flip Slip Flats will be your go-to shoe, looking chic with any spring or summer outfit.

Please choose your favorite color pictured when selecting. Top color will be made availble first and additional colors will be made available as permitted.

Bio: Matthew Ronan is a fine artist and designer from San Francisco, California. While he works at a Film Studio in Marin County,  he is also selling his own Fine Art, and Jewelry in a few local SF boutiques. See more of his work at www.MatthewRonan.com
 
 
 

Designer #16: "Maid of Honor" by Geneva Forte

$49.00 - Early-Bird Price (Select The Embellished Collection)
$56.00 - Regular Price (Select The Embellished Collection)

The "Maid of Honor" is the perfect back-up shoe to bring along to a wedding or to give to all the bride's maids after the ceremony is over, the photos have been taken, the cake's been cut, and it's time for the real party to start! This shoe will be available in ivory for the design base.

story_txt:
It all started with a simple idea, a dream to make the World a better place...
FlipSlips are foldable designer flats on the go that can easily fit into a small purse or a pocket. We have reduced the shoe to the size of an iPhone and made it fold so that it doesn't get your belongings dirty.

The FlipSlip's Unique Patented Technology is the only shoe that folds sole-to-sole and has a reversible upper so it is compressible and hygienic.

 

 
FLIP SLIP DESIGN PROJECT ON INDIEGOGO
WATCH OUR PRESENTATION ON YOUTUBE: http://youtu.be/w3uuwEhkCfs

Hey Indiegogo! We’ve all had this problem before. It’s the end of a grueling workday or a fun night out. You’ve been looking good rocking those heels but now all you want to do is kick back and relax. Wouldn’t it be great if you had a pair of on-the-go comfortable flats to slip into?
Introducing the FlipSlip! The 2nd pair that EVERY woman needs.
Say "Goodbye" to walking the city streets barefoot, and say "Hello" to a relieving stroll back to the car, or walk home.
What are FlipSlips?
FlipSlips are The World’s First and ONLY compact shoes to fold sole-to-sole. They can be conveniently taken anywhere. We’ve worked hard to design a shoe that folds down to the size of an iPhone to easily fit into a small purse or pocket, perfectly within arm’s reach for when that moment comes along. You’ll be relieved knowing that unbelievable comfort is just a Flip Slip away!
The patented technology is simple and easily folds or unfolds in mere seconds!
Thanks to its hygienic design, The FlipSlip is the ONLY shoe on the market to fold sole-to-sole which means all the dirty parts are kept inside.
Its slim design allows it to be taken everywhere. It’s quality neoprene upper makes it waterproof, yet breathable for all occasions. The padded, foam cushion insole makes walking a comforting breeze.
Flip Slip is TRULY an all-purpose shoe and we love it!
We’ve come a long way to get to this point and wish to spread the love and joy we’ve experienced with others even more. 
One of the next steps to achieve this is to create new designs to satisfy the growing demand’s different tastes! We understand that this is going to take time, money, and plenty of help from those around us and this is what brings us to IndieGoGo and our Community Design Project!
We strongly believe that the solution lies in working with our supportive communities and enriching the lives of others. We launched the Community Design Project to increase the designs in our collection and are doing so by actively involving the creative artist community in the process.
We called on artists from all over the U.S. to help us create the newest Flip Slip Foldable Shoes Collection. 


They each had a couple of weeks to create the design and build a prototype and were given our pre-existing design to use as the base. In exchange, they received an opportunity to have fun sharing their talent with the world, receive full recognition for their work, learn about the process behind making shoes, as well as get a chance to be fairly compensated along the way; each artist will receive 25% percent of the profit from their designs. A golden opportunity during such tough economic times.
 

But in order to truly make this a success, we need your help! Although this is a competition, with your help – ALL designs that meet our factory minimums will be made. All the artists can win. All of us can take one step towards achieving our dreams – together.

So this brings us to our next “step,” which is explaining in more detail, the benefits of supporting this campaign.
For as low as $20, you can get the ultra compact SLIM-Flips --- it has a soft foldable sole, and it’s great for emergency back-up use. You will also get an invitation to our San Francisco Launch Party in August and make a charitable donation to Kiva.org, a non-profit on a mission to alleviate poverty by empowering entrepreneurs through micro-loans.

 
For $35, you can also get our Classic Flip Slips in your choice of 32 different colors! You will have a chance to vote on the top 5 colors, and ALL of our shoes come with an expandable Flip-Tote bag to carry your other shoes in.
Starting at $49, you can take part in our Community Design Project and support our fellow designers:
There are 3 categories, which are The Embellished Collection, The Shoe Aficionado Collection, and The LUX Collection.
You can take a look at our Designer Gallery to see each one and learn more about each design and artist. Please Hurry! The first 200 purchases for each category will receive a 15% discount on their order.
For those who can’t decide, we also have a MYSTERY Shoe that will be the first design and category to reach 200+ pairs. Purchasing the MYSTERY design will also include a pair of SLIM-Flips as a thank you for your support.
We want to bring you a high-quality, handcrafted replica of the original artwork made by each artist. Our factory is ready to go and we already have all the molds and everything we need to get going. The only thing that we need to get going is money.
So how does this work exactly? 

It’s simple. You donate. You get a pair and in turn, help us meet our fundraising goal of $20,000+ for this to be a smashing success. As an added bonus, by pre-ordering a pair of our designer shoes, you’ll also get to take part in the entire creative process and provide feedback on the final design, as well as receive photos and be kept posted on the progress of your shoes.
We are seeking Retailers and Distributors to help us SPREAD the love even more!
If you’re as excited as we are, and want to really make a difference in our campaign, become a distributor, where you will be THE FIRST to get 12+ pairs of FlipSlips at wholesale price before they hit stores! They also make for GREAT gifts.
Anyone, Designers or Sponsors alike, will also have the option to create their own design with our FlipSlip Technology and receive 200 pairs of customized shoes.

Join Us.
We’re always on the lookout for passionate individuals and calling on artists to help with our project. If you want to join our team and work together to achieve our dreams, e-mail us at info@flipslip.com
We hope you’ll love FlipSlips as much as we do. REMEMBER: There are two BIG ways you can support us, you can Like us on Facebook and [SPREAD] the word to all your friends about our project, or donate and receive a pair of our shoes!
Thanks Indiegogo! We’ll see you on the Flip Side!
-
-- The Benefits
Replica of Winning Design
CHOOSE FROM THE FOLLOWING CATEGORIES FROM OUR COMMUNITY DESIGN PROJECT:

 
Receive a pair of FlipSlips! Support your favorite artist and their work and put your favorite design into production.
A "winning design" is one that meets the factory minimum of 200 pairs. If we can exceed our campaign goals (with your help) we will make more designs as we meet the factory minimums so you'll have more designs to choose from.
ALL SHOES THAT MEET MINIMUMS WILL GET MANUFACTURED.
(All of our FlipSlips come with an expandable FlipTote Bag to carry your other shoes). Depending on availability, we will try to accommodate more colors and sizes.
 
--

MEET OUR TALENTED DESIGNERS

About Metallic Strappers:
Artist RaymondCho wanted to put the straps in a much more fashion forward way using thinner straps and placing them along the back and wrapping the ankle of the foot.  This metallic finish can come in gold or silver or copper or colors that utilize metallic material. Features a bit of a point for a more interesting and fashion-forward look. The backing that supports the strap can come up 1 inch - 2 inches as long as it sits just on the ankle or above it. This shoe can be worn with a cocktail dress after a party to show off straps or with any shorter bottom piece in any other occasion to best show off the full design of the shoe.

Featuring a crystal pull tab and beaded French style lace, the Antoinette is also adorned with a vintage style faux shoe clip.Artist:Michele Woodford, formally a 7th Avenue Knitwear Designer for Calvin Klein Ltd. and Parsons School of Design graduate, now resides in beautiful Marin County, CA.  Currently known as ifanhour on etsy.com Michele designs one of a kind and alternative wedding gowns and accessories and pursues eclectic and sustainable design projects.

The Art Deco design gives this shoe a more elegant look and the heart theme is one that is very popular in all types of fashion. The embellished bottom of the heel with an embossed design that echos the top design elements.
By Artist: Don Bloom graduated from the Art Institute of Chicago with a BFA and has over 30 years experience in the commercial art field, concentrating on package design, portraits, illustrations and fine art. This shoe speaks from the soul, here are some ideas that came to mind to express our comfort:

story:
second video at:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6wKEGmwg8Yg

 

Who

I'm a Brazilian designer based in Milan specialized in watch design. I have made designs for a lot of brands over the last 8 years and now I'm here to present my own brand the COPACABANA.

Want to see some of my works go here: www.rsmiranda.com

I produced a small quantity of watches just with the Brazilian flag to present in the Milan design week. You can see this model under.

Goals

What I would like to reach is to produce a lot of more watches to sell during the next soccer world cup, with the flags of all the countries that will be playing the for the cup.

The more funds we get the more watches we will produce, we will need 25.000 to produce a good quantities of watches and to pay the moulding costs.

What

Copacabana watch is a quartz 3 hands watch with interchangeable silicone straps and 3ATM water resistance, the design was based on the Brazilians flip flops.  You can chose the watch with the flag you like.

 

 

When

First delivery with the Country you choose will be made at the end of July beginning of August (depends the country you live for delivery issues)

Second delivery (perk for the GROUP STAGE and ALL COUNTRIES MODELS) will be made at the beginning of 2014, after the World Cup's qualification process has end (19 November) and the withdraw of groups have been made.

 

You

Contribute and get the watches you choose. If your country is playing in the world cup we will do the watch even if you don't see it here under. If you like to have your country version image please right to us. note that we decide to make 3 models for each country.

 

Share, share and share

If you like this project please share with your friends in Facebook, twitter and just everywhere. We wil apreciate very much, thanks a lot.

story:
FASHION QUEST is a one day, interactive, live event sponsored by fashion and beauty businesses. Participants can win store specials, coupons, fabulous clothes and jewelry! Participants follow clues online and have access to fashion and beauty tips and quizzes. 
The day of the live event participants receive texts leading them to local boutiques in an attempt to win prizes.With several boutiques involved there are more than a dozen prizes to be awarded. 
The event ends with an after party. The prizes will be awarded. Music, food, drinks and desserts provided.There will be a trunk show, beauty samples and a swag bag of goodies for all! 
We want to grow global by supporting local! And look good doing it!

We're looking to raise $2500 for promotions and bills. We'd like to do as much big local media as possible. Our goal is to get so many participants they call in the Fire Marshal to the after party!

And we've got goodies from some of our sponsors as a 'thank you' for all your help!

Help us spread the word!

Follow us on Facebook and Twitter. Help us bring Fashion Quest to as many cities as possible. Support local, small businesses to grow global economy!
