You can check with any YouTube videos if you have any questions. Make sure your tape measure is straight and snug around the body. DO NOT pull it tight [We are not selling underwear :-) ].- Chest / Bust- Waist- HipsJacket Length  WASH & CARE INSTRUCTIONS TEAMAt Texlab, we partner with the world’s leading textile suppliers and integrate cutting-edge technology into our superbly designed products. The problem was that his trench coats couldn’t handle the extra cold, or heavy rain, when he was out for business, whereas, in the meantime, the performance jackets did not match the suit and tie look and made him look unprofessional. We were also inspired by the detachable liners of the performance jackets and integrated that design into the Zerod, making it a performance jacket with a trench coat look, and which can be worn in Spring, Fall and Winter.

story:
Thank you so much for checking out the ChariT Fashion Apparel Indiegogo campaign! We are here to pursue a solution, with your help, to solve a heartbreaking problem.

You see, there are people in the world that don't get a chance. They don't get a chance to drink clean water, eat nutritious foods to keep them healthy, live free from sex trafficking, smile because illness is taking over their bodies, wear warm clothes in the cold of winter, pursue an education, or simply live. 

Thankfully, there are charities that address these issue as best they can. But, they have limits. Many charities struggle to reach the people that need their help the most because of a funding shortfall. Simply getting people to know about their cause is difficult. And this brings up a problem.

 So I wanted to come up with a solution to help charities with a resource to break through the limitations they face.

To give our partnering charities an extra "gogo" we will increase the amount of giving from each t-shirt sold during this Indiegogo campaign from $4.50 (20% of proceeds) to $5.50 (that's over 30% with some of the reward levels!). This increase will give these charities an extra boost to help those in need. 

WHY ARE WE HERE?

We are seeking your support to help us start or first line of men's t-shirts. Our goal of $6000 will get us the inventory we need to launch the first four men's designs and have them available after this campaign. Not only will it get us our first men's apparel line, it will also result in financial support to our partnering charities so they can do what they do in making the world a better place.

Here's how we're spending the money raised:

 

OUR PARTNERING CHARITIES:

A Village for One (AVFO)

A Village for One is a Portland based not-for-profit organization developed to serve children who have experienced commercial sexual exploitation. An astounding number of youth in Portland, Oregon and surrounding areas have experienced this global crime against children.

Our aim is to bring the talents and gifts of our community together to create an opportunity to serve each child that has been impacted by sexual exploitation in our local community. The community unites to provide youth with a home, nourishment, education, holistic healing, mentorship, service, and opportunity to grow, believe, and become their greatest potential.

The first step in our effort to stop child sex trafficking is to provide a safe and supportive home for girls in our local community. Join us in our effort and become a part of our village.

How your purchase helps A Village For One House:

  • 4 t-shirts = Light
  • 20 t-shrts = Window
  • 80 t-shirts = Wall

Sustainable Harvest International (SHI)

In Central America, the devastating cycle of slash-and-burn farming does not allow families to meet their basic nutritional needs. Malnutrition contributes directly to poverty, which leads to increased childhood mortality rates, reduced access to higher education, poor housing, lack of sanitation systems and limited access to medical care. 

Sustainable Harvest International (SHI) works with over 650 families in rural farming communities in Belize, Honduras, Nicaragua and Panama. SHI's local field trainers work together with families for 3-5 years, providing them with the training and tools they need to preserve our planet's tropical forests while overcoming poverty. 

You can help these desperate farmers who long for training to protect our tropical forests. 

How your purchase helps Sustainable Harvest International:

  • 1 t-shirts = Plant Five Trees
  • 10 t-shirts = Plant a Family Garden
  • 145 t-shirts = Support a Family for 1 Year

ChariT Fashion Brand (CF)

For every ChariT Fashion Rally for Bostont-shirt sold during the Indiegogo campaign we will donate $5 to help the victims of the Boston Marathon bombings. This terrible event has changed the lives of the victims and their families. We want to do anything and everything we can to help them get through it. We'll be donating to the great organizations which assist the victims in any form they need. 

Although the stretch goal design, "Peace in the Storm", wasn't initially created to assist the vitims of the Oklahoma tornados, we have decided to direct it's donation to them. With each purchase of this t-shirt, we'll donate $5.50 toward thier relief. This storm took lives and destroyed homes and we want to do what ever can be done to assist those affected by this as best we can. We'll be donating to an organization which will be directly invovled with those affected.

OUR PRODUCTS

These shirts are 100% Ring-spun/Combed Cotton Jersey, Vintage Wash, Men's regular fit, and made by an ethically managed manufacturer. What does all this mean? These t-shirts will be one of the most comfortable t-shirts you'll ever own. During this Indiegogo campaign you will be able to select sizes small, medium, large, x-large and xx-large.

To give the ultimate comfort feel we printing using discharged screen printing where we can. The discharge process replaces the garments color with the color in the design. This leaves the soft natural feel of the fabric. It also doesn't crack, peel or fade. Some garments wont take the discharge so we'll use a water based ink. The water based ink's are a great alternative to discharge and still leave a soft feel on the t-shirts. Our goal is to offer the best finish and we are sure you wont be disappointed either way.

Our hats are 100% certified organic cotton twill front with 100% recycled polyester mesh back. To give this hat great comfort and style they are structured, mid-profile, six-panel, and pre-curved visor. The snap tab size adjustment creates a great fit for just about anyone.

Why start with only men's? Through research, men don't have as many options available to them to show support to charities. We want to provide stylish t-shirts and apparel that keep with up with the trends so they (we) don't have to stretch personal styles. We don't want to limit it to only men's. We'll be adding women's fashion to our lines as we go, and hopefully in the near future. 

REWARDS

 

Wristbands 

For each wristband, we'll donate $1 to a charity

 

Carry Bag

For each bag, we'll donate $1 to a charity

Hats

For each hat, we'll donate $2.50 to a charity

You can do it! Once we reach our goal we'll reveal the final rendition of these designs. For now, let these be motivation to make a difference in the world and reach this stretch goal! 

Once we achieve the first stretch goal we will reveal what will be offered in stretch goal 2. Ladies we'll get you in the action here...

 

 Thank you for checking out the ChariT Fashion Indiegogo campaign! Our success is due to your support and it's greatly appreciated. If you like what we are doing, we'd be stoked for you to share us with all your friends.

 

F.A.Q.

Q: How do I know which t-shirt/product I'll be receiving and supporting?

A: Once a reward level is selected and purchased, you'll receive an email with a link to fill out your order. Indiegogo does not offer a method to select specific products due to the variety of projects.

Q: If I select a reward level that includes more than the first 3 designs and the stretch goal isn't made, will I still get the additional t-shirts?

A: Yes. If the stretch goal isn't achieved during this campaign you will receive them once they go into production. It is estimated that they will go into production a few weeks after this campaign.

story:
Why do I need armor for my Actioncam?


Actioncam Armor is more than just a lens protection solution, its the future of the way you will use and interact with your GoPro.

Born out of frustration with the stock, flimsy and easily breakable mounts and lack of accessory adaptions we created the first ring mount that will fully upgrade your GoPro into the big leagues.

Precision CNC machined billet aluminium frame with poly-carbonate lens protection will help you to stay a hero! 


Over the last few years I lost several GoPro units to smashed glass, damaged lenses and mounts that broke and the camera was never recovered.

                                              

I decided enough was enough and wanted to develop a final solution that would not only keep my lenses safe from high speed flying gravel and debris but also a much stronger mount system capable of reducing the vibration and more importantly, reducing the chance of the camera being snapped off the mount!


Who needs Actioncam Armor?

From professional film and TV camera crew to race track goers , there are only so many ways in which you can mount your GoPro - until now!

By mounting to the main lens protrusion with an interference (tight and perfect fit with no slack) fit you are starting to hold the camera closer to the central mass (imagine holding a pencil at one end and doing a circular motion, then hold it in the middle and do the same thing! Much better).


By adding the accessories and mounts (such as the above gun rail mount) this way you create a stronger less fragile, and a much more convenient way of using your GoPro.

The best part is that we have used standard M5 threads on the 4 side faces, so if you need to make yourself a specific mount you can! But we will be releasing lots more ourselves! So keep an eye out on our stretch goals.

We have kept the design modular with standardised threads so you can find replacement bolts no matter where you are in the world!

Easy to use and fit, keeping your cameras rolling with nothing more special than a standard hex (Allen) key.

Stop letting the current range of GoPro mounts restrict how you film.

Our planned stretch goals are going to inlcude:

  • Pitcanny rail module (Police/Airsoft/Paintball)
  • Caribina clip module
  • Spacer block module
  • Rigid sheer mount/Angle mount
  • LED Lighting Ring
  • Microphone Mount

The poly-carbonate lens has been designed to be easily replaced when its fulfilled its sacrificial role of protecting your gopro from flying debris. 

The advantage of the poly-carbonate is its high impact strength. 

At 3mm its as thick as most riot shields on the market, and is much more capable of taking the impacts that the glass cannot.

What perks are available?

To get this into production we are offering the first 200 at £55 which at is less than cost price to get the project underway. We are choosing to do this as we have already invested so much time and money that we just want to see what you guys can create and film with the mount!

            

If your really into the project and want to make it happen then please consider being a wonderful benefactor and helping us reach our goal quicker by ordering the gold plated version of the lens protector! Its highly personal and will be made from the first 5 units to come off the production line and will be individually numbered within its bespoke lining of the 1120 Actioncam Armor Pelicase.


What stage am I at now?

We launched the product at the Makegood festival @ the old Selfridges hotel on the 29th of May. 

We had an amazing response to the product from Film and TV industry including many production companies.

We had the pleasure of meeting Jason Bradbury from the Gadget Show who shared his enthusiasm for the product and recognised its need for professional filming purposes.

We are at the stage where we need to produce the injection molds and have a minimum run of 200 of the CNC machined units.

We have had 3D prints made and evaluated for fitment and viewing angles, and have just had back the first CNC machined pre production sample which has massively exceeded our wildest dreams for fitment.

Unlike many other crowd funding campaigns I have put in all of the time and my own money and am not expecting you to fund any development work. The product is ready to be produced with your help and support.

Our UK manufacturer is ready to start the tooling and machining once we have gained the funding. They have an amazing reputation for quality and share our ethos on perfection.

What will your support mean?

Your support will enable me to continue to design and develop innovative products for Actioncam Armor so that you have more options for using your Go Pro.  

I want to be able to respond to changes in use of the GoPro system but to also adapt and produce for other Actioncam systems over time once we become established.

I believe that my designs will enable people to change the way they use their action cameras, and also change people's perceptions of what an action camera can do.

How will I use the funds that are raised?

The bulk of our funds are to be used for tooling costs for the injection moulding of the lens system and seals, with the remainder going towards production of the product itself.

Our supply chain for all the other parts are ready to go, which means that as soon as we have the funding in our possession we can start placing orders and get the product to you as soon as possible!

Who am I?....

Hi, my name is Chris McGee.  

Twelve months ago I launched my first company www.littlebiglaser.com in London and have grown it to be a respected laser cutting, design and consulting service. 

This even included a range of our own stock products for which we have been delivering consistent happy customers for our Pro-stand Promarker pen racks. They have sold internationally to great review.

People use my services for the personal touch I provide and my excessively high attention to detail and planning. I have never advertised, all my work is from recommendation and has included some well known international companies. 

This all stems from my career in military design & project management on multi-million pound HVAC construction projects.

I developed a very good track record for delivering on time and within budget!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this with as many people as you can, as I need your help to spread the word and let everyone know about the project!

Follow me on twitter, facebook and instagram.

Email it to your friends, shops that you would like to have it stocked in & grandparents or loved ones looking for you next gift! 

Please write wonderful things about me in your blogs, magazines, newspapers and link the project so that people can find their way to the campaign.

Any positive help will make me a very happy person and make all the sleep deprivation worth it!


Thank you all so much,

Chris

This campaign is supported by:

But we will be releasing lots more ourselves! So keep an eye out on our stretch goals.
We have kept the design modular with standardised threads so you can find replacement bolts no matter where you are in the world!Easy to use and fit, keeping your cameras rolling with nothing more special than a standard hex (Allen) key.Stop letting the current range of GoPro mounts restrict how you film.Our planned stretch goals are going to inlcude:

Pitcanny rail module (Police/Airsoft/Paintball)


Caribina clip module


Spacer block module


Rigid sheer mount/Angle mount


LED Lighting Ring


Microphone Mount

The poly-carbonate lens has been designed to be easily replaced when its
fulfilled its sacrificial role of protecting your gopro from flying
debris. 
The advantage of the poly-carbonate is its high impact strength. At 3mm
its as thick as most riot shields on the market, and is much more capable of taking the impacts that the glass cannot.What perks are available?To get this into production we are offering the first 200 at £55 which at is less than cost price to get the project underway. We are choosing to do this as we have already invested so much time and money that we just want to see what you guys can create and film with the mount!            If your really into the project and want to make it happen then please consider being a wonderful benefactor and helping us reach our goal quicker by ordering the gold plated version of the lens protector! Its highly personal and will be made from the first 5 units to come off the production line and will be individually numbered within its bespoke lining of the 1120 Actioncam Armor Pelicase.What stage am I at now?We launched the product at the Makegood festival @ the old Selfridges hotel on the 29th of May. We had an amazing response to the product from Film and TV industry including many production companies.We had the pleasure of meeting Jason Bradbury from the Gadget Show who shared his enthusiasm for the product and recognised its need for professional filming purposes.We are at the stage where we need to produce the injection molds and have a minimum run of 200 of the CNC machined units.We have had 3D prints made and evaluated for fitment and viewing angles, and have just had back the first CNC machined pre production sample which has massively exceeded our wildest dreams for fitment.Unlike many other crowd funding campaigns I have put in all of the time and my own money and am not expecting you to fund any development work. The product is ready to be produced with your help and support.Our UK manufacturer is ready to start the tooling and machining once we have gained the funding. They have an amazing reputation for quality and share our ethos on perfection.What will your support mean?Your
support will enable me to continue to design and develop innovative products
for Actioncam Armor so that you have more options for using your Go Pro.  I want to be able to respond to changes in use of the GoPro system but to also adapt and produce for other Actioncam systems over time once we become established.
I believe
that my designs will enable people to change the way they use their action
cameras, and also change people's perceptions of what an action camera can do.
How will I use the funds that are raised?The bulk of our funds are to be used for tooling costs for the injection moulding of the lens system and seals, with the remainder going towards production of the product itself.Our supply chain for all the other parts are ready to go, which means that as soon as we have the funding in our possession we can start placing orders and get the product to you as soon as possible!Who am I?....Hi, my name is Chris McGee.  Twelve months ago I launched my first company www.littlebiglaser.com in London and have grown it to be a respected laser cutting, design and consulting service. This even included a range of our own stock products for which we have been delivering consistent happy customers for our Pro-stand Promarker pen racks. They have sold internationally to great review.People use my services for the personal touch I provide and my excessively high attention to detail and planning. I have never advertised, all my work is from recommendation and has included some well known international companies. This all stems from my career in military design & project management on multi-million pound HVAC construction projects.I developed a very good track record for delivering on time and within budget!Other Ways You Can HelpPlease share this with as many people as you can, as I need your help to spread the word and let everyone know about the project!Follow me on twitter, facebook and instagram.Email it to your friends, shops that you would like to have it stocked in & grandparents or loved ones looking for you next gift! Please write wonderful things about me in your blogs, magazines, newspapers and link the project so that people can find their way to the campaign.Any positive help will make me a very happy person and make all the sleep deprivation worth it!Thank you all so much,ChrisThis campaign is supported by:

story:
One warm sunny afternoon back in 2006 I was out on my motorbike, a ZX6R, when into my head popped the slogan "Ridden with a total disregards of any speed limits. Know your own limits" And with that thought, Speed Rebel was born. . .

 

In the following year I worked hard to earn as much money as I could and did all I could to prepare for world domination of my Brand.

  • I conceived multiple designs, 19 in total (and a few on the drawingboard)

  • I got myself an ecommerce website (with what I thought had all the bells and whistles, at an extortionate price, but it turned out to be more like a Kahzoo).

  • I registered the Speed Rebel Logo as a Registered Trademark ®

  • I booked a stand at the NEC Bike Show 2007. . .

  • I put myself into this project, literally and changed my name by deed poll to Speed Rebel!!!

Then disaster stuck, i'd run out of funds to produce the quality garments I had conceived in my mind. But I had a stand booked at a Major Motorcycle Trade Show and not being one to give up and slightly niave, I managed to battle on even if it meant deviating from my plan of to offer Top Quality Apparel . . .

Needless to say the 10 days I spent on the Stand at the NEC was a very expensive lesson to be learned and Speed Rebel was officially shelved. . . . . . until now

First Time Around NEC 2007

For the re-launch of Speed Rebel we would like to get all the designs set up professionally for silk screen printing and printed via this method. Silkscreen printing is by far the best method in terms of quality & finish, but for low numbers of garments it is a costly process.
 
We are doing most of the work this time on the website ourselves but we will still need a professional to make it secure and iron out any bugs.
 
If we don't manage to reach our target we shall still be relaunching as planned but with a smaller range and minimal stock.
 

The Choice is yours, don't forget to check out the gallery pages

Even though the Speed Rebel Brand may seem that it is built up around the concept of Speed. We do not condone Speeding, Illegal or Irresponsible Riding, in any shape or form. Part of our fundamental ethos is to actively Support & Promote Rider Training Programs and Motorcycle Specific Charites

  • If we reach our Campaign Target we will donate 5% (2% if we don't) to our current Supported Charity (% from total sum received after relavent fees, ie. indiegogo & banking system)

  • 10% of the profits of every sale from our website (after campaign) will be donated to our current Supported Charity. See our website for more details of this

Limited Edition - Carbon Fibre Effect Print

Maybe this project isn't your cup of tea or funds are short just now after Christmas?  If so you could help by. . . .

  • Getting the word out in any way you can and by making some noise about our campaign.

  • Make good use of the Indiegogo share tools, try your best to wear them out!

 

Don't forget to check out the Gallery pages to see the Awesome designs on offer

 

THANK YOU & RIDE SAFE

story:
Emergency Fundraiser for a Custody Lawyer

Not many Dad's have $4000.00 in their wallet.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Emergency Fundrasier for a Custody Lawyer

What We Need & What You Get

-$4000.00 is the GOAL and we have 5 AWESOME perk levels (below) in which you can participate.

-100% of the funding will go to retain a custody lawyer and fight for custody

-The perks below consist of my new music and original art and professional Intuitive Readings & Reiki Sessions offered by my partner DJ Williams

About my partner and his experience:

DJ Williams has been doing readings for over twenty years and primarily uses Tarot with a variety of psychic skills to provide helpful and remarkably accurate readings. He was also a popular radio psychic and hosted a weekly call in show in Nashville, TN.  DJ is also a Reiki Master in the Usui System of Reiki Healing, a healing technique in which universal life energy is channeled through the hands of the practitioner for the treatment of others.

Other Ways You Can Help

-Help me get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

- A donation of any size.



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(song above performed by Michael West)

story:
Premium Men and Women selvedge jeans hand crafted in Manhattan, crowd-sourced and delivered to you at wholesale. www.lotuspeaknyc.com

To support us, click "contribute now" on the right, or click directly on any of the available rewards!

Our Story

We have design experience for over 20 years. Our designers have worked with companies to create various products, from tabletop design for Christian Dior to textile.
How did Lotus Peak come about? We have a passion for jeans, especially raw denim jeans. The way they fade is amazing. We have searched many boutiques and department stores for raw denim jeans and most of them are very plain.
We keep INDIVIDUALISM in mind when creating our jeans!
We FOCUS on PERSONAL DETAILS rather than flashy looks.

14.7 oz selvedge Red Lotus Men's line jeans

Double red lines  14.7 oz Japanese selvedge denim Kuroki Mill


14.7 oz Red Lotus men's straight classic fit jeans. Japanese selvedge denim from Kuroki Mill 125$

Hidden copper rivets on back pockets of every pair of men's and women's jeans

Hand painted pocket on limited edition men's and women's jeans,watch here how we did it

18K gold thread stitched on the selvedge line of coin pocket on limited edition men's and women's line jeans.

Selvedge denim back tag for you as an option or go with Lotus Peak Logo black leather tag. When order please make a note on your preference.

14.7 oz Kuroki Mill selvedge jeans, limited edition men's collection with hand painted pocket and 18K gold thread stitched on the selvedge line of coin pocket.

10.7 Kuroki Mill selvedge stretch denim ladies jeans, slim fit.

10.7 oz red selvedge Kuroki Mills stretch denim ladies jeans, slim fit

10.7 oz stretch selvedge denim ladies jeans, slim fit. Lotus Peak signature pockets  with hidden rivets.

White Lotus Men's Line 95$


18 oz Kuroki Mills Big Slub Selvedge Jeans Straight Tapered Fit
Special Edition Jeans 140$

18 oz Gold Lotus Jeans

We need YOUR help to get our designs out to the market!

Lotus Peak needs $20,000 to start our first production to produce men and women raw selvedge denim jeans!

This funding will be used to buy high quality denim fabric from Japan and pay to hand-craft these jeans here in Manhattan. We would like to offer our jeans to you at a wholesale price! This way you can be the first to own a pair of Lotus Peak denim jeans!

Check out the different Perks on the right side!

Lotus Peak's design V-neck shirt with allover print, 100 % premium soft cotton. S,M,L

Lotus Peak Hand painted V-neck shirt. Japanese "LOVE" Character.

10 oz denim tote bag hand painted by Artist Alexander Mourokh, for more designs go to www.lotuspeaknyc.com  you can choose canvas white , black or denim tote bag

Whatch here how we hand paint our tote bags for you

Designed and hand made by Lotus Peak. Bronze beads Apollo bracelet.

Designed and hand made by Lotus Peak. Bronze beads bracelet.

If you cannot contribute NO WORRIES!

HELP US GET THE WORD OUT!

YOU CAN USE THE INDIEGOGO SHARE TOOL! 

share our Facebook Page , instagram ,website, youtube

If we do not collect our goal we will use the funds to buy Japanese denim fabric and order one men's line. But with your help and support when we have all fund we will produce men's and women's, premium Gold and Red lines. We will make our jeans fit perfect for you!

Check out our website at www.lotuspeaknyc.com HERE

you will be able to tell us your size and fit and get customized Lotus Peak Jeans! ESTIMATE DELIVERY TIME NOVEMBER 2013


We Value Your Contribution!

Every Dollar Counts! Other Perks include Lotus Peak Hand-Crafted accessories, each piece is one of a kind!

story:
THANK YOU FOR ALL YOUR SUPPORT! 


You can now design and purchase your own Melon goggles direct from:

WWW.MELONOPTICS.CO.UK/DESIGN-YOUR-OWN-GOGGLES/




Our Story


Not taking life too seriously is ingrained in our culture here at Melon. All of the team are board junkies and we created Melon as an outlet to be creative, bring products to the market where we feel there is a gap and earn enough cash to keep us doing what we love doing…riding.

We started Melon for three main reasons:

  1. We were sick of spending half a week’s wages on a pair of sunglasses or goggles either for them to break or get lost on the hill. We wanted to make products that feel and look good to ride in, are durable and most importantly are affordable.
  2. We wanted to create a company that was fun to work in and a culture that our customers could relate to. We work hard but lets face it, who wants to work 80 hour a week in a job they hate? We believe there’s a better way to do business and we want to be part of the change.
  3. Generating profits allows us to give something back to the community that we live through. As we grow as a company we want to invest in educating people and find ways to encourage entrepreneurial activity within the extreme sports community.
Since launching Melon and our initial sunglasses range in June 2013 we’ve been overwhelmed by the positive response. We’ve had many late nights, uncountable cups of coffee and invested our time and money into making it a success. But sunglasses were just the beginning for Melon and with the launch of our first snow goggle we hope to cement ourselves as being on the forefront of innovation in the sports eyewear market.


Melon Goggles


Melon Goggles are the result of months of designing, prototype manufacturing and a snow season’s worth of testing in New Zealand. We know they look good, we know they work and we know they can take a beating. At almost half the price of comparable goggles on the market, we think that the Melon “Chief” goggles are the best goggles you can buy for your money this winter.

What Makes Melon Goggles So Great?

We wanted to design a product that would meet the demanding requirements of the most adventurous skiers and boarders, but would still be affordable to everybody involved in the sport from first timers through to seasoned pros.  As a result we have developed a design that offers maximum visibility without compromising on quality.

Mix this with our online customiser that lets you create your own setup from over 200 combinations and you’ve got yourself some of the freshest goggles on the mountain.



So Why Do We Need You?

Since our launch four months ago we've already accomplished more than we imagined possible. We're receiving compliments daily on the quality of our products, our speedy delivery times and our customer service. Having received orders from customers over the globe, we know that people want what we have to offer. 

Melon was never going to be a one product company and in order to expand we’ve had to take risks. We know our goggles are great and we want everyone to experience them. We’ve reinvested everything we’ve made from the sales of sunglasses over the last four months into the down payment to start the manufacturing and now we need your help to see us through. So click the link, get customising and help shape the future of the snow sports eyewear market by purchasing a pair of Melon goggles today!


How Do I Buy My Goggles?

We've tried to make the purchasing process as simple as possible. Follow the steps below and we'll make sure we get the right goggles to you shortly after this Indiegogo campaign is finished! 

  1. Make your contribution.
  2. Choose which goggles you would like (either a standard model or Design your own)
  3. Email your goggles design to indiegogo@melonoptics.co.uk (please include your sunglasses design if you have paid for them)
  4. Sit back and wait for your goggles to arrive (we ship worldwide). 


CLICK HERE TO VIEW STANDARD MODELS + STRAPS


CLICK HERE TO DESIGN YOUR OWN


When Will I Receive My Goggles?

We've got so much faith in our product that we've already begun the manufacturing process. This means that we will be aiming to get your goggles to you from December 10th and before the start of the snow season. We'll sending the goggles out in the order that we receive contributions, so the sooner we receive your contribution the sooner we can get your pair of new Melon goggles to you. 



UPDATE: Stretch Goal 2


Thanks to everyone that has helped us smash our first stretch goal of £20,000 that has enabled us to start to manufacture polarised lenses for our goggles! 

We have now added a second stretch goal of £35,000 which will allow us to add more colours to our goggles collection if we reach it. But we want YOU to vote on which colour you want us to add to the Melon "Chief" Goggle range, so place your votes 

HERE


Thanks again and keep spreading the word! 

The Melon Team

Thanks again and keep spreading the word! 
The Melon Team

story:
What are TRULY WALKING ON AIR inserts?

Truly Walking On Air Inserts are a new and effective insert footwear product of high-quality that are available at reasonable prices, delivered right to your door.

  • The footwear inserts that improve your experience – Developed based on the need of its own inventor, TRULY WALKING ON AIR's mission is to support its users to feel, move and do everything better in their current footwear. Acknowledged by a US patent pending, TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS are simply footwear inserts, yet they provide the maximum comfort, support, protection and vertical bounce to wearers.
  • Practical – Understanding the needs of customers with different footwear preferences, TRULY WALKING ON AIR Inserts can be for a variety of shoes and boots, where we provide sizes that are up to men size 17 and women size 18.
  • You are a life lover! – Who wants to wear uncomfy shoes that take us nowhere near a good place in our daily walk in life? We hope that by giving you the desired comfort for your feet, TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS can help you to enjoy your life as well as gain the strength to overcome challenges in your life.

What makes TRULY WALKING ON AIR different?

Brand new technology
  • Though simple as a product, TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS have been seriously developed and experimented by years of wear-testers just like you before the final invention was completed and registered with a US patent pending.
  • The design of TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS include a number of air cells, where each of them are pre-inflated to the most comfortable and supportive level of air throughout that prevent pressure buildup to both feet when moving and hence, reduce the risks of joint injuries and pain in the back and leg. At the same time, your feet will be resilient thanks to the pneumatic cushioning.
  • Our product is one of a kind in the market and of course, will offer you a unique experience that no other product can.
Built on customers' needs
  • Working in the industry for many years, our company has always been active in listening to our customers' everyday problems in order to find the ultimate solution for them.
  • TRULY WALKING ON AIR is not only for daily comfort, but has also proved to relieve discomfort caused by physical pain usually due to wearing improperly fitted footwear with other correctable pains suffered when surface impact in footwear has no “buffer zone”.
  • We have well noted changes for the better experiences by people who have already worn PowerSource TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS.
Flexible design 
  • TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS are produced in a way so that it is easy for you to make any adaptation to our product to fit the shoes of your choice. By beginning with shoes that are properly sized (width and length) are the first steps to overcoming footwear discomfort. Then, by adding TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS into your footwear of choice, brings an entirely new level of comfort and support to your feet.
  • Our amazing inserts are even suitable for women's high heels!


Who are we? 

Harold Doyle
TRULY WALKING AIR INSERTS are brought to you by Harold Doyle who has been working in the footwear production industry for 25 years. As a small kid growing up in Chicago, Mr. Doyle had many aches and pains with his feet (both foot muscles and bones), which led to back pain that caused him unease in his early years. Motivated by his own personal problem, Mr. Doyle has gained a great passion in footwear manufacturing and has worked and still works everyday tirelessly to help people that share the problems that he once suffered and other correctable problems. Besides TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS, Mr. Doyle is the father of several different footwear designs that have been introduced to the market. If you are ever having problems choosing our footwear products, feel free to ask Mr. Doyle his thoughts at e-mail address:POWERSOURCE1@SBCGLOBAL.NET

Some suggestions to use TRULY WALKING ON AIR inserts

  • Insert TRULY WALKING ON AIR in your sporty shoes to protect your feet, legs and even your back while doing heavy physical exercises
  • Tuck them in your favorite pairs of shoes/boots used daily for the best comfort in every movement
  • Try them with the most uncomfy shoes you have to see if our product can help
  • And ladies, please stick them in your high heels' before going out dancing or any walking activity!


Perks that we offer! 

Time and Processing 

Including the delivery time, it will take 6 weeks after the funding goal is reached for us to produce and send you your inserts.

Our early bird users said:

Jennifer P. says -   “PowerSource Truly Walking On Air Inserts make my day in that I get the high heel support that I need and the absorption of impact into the air chambers as I walk, stand or sit, rather than my feet and body absorbing the impact”

Mario J. says -   I used to be the last one to admit that my feet hurt from walking on them all day at work and then running on them after work during exercise, but now that I have found PowerSource, there is no way of going back to the way that things used to be”.

Nguyen thi Kim Anh (Finland) says - “Being both an athletic person and high fashion conscious individual is why I choose to wear PowerSource Truly Walking On air Inserts. Even though I have not reached an age where the resilience in my feet and body require super responsive support from my shoe inserts as PowerSource Truly Walking On Air Inserts provide, I can say with confidence that my energy reserve when I am walking, running or exercising is through the roof”

Eric says - “Rarely do you find footwear products of any kind that are not just surrounded by mere hype and that truly work. PowerSource Truly Walking On Air Inserts provide me with maximum cushioning and total support for my feet and all of my body's connective parts, which is what I need during long hours on my feet at work and also during exercise. For the low costs per pair and along with the fact that they really do work, PowerSource Inserts are the best in the game“!

Anna says -   “Having a profession that requires me to be on my feet all day long is why I have been wearing PowerSource Truly Walking On air Inserts for over 1 year now. My results are the same as the day I got them and my husband gladly wears them too. If comfort and support are what you seek for your feet, then get PowerSource Inserts because they are the best ever”.

Consie C. says -   “At 89 years of age I just recently started using a cane. I quickly saw the benefits of using PowerSource Truly Walking On Air Inserts, as the air in the inserts give me a rebounce in each step that I take, instead of me having to completely walk under my own power”.

Linda F. says -   “As we mature in life we need to have the type of footwear support and cushioning that provide real results and PowerSource Inserts provide me with the results that I need to get along without common problems normally dealt with”.

Carlos V. says - ”My work day is a whooooole lot better now that I have PowerSource Truly Walkiing On Air Inserts in my shoes. I have never felt so much cushioning and springiness support coming from any past shoe inserts that I used to buy. It's PowerSource from now on for me!"

    Risks & Challenges

    As a small business, it may be difficult for us create a viral effect within Indiegogo to gather enough attention we need for Truly Walking On Air.

    When our funding goal is reached, immediate mass production would take place to bring the products to you as soon as possible. However, the deliver will be carried out by a third party so there might be delay. But we will do everything we can to make sure the products reach you as promised.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Please help us to share this campaign to your friends and family members who might benefit from TRULY WALKING ON AIR. We appreciate your support in anyway.
story_txt:
What are TRULY WALKING ON AIR inserts? Truly Walking On Air Inserts are a new and effective insert footwear product of high-quality that are available at reasonable prices, delivered right to your door.

 

The footwear inserts that improve your experience – Developed based on the need of its own inventor, TRULY WALKING ON AIR's mission is to support its users to feel, move and do everything better in their current footwear. Acknowledged by a US patent pending, TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS are simply footwear inserts, yet they provide the maximum comfort, support, protection and vertical bounce to wearers.

Practical – Understanding the needs of customers with different footwear preferences, TRULY WALKING ON AIR Inserts can be for a variety of shoes and boots, where we provide sizes that are up to men size 17 and women size 18.


You are a life lover! – Who wants to wear uncomfy shoes that take us nowhere near a good place in our daily walk in life? We hope that by giving you the desired comfort for your feet, TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS can help you to enjoy your life as well as gain the strength to overcome challenges in your life.


What makes TRULY WALKING ON AIR different?
Brand new technology


Though simple as a product, TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS have been seriously developed and experimented by years of wear-testers just like you before the final invention was completed and registered with a US patent pending.
The design of TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS include a number of air cells, where each of them are pre-inflated to the most comfortable and supportive level of air throughout that prevent pressure buildup to both feet when moving and hence, reduce the risks of joint injuries and pain in the back and leg. At the same time, your feet will be resilient thanks to the pneumatic cushioning.
Our product is one of a kind in the market and of course, will offer you a unique experience that no other product can.

Built on customers' needs



Working in the industry for many years, our company has always been active in listening to our customers' everyday problems in order to find the ultimate solution for them.
TRULY WALKING ON AIR is not only for daily comfort, but has also proved to relieve discomfort caused by physical pain usually due to wearing improperly fitted footwear with other correctable pains suffered when surface impact in footwear has no “buffer zone”.
We have well noted changes for the better experiences by people who have already worn PowerSource TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS.

Flexible design 



TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS are produced in a way so that it is easy for you to make any adaptation to our product to fit the shoes of your choice. By beginning with shoes that are properly sized (width and length) are the first steps to overcoming footwear discomfort. Then, by adding TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS into your footwear of choice, brings an entirely new level of comfort and support to your feet.
Our amazing inserts are even suitable for women's high heels!




Who are we? 
Harold Doyle
TRULY WALKING AIR INSERTS are brought to you by Harold Doyle who has been working in the footwear production industry for 25 years. As a small kid growing up in Chicago, Mr. Doyle had many aches and pains with his feet (both foot muscles and bones), which led to back pain that caused him unease in his early years. Motivated by his own personal problem, Mr. Doyle has gained a great passion in footwear manufacturing and has worked and still works everyday tirelessly to help people that share the problems that he once suffered and other correctable problems. Besides TRULY WALKING ON AIR INSERTS, Mr. Doyle is the father of several different footwear designs that have been introduced to the market. If you are ever having problems choosing our footwear products, feel free to ask Mr. Doyle his thoughts at e-mail address:POWERSOURCE1@SBCGLOBAL.NET

Tuck them in your favorite pairs of shoes/boots used daily for the best comfort in every movement
Try them with the most uncomfy shoes you have to see if our product can help
And ladies, please stick them in your high heels' before going out dancing or any walking activity!




Perks that we offer! 


Time and Processing 

Including the delivery time, it will take 6 weeks after the funding goal is reached for us to produce and send you your inserts.


Our early bird users said:

Jennifer P. says -   “PowerSource Truly Walking On Air Inserts make my day in that I get the high heel support that I need and the absorption of impact into the air chambers as I walk, stand or sit, rather than my feet and body absorbing the impact”


Mario J. says -   I used to be the last one to admit that my feet hurt from walking on them all day at work and then running on them after work during exercise, but now that I have found PowerSource, there is no way of going back to the way that things used to be”.

Even though I have not reached an age where the resilience in my feet and body require super responsive support from my shoe inserts as PowerSource Truly Walking On Air Inserts provide, I can say with confidence that my energy reserve when I am walking, running or exercising is through the roof”


Eric says - “Rarely do you find footwear products of any kind that are not just surrounded by mere hype and that truly work. PowerSource Truly Walking On Air Inserts provide me with maximum cushioning and total support for my feet and all of my body's connective parts, which is what I need during long hours on my feet at work and also during exercise. For the low costs per pair and along with the fact that they really do work, PowerSource Inserts are the best in the game“!


Anna says -   “Having a profession that requires me to be on my feet all day long is why I have been wearing PowerSource Truly Walking On air Inserts for over 1 year now. My results are the same as the day I got them and my husband gladly wears them too. If comfort and support are what you seek for your feet, then get PowerSource Inserts because they are the best ever”.


Consie C. says -   “At 89 years of age I just recently started using a cane. I quickly saw the benefits of using PowerSource Truly Walking On Air Inserts, as the air in the inserts give me a rebounce in each step that I take, instead of me having to completely walk under my own power”.


Linda F. says -   “As we mature in life we need to have the type of footwear support and cushioning that provide real results and PowerSource Inserts provide me with the results that I need to get along without common problems normally dealt with”.


Carlos V. says - ”My work day is a whooooole lot better now that I have PowerSource Truly Walkiing On Air Inserts in my shoes. I have never felt so much cushioning and springiness support coming from any past shoe inserts that I used to buy. It's PowerSource from now on for me!"
  Risks & Challenges 
As a small business, it may be difficult for us create a viral effect within Indiegogo to gather enough attention we need for Truly Walking On Air.
When our funding goal is reached, immediate mass production would take place to bring the products to you as soon as possible. However, the deliver will be carried out by a third party so there might be delay. But we will do everything we can to make sure the products reach you as promised.

  Other Ways You Can Help
Please help us to share this campaign to your friends and family members who might benefit from TRULY WALKING ON AIR. We appreciate your support in anyway.

story:
www.engstdesign.com

                                         info@engstdesign.com

Die Kampagne ist vorbei und ich DANKE allen von Herzen, die mich hier unterstützt haben. Insgesamt habe ich einen Großteil der benötigten Summe zusammentragen können und das ist DER OBERHAMMER!!!

Also Schritt für Schritt und jetzt kann ich mit relativ großen Schritten beginnen - das ist doch toll!!! Und IHR SEID AUCH TOLL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

 

KÜSSCHEN IN ALLE RICHTUNGEN!

 

Wenn dir das Konzept dieses Crowdfundings nicht direkt zusagt, so ist DER VORSCHLAG vielleicht das Richtige für dich.

Du machst mir einen Vorschlag wie du dir die Unterstützung vorstellst und wir sehen, ob das zusammenpasst.
Einfach per E-Mail an info@engstdesign.com senden.

 

  ENGST


Wir leben in einer Zeit voller Veränderungen. Mode ist ein Luxusprodukt und dennoch mitlerweile für jedermann erschwinglich - in heutigem Maße scheint es mir oft überflüssig.
Es gibt für mich daher nur eine schlüssige Konsequenz: Die Gestaltung von Bekleidung und den Fokus gerichtet auf ökologische Textilien.

Baumwolle, Leinen, Hanf, Tussah-Seide.



Dies sind großartige und sehr interessante Materialien, welche viele Möglichkeiten birgen.

Jetzt ist jedoch nicht die Zeit für Experimente, sondern für ein solides Geschäftsmodell um die Visionen in die Realität zu transportieren - mit all meiner Kraft und Herz werde ich mein Label auf lange, kräftige Bein stellen.

Hier brauche ich eure Hilfe, um die Ideen vom Papier in Tragbares umzuwandeln.


DIE IDEE

Ich entwickle aktuell einen Online-Shop in welchem der Kunde die Möglichkeit hat sein gewünschtes Teil nach seinen Wünschen zu optimieren:

Farbe, Material (nur ökologisch zertifizierte), Änderungen am Design, sowie Design auf Anfrage.
Der Kunde hat somit die Möglichkeit ein Teil zu erwerben, das exakt seinen Vorstellungen entspricht. Er muss keine Kompromisse eingehen.

Mein Konzept spricht vier Gruppen an:

1. Klicken und kaufen

2. Kaufen mit Änderungswunsch

3. Interessiert an einem Teil welches nicht zum Typ passt - hier kann ein neues Teil dem Typ entsprechend kreiert werden.

4. Nachhaltig eingestellter Konsument

KEINE VERSCHWENDUNG - WEDER VON MATERIALIEN NOCH VON FINANZMITTELN UND KEINE PRODUKTION OHNE KUNDEN STATTFINDET.

Das Konzept beinhaltet:

- Bedachtes, nachhaltiges Konsumieren

- Lokale Produktion

- Nachhaltigkeit

- Individualität


LASST UNS DAS LABEL "ENGST" GRÜNDEN UND EINEN SCHRITT IN DIE ZUKUNFT MACHEN! ALLE PROZESSE DER BEKLEIDUNGSINDUSTRIE INBEGRIFFEN! JETZT!

 



DIE WICHTIGKEIT

Lasst uns die Veränderung der Mode-Industrie vorantreiben. Weg von der Oberflächlichkeit hin zu etwas mehr Solidem, Sinnvollerem. Die Schönheit, welche so faszinierend ist können wir doch beibehalten, aber in einem realisitschem Rahmen. Wir sollten mit der Zeit gehen, in welcher QUALITÄT, REINHEIT, ZEITLOSIGKEIT UND NACHHALTIGKEIT benötigt werden und kombinierbar sind.

Gegenwärtig stelle ich mir folgende Frage:

Wo will die heutige Gesellschaft hin? Die Menschen sind von der Gigantomanie erfasst. Der Wunsch alles in noch größerem, schnellerem, vielfältigerem Maße zu erschaffen, grenzt an Wahnsinn.

Produkte reisen tausende Kilometer, ehe sie den Endverbraucher erreichen. Luxus und Niedrigpreise charakterisieren unser Konsumverhalten.

Niemand möchte sich verantwortlich fühlen, sich mit Veränderungen befassen, die einem ein Stück des bisherigen Luxus nehmen, auf Annehmlichkeiten verzichten. Nun sind es jedoch genau wir, unsere Generation, die diese Herausforderung annehmen muss.

Die Welt verändert sich, mit oder ohne uns. Nur wenn wir uns in Bewegung setzen, können wir an einer Änderung mitwirken und sei sie nur minimal.

„Ohne Emotionen kann man Dunkelheit nicht in Licht und Apathie nicht in Bewegung verwandeln.“    
Carl Gustav Jung (1875-1961)

Unsere Zeit ist komplex.

Womit wir kämpfen ist die Last des Luxus.

Was fangen wir mit unserem Leben an?

Alles, definitiv alles ist überall möglich...

 


DAS GELD FLIEßT WOHIN?

Das Equipment ist der Schlüssel:

- Industrie - Schnellnäher und Overlock

- Grafis CAD (Software für die Schnittproduktion)

- Textilien

- Shooting

- Entwicklung der Website mit Online-Shop

Die angebotenen PERKS werden exklusiv für euch angefertigt!
Wenn ihr möchtet könnt ihr das Image für zB ein Poster, die Farbe für ein Shirt/Bluse selber aussuchen. Es wird also ein sehr individuelles DANKESCHÖN!

Sofern ich den vollen Betrag nicht erreiche, so ist die erreichte Summe dennoch der Start um loszulegen.

Mein Ziel ist - Schritt für Schritt.

WEGE ZU HELFEN

Es gibt viele Möglichkeiten mir mit der Kampagne zu helfen.

- VERBEITE DEN LINK

- ERZÄHLE LEUTEN VON "ENGST" UND DER KAMPAGNE

- EMPFEHLE MEINE KAMPAGNE ÜBERALL

 

                                  WER bin ich... WER ist ENGST?

Mein Name ist Michaela Engst und ich habe die Ausbildung zur Mode-Designerin an der BEST-Sabel Design-Akademy in Berlin absolviert. Den Abschluss zur staatlich geprüften Mode-Designerin erlangte ich im Juli 2012 und nun bin ich bereit loszurennen!
Mein eigenes Label von einem Sandkorn in eine riesige Kugel zu verwandeln!

Designen ist meine Leidenschaft. Etwas zu kreieren - die Resultate zu sehen erfüllt mich mit Freude und Zufriedenheit. Wenn das Resultat dies nicht schafft so sagt es mir - weiterarbeiten bis das gewünschte Ziel erreicht ist.

Mein wärmstes DANKE an ALLE!!!


Michaela Engst   ---   DIE GALERIE IST OBEN IM TAB ZU FINDEN - DORT KÖNNT IHR MEHR MEINER ARBEIT SEHEN.

 

++++ENGLISH++++ENGLISH++++ENGLISH++++ENGLISH++++ENGLISH++++ENGLISH++++

 

  ENGST


Since fashion is luxury and we do live in a time full of changes, I see only one wise conclusion which can also be a challenge --- to use exclusively organic textiles for my collections.
Cotton, Linen, Hemp, Silk.



Great and absolute interesting materials and don't let anyone say that you can't experiment with it. But this is not the time for experiments. This is the time for a solid business which I'll run with all my strength and heart!

I do need your help here to form it from the paper to actual pieces to touch.


THE IDEA

I'm creating an online-shop where my customers have options to optimise their piece:
colour, material (always organic), changes on the design or a design on request.
The customers will receive their individual piece exact as they wish it to be.

My concept includes four groups of customers:

1. click and buy

2. buying with changes

3. loving a piece but not fitting the type so creating something new

4. thoughtful consumer

THIS MEANS THAT THERE WILL BE NO WASTE OF MATERIALS OR MONEY, NO PRODUCTION WITHOUT NEED.

The concept contains:

- Thoughtful consuming

- Local production

- Sustainability 

- Individuality


LET US LAUNCH THE LABEL "ENGST" AND HEAD FOR THE FUTURE REGARDING ALL THE PROCESSES IN THE FASHION BUSINESS! NOW!

 



THE SIGNIFICANCE

Let us help change the fashion-business from it's superficiality to something solid, something useful again. We can uphold it's beauty but in a realistic way. Let us go with the time where QUALITY, PURITY, ETERNALNESS AND SUSTAINABILITY are needed and can be combined!

At the present time for me the attendant question is:

Where does our society want to go? The people are captivated by a gluttonous pursuit of a gigantomanic phantasy.. The desire for greatness borders to insanity in its reckless attempt to produce goods ever faster, larger and in more diversity.

Products travel thousands of miles around the world before they actually reach the consumer. Without regard to whether or not products could be produced in the country of arrival, our consumer behavior is characterized by luxury and low-price policy.

It is only by interacting that we can have an impact on the change. And if it is on the minimum.

"Without emotions darkness can't be converted to light and apathy not to motion."
Carl Gustav Jung (1875-1961)

Our time is complex.

Our strife is with the burden of luxury.

What to do with our lives?

Everything, definitely everything, is possible, everywhere…


THE MONEY GOES TO?

The equipment is key:

- Industrial sewing machine

- Overlock machine

- Grafis CAD (software for patterns)

- Textiles

- Shooting

- Development of the online-store

The PERKS I'm offering you are things which are very exclusive and will be made only for you!
You are also able to choose the image for example, or colour of the shirt or blouse. So it will be a very individual thank-you-gift!

If the full amount is not raised during the first funding period this will be the start to purchase the necessary equipment.


The goal is certain – step by step!

WAYS TO HELP ME

There are so many ways to help me with this campaign.

- SPREAD THE LINK

- TELL PEOPLE ABOUT "ENGST" AND THIS CAMPAIGN

- RECOMMEND MY CAMPAIGN EVERYWHERE

 

                                  WHO am I... WHO is ENGST?

My name is Michaela Engst and I've studied fashion-design at the BEST-Sabel DesignAcademy in Berlin. Finally I graduated in July 2012 and now I'm ready to run! To run my own label.

Designing is my passion, creating something - seeing the results fullfills me with happiness and satisfaction and sometimes the result tells me to keep on working on it until it gives the satisfaction
I was looking for.

My warmest THANK YOU to everyone!


Michaela Engst   ---   CHECK OUT THE GALLERY (the tab right in top) to see more of my work.

                                  WER bin ich... WER ist ENGST?

Mein Name ist Michaela Engst und ich habe die Ausbildung zur Mode-Designerin an der BEST-Sabel Design-Akademy in Berlin absolviert. Den Abschluss zur staatlich geprüften Mode-Designerin erlangte ich im Juli 2012 und nun bin ich bereit loszurennen!Mein eigenes Label von einem Sandkorn in eine riesige Kugel zu verwandeln!
Designen ist meine Leidenschaft. Etwas zu kreieren - die Resultate zu sehen erfüllt mich mit Freude und Zufriedenheit. Wenn das Resultat dies nicht schafft so sagt es mir - weiterarbeiten bis das gewünschte Ziel erreicht ist.
Mein wärmstes DANKE an ALLE!!!
Michaela Engst   ---   DIE GALERIE IST OBEN IM TAB ZU FINDEN - DORT KÖNNT IHR MEHR MEINER ARBEIT SEHEN.
 
++++ENGLISH++++ENGLISH++++ENGLISH++++ENGLISH++++ENGLISH++++ENGLISH++++

 
  ENGST


Since fashion is luxury and we do live in a time full of changes, I see only one wise conclusion which can also be a challenge --- to use exclusively organic textiles for my collections.Cotton, Linen, Hemp, Silk.
Great and absolute interesting materials and don't let anyone say that you can't experiment with it. But this is not the time for experiments. This is the time for a solid business which I'll run with all my strength and heart!
I do need your help here to form it from the paper to actual pieces to touch.

THE IDEA
I'm creating an online-shop where my customers have options to optimise their piece: colour, material (always organic), changes on the design or a design on request.The customers will receive their individual piece exact as they wish it to be.
My concept includes four groups of customers:
1. click and buy
2. buying with changes
3. loving a piece but not fitting the type so creating something new
4. thoughtful consumer
THIS MEANS THAT THERE WILL BE NO WASTE OF MATERIALS OR MONEY, NO PRODUCTION WITHOUT NEED.
The concept contains:
- Thoughtful consuming
- Local production
- Sustainability 
- Individuality

LET US LAUNCH THE LABEL "ENGST" AND HEAD FOR THE FUTURE REGARDING ALL THE PROCESSES IN THE FASHION BUSINESS! NOW!
 

THE SIGNIFICANCE

Let us help change the fashion-business from it's superficiality to something solid, something useful again. We can uphold it's beauty but in a realistic way. Let us go with the time where QUALITY, PURITY, ETERNALNESS AND SUSTAINABILITY are needed and can be combined!
At the present time for me the attendant question is:
Where does our society want to go? The people are captivated by a gluttonous pursuit of a gigantomanic phantasy.. The desire for greatness borders to insanity in its reckless attempt to produce goods ever faster, larger and in more diversity.
Products travel thousands of miles around the world before they actually reach the consumer. Without regard to whether or not products could be produced in the country of arrival, our consumer behavior is characterized by luxury and low-price policy.
It is only by interacting that we can have an impact on the change. And if it is on the minimum.
"Without emotions darkness can't be converted to light and apathy not to motion."Carl Gustav Jung (1875-1961)Our time is complex.Our strife is with the burden of luxury.What to do with our lives?Everything, definitely everything, is possible, everywhere…



THE MONEY GOES TO?
The equipment is key:
- Industrial sewing machine
- Overlock machine
- Grafis CAD (software for patterns)
- Textiles
- Shooting
- Development of the online-store
The PERKS I'm offering you are things which are very exclusive and will be made only for you! You are also able to choose the image for example, or colour of the shirt or blouse. So it will be a very individual thank-you-gift!
If the full amount is not raised during the first funding period this will be the start to purchase the necessary equipment.
The goal is certain – step by step!
WAYS TO HELP ME
There are so many ways to help me with this campaign.
- SPREAD THE LINK
- TELL PEOPLE ABOUT "ENGST" AND THIS CAMPAIGN
- RECOMMEND MY CAMPAIGN EVERYWHERE
 

                                  WHO am I... WHO is ENGST?

My name is Michaela Engst and I've studied fashion-design at the BEST-Sabel DesignAcademy in Berlin. Finally I graduated in July 2012 and now I'm ready to run! To run my own label.
Designing is my passion, creating something - seeing the results fullfills me with happiness and satisfaction and sometimes the result tells me to keep on working on it until it gives the satisfaction I was looking for.
My warmest THANK YOU to everyone!
Michaela Engst   ---   CHECK OUT THE GALLERY (the tab right in top) to see more of my work.

story:
Help Get the Team to Las Vegas!

They've made it this far...Help them go ALL THE WAY!

Team Mod Style Lab has made it into the semi-finals of the extreme fashion competition Battle of the Strands!!  But...They need your help to get to Las Vegas to compete amongst the best across the nation in this avant-garde couture competition.  Battle of the Strands is an epic, over-the-top hair/makeup/wardrobe competition that will be filmed for television for the world to see.

Please support Hair Stylist Tina Krinhop, Fashion Designer Jennifer Chabri, and Makeup Artist Amy LaVe' in their quest to show the world that Jacksonville, FL has got some talent!  They have worked relentlessly for months to make it into the semi-finals of Battle of the Strands, so please don't let the journey end here for them.

What You Get

It's a win-win situation...your support of team Mod Style Lab will get you a great perk! Check out the list to the right to see what you will get for your support.

story:
Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to check out our page. We truly appreciate it!! We can't do this without your support.   

                                   Who we are and why we are here:

We at Heritage are proud to present to you our first line of amazing timepieces. But before we do that we would like to give you a little background into OUR HERITAGE.

Heritage Watch Company is a family operated project that was formed purely by accident. Last year while discussing what we were going to get our fathers for Fathers Day, we noticed they wore the same watch for every occasion in their lives. So we thought to ourselves why not have watches that they can wear for different parts of their day and to different occasions while at the same time having exceptional quality and still being affordable. We set out to work with top designers and watchmakers and many months later came up with what you see here today! 



This was the final rendering we received from our design team. And the start to our dream becoming a reality.

Our Leather watch features:

*41millimeter bezel

*52 millimeter case

*24 millimeter Genuine leather black band. 

*Japanese Miyota 2035 movement. (same found out in citizen/seiko watches)

Our Stainless steel/bamboo date/just watch features:

*43 millimeter bamboo bezel

*53 millimeter stainless steel case

*24 millimeter stainless steel/bamboo bracelet

*Screw-down case back

*Butterfly clasp with logo on it 

*Japanese Miyota 2115 movement (same found out in citizen/seiko watches)

Our Stainless steel watch features:

*43 millimeter fluted stainless steel bezel

*53 millimeter stainless steel case

*24 millimeter stainless steel jubilee bracelet 

*Screw-down case back

*Butterfly clasp 

*Japanese Miyota 2115 movement (same found out in citizen/seiko watches)




Want to see more photos and/or interact with us? Please check out our Facebook page and like us here!

LIKE ALL MAJOR WATCH BRANDS, WE HERE AT HERITAGE ARE OFFERING A 2 YEAR WARRANTY ON ALL OUR WATCHES!!!

Tired of spending money at jewelry stores to get your watch adjusted or your battery changed? Just add $10 to your pledge and you'll receive a do-it-yourself kit.

Risks and challenges

MANUFACTURING 
We have established relationships with experienced watchmakers to mitigate the risk of delays by material suppliers and to ensure quality control is implemented to the highest level. We have built prototypes with our manufacturer and they fully understand our product, specifications and production timeline. While we know there will still be unexpected challenges along the way, we will always be transparent and inform our backers of potential hurdles along the way.

story:
What is Thought Space

Thought Space Apparel is a US-based clothing and art collective operating out of the beautiful and historic Lower Hudson Valley in New York.

Owned and operated by young entrepreneurs and deeply rooted in the tattoo and art community, the goal of Thought Space is to provide far more than simply the highest quality products at a fair cost.

Hang-tags are screen-printed in, so no more discomfort. No-feel, discharge printing on all designs for comfort and quality. No more thick, uncomfortable prints - you shouldn't be thinking about your shirt while you're trying to elevate your mind.

What We Need & What You Get

We're aiming to raise funds to be able to launch with a full line of products in time for Fall, when the line officially debuts at the 3rd annual Westchester Tattoo Convention in October. Your contribution is greatly appreciated, and to thank you, we'll be getting your items out to you as quickly as possible and all items will be fulfilled in September 2015 - we hate waiting months for stuff we back, too. On top of it, we are offering a few rewards in this campaign that will not be available anywhere else once it ends. You’ll also get first access to the entire line, available through this campaign weeks before our webstore, any brick & mortar locations or conventions/trade shows. You'll even get a discount code to use once our webstore does open on a future order once the campaign ends. Not to mention the deep discounts that are being given on the products in the perk packages of this campaign!

The Impact

Your contribution will help us in many ways, and for it we are extremely grateful. First of all, by picking up some discounted threads today, you will help us directly by contributing to our initial order, including restock and new items. You’ll be helping us to have enough stock on-hand, at launch, to fill storefronts, our webstore, and to provide our traveling sales team to bring The Collective to cities all over the country, spreading art and inspiration.


Other Ways You Can Help

Money isn’t an easy thing to part with these days – we get that. There are plenty of significant ways you can help our cause without parting with a dime. Any of the following would be a huge help:

1.  Share this campaign on your social media accounts to help us to get the word out there! Our mission is all about connecting people to others in the art/tattoo/creative community and there is no better way than sharing our message with those you interact with online. We appreciate it!

Shop Small! Whether you end up being a part of this campaign or not – remember that in your travels, you should do your best to give small businesses your money. If we want to keep this American dream thing alive, we need to ensure that regular people can come up with a vision, work hard, and earn a living wage through it. Support hard working people, like yourself.

The Art

Take some time and check out the art of our initial launch below. Though they aren't displayed here, all designs are available in a Ladies' cut and others will be in tanks, etc.

When you contribute to the campaign, you will receive an email with an explanation of how to select the specific designs, sizes, colors, etc. that you want!

E-Mail Thoughtspaceapparel@gmail.com with any questions!

story:
Introducing the FlipSlip! The 2nd pair that EVERY woman needs.

FlipSlips are foldable designer flats on the go that can easily fit into a small purse or a pocket. We have reduced the shoe to the size of an iPhone and made it fold so that it doesn't get your purse dirty.

The FlipSlip's Unique Patented Technology is the only shoe that folds sole-to-sole and has a reversible upper so it is compressible and hygienic.

FlipSlips have a high quality neoprene upper that makes it waterproof, yet breathable for all occasions. The padded, foam cushion insole makes walking a comforting breeze. Flip Slip is TRULY an all-purpose shoe and we love it!

FLIPSLIP'S CROWD-DESIGN PROJECT

We launched the Crowd-Design Project to increase the designs in our foldable shoes collection and are doing so by actively involving artists from our creative community. We called on designers from all over the U.S. to help us create the newest FlipSlips foldable shoes for a chance to get their designs put into production and share their talent with the world. 

THE BENEFITS

Classic FlipSlips - Support us at the $50 Level:

- Receive a pair of our Classic FlipSlips in black or choose any of our top colors: red, blue, brown, ivory or backers choice. Supporters will have a chance to vote from 32 colors of high-quality Neoprene that is waterproof and durable). Whole sizes 6 to 11, comes with a FlipTote bag.

 

Designer Collection FlipSlips - Support us at the $100 Level:

Click on Image to VOTE:

All of our shoes are hand-made and we will source all the materials needed to make a high-quality replica of the original artwork. As an added bonus, by pre-ordering a pair of our designer shoes, you’ll also get to take part in the entire creative process and provide feedback on the final design, as well as receive photos and be kept posted on the progress of your shoes.....We want to bring you the best replica of the original artwork made by the Designer!

Startup Supporters & Business Partners - $1,000

Get FlipSlips shoes with YOUR company's logo!

 

 

 

You’ll get 22 pairs of FlipSlips with your company’s logo (embroidered on the insole) to give to your favorite employees, friends, preferred partners or valuable customers. Makes a perfect holiday gift that is unique, practical and will definitely get your company's name talked about! Starting at 50 pairs, we will also print your logo on our FlipTote bag.


Thanks for supporting our Design Project!

In order to truly make this a success, we need your help! Wiith your help – ALL designs that meet our factory minimums will be made. All of us can take one step towards achieving our dreams – together.

We hope you’ll love FlipSlips as much as we do. REMEMBER: There are two BIG ways you can support us, you can Like us on Facebook and [SPREAD] the word to all your friends about our project, or back us and receive a pair of our shoes!

Thanks for helping us, we’ll see you on the Flip Side!

story:
Greetings! 

If you're reading this than welcome to my IndieGoGo to help fund a launch/relaunch of Good Dude Apparel, If you don't personally know me, my name is Ricky Coates. I am a full time touring in Survay Says!, which leaves very little time to make money to pay off bills as well as buy food. Needless to say I love what I do but this is my attempt to advance in an industry I've always been interested in working in.

Why I'm asking you

Good Dude Apparel was created over the course of many crude drawings of myself as well as the support of my friends and family. It's honestly a company that's meant to be enjoyed by everyone I know. This is why I'm asking my friends, family, tour-mates, random strangers even to help me make this a reality. It's more or less a pre-order to make a dream of mine into a reality.
